description: Twly make it easy what you want to see about your social accounts (Twitter & Instagram). Comes with awesome handy tools which are unique. It's a one stop solution to manage your multiple twitter and Instagram accounts at a single place & find interesting insights. ★ Who to follow: helps your to decide who to unfollow using awesome filters i.e inactive users etc ★ Unique dashboard: gives you snapshot stats about your last 30 days account activity at one place. ★ Push notifications when someone follow/unfollow, retweet or mention you. ★ Growth tracking - Twly automatically tracks and generates graphs for your several social account metrics, so you can easily see your social account performance and audience growth. ★ Schedule : Twly makes it easy to schedule tweets (support for Twitter) in advance to go out at an exact date and time. ★ Smart Copy : Follow people who are following/followers of a Twitter/Instagram handle ★ Recent unfollowers and followers: Ever wondered who unfollowed you on Twitter/Instagram? Now, You can find who unfollowed/followed you recently. ★ Followers: See people who follow you, but you aren't following them back. ★ All Following: See everybody you are following on Twitter. ★ Timeline: access your twitter/instagram timeline ★ Support same TWLY account on multiple devices. ★ No follow/unfollow limits ★ No background services Official Twitter account https://twitter.com/twlyco We won't send any tweets without your permission. Note: Some features won't be supported for users with more than 60,000 followers/followings due to Twitter/Instagram API rate limits, but you can still access to social insights Tags : Who to unfollow, Social insights

description: - "Game of the Year" -MetaCritic, IGN, TouchArcade, Rock Paper Shotgun, GameTunnel Beautiful and surprising, the millions of Goo Balls who live in the World of Goo are curious to explore - but they don't know that they are in a game, or that they are extremely delicious. This is the FIRST CHAPTER of the award winning game, now on Android. Drag and drop living, squirming, talking, globs of goo to build structures, bridges, cannonballs, zeppelins, and giant tongues. Mysterious Levels - Each level is strange and dangerously beautiful, introducing new puzzles, areas, and the creatures that live in them. World of Goo Balls - Along the way, undiscovered new species of Goo Ball, each with unique abilities, come together to ooze through reluctant tales of discovery, love, conspiracy, beauty, electric power, and the third dimension. The Sign Painter - Someone is watching you. World of Goo Corporation - Congratulations! World of Goo Corporation is the Global Leader in Goo and Goo Related Product, including World of Goo Corporation Trademark Brand Soft Drink Beverage and World of Goo Corporation Trademark Brand Facial Exfoliating Lotion. Succulent! Massive Online Competition - Human players around the world compete in a living leaderboard to build the tallest towers of goo in World of Goo Corporation's mysterious sandbox. World of Goo Corporation is contractually obligated to state that everyone is a winner and is enthusiastic to celebrate everyone's tower building opportunities equally. Congratulations, and good luck! Awards and recognition for World of Goo: * Wii Game of the Year -IGN * iPad Game of the Year - TouchArcade, MetaCritic * Best Indie Game -Spike TV Video Game Awards * Best Design -Academy of Interactive Arts and Sciences * Best Downloadable Title -Game Developers Choice Awards * Best Design -Independent Games Festival * Technical Excellence -Independent Games Festival * Best Indie Game -Spike TV Video Game Awards * Game of the Year -Rock Paper Shotgun * Game of the Year -GameTunnel * Best PC Puzzle Game -IGN * Best Wii Puzzle Game -IGN * Best Artistic Design Wii -IGN * Best New IP Wii -IGN * Most Innovative Design Wii -IGN * Puzzler of the Year -Golden Joystick Awards EULA is available here: http://worldofgoo.com/eula.txt

description: What Am I is a fun and hilarious new, free social word guessing and charades game which you can play with your friends and family anytime, anywhere! After choosing a deck from more than 20 different categories available, you must place the phone on your forehead and from that moment on you are "transformed" into the word that is showing on the device. Your friends must help you guess what you are answering to your questions, doing mimics, or whatever they feel might work for you. The person who guesses more words correctly wins! FEATURES - - Create groups to compete and play heads up with each other - Several decks and categories for all tastes, such as Animals, Movies, Novels and many others - Totally free, no strings attached! - Choose your word language or lingo for free like English, Portuguese etc. - Unlimited fun and laughter! WIDE RANGE OF DECKS TO CHOOSE FROM - Guess TV Themes - Guess Songs - Guessing Singers - Guess 70s, 80s And 90s TV Shows - Guess Animals Kingdom - Guess Movies - Guess Novels - Guess Kids TV Shows, Cartoons And Movies - Guess Cartoons - Guess Celebrities - Guess Pokemons There are many ways friends can play, it is really up to their imagination. They can help with mimics, question, dancing, drawing, etc to resolve the fun guessing charades. What Am I is certainly one of the best, if not THE best charades games available on the Google Play Store! Oque Sou? Heads Up So, what are you waiting for? Download What Am I right now, let the charades guessing game kick off and lock horns to play heads up with each other!

A fully functional digital astrolabe. Now you too can tell the time with your phone! Take observations of the sun's elevation, and compute the current time in three simple steps. Accurate to about +/- 5 minutes. And much more. Navigate by the stars; figure out what time the sun will rise tomorrow morning; and the time of onset of total darkness. And hundreds more useful calculations. Astrolabes are general-purpose astronomical computers, that can perform over 600 astronomical calculations, most of which can be performed on 2play Astrolabe. Provides unique insights into how the universe revolves around us.

A clock for your nightstand, or desk, or living room. Seven great styles. Plug in, or dock your phone, and it auto-launches. Optionally display alarms and calendar events on your clock screen. Night mode. - Unique comic clock with content and dialog that adjusts throughout the day. - Fully animated gears clock. - LED clock based on European train station clocks. - Mesmerizing pop art style. And more...

Limited-time offer: purchase a license through the new in-app purchase system in order to receive 2player for only US$1.99. The 2player Network Media Player is a full-featured Android media player for Windows home networks. "Play From" or "Play To" Windows 7 and Windows 8 computers, XBox 360s, as well as other network devices that support the Windows "Play From" and "Play To" protocols. Play music from your Windows 7 and 8 "My Music" collections directly on your phone; or play music on your phone on a DLNA® TV; or remotely from your media server to your Xbox 360! Music, video, and slideshows everywhere, where you want it, when you want it. Fully functional trail version. Click "Purchase License" to convert to a fully licensed version. Features: - Play content from built-in Windows 7 and Windows 8 media servers. - Play content from DLNA® and UPNP-AV® network media servers. - Remotely control DLNA and UPNP-AV "play-to" devices. - Remotely control other Android devices running 2player 2.0 - Built in media server provides media to other DLNA and UPNP-AV devices. - Sync via Wi-Fi from "My Music" collection, or from network storage devices. - Long-click to download music to your phone from Windows 7 and Windows 8 media shares and network media servers. - Works on Google TV! An ideal target device for your phone or tablet. - Works with most UPNP-AV and DLNA media servers, TVs, and media renderers.* * 2Player is not DLNA-certified software. DLNA and UPNP are the trademarks of their respective owners. 2Player is not certified by, endorsed by, or recognized by the Digital Living Network Alliance.

description: Welcome to Jewels Deluxe (saga cover): Jewels Deluxe is a match-3 puzzle game with classic and addictive gameplay and missions. Like another classic jewel legend game, just swap and match jewels your way through over as many levels as you can. Especially in this game you can play with your friends in game center and see who get the highest scores. HOW TO PLAY ✔ Like another classic Jewel legend games, just swap the jewels to match 3 in a line to destroy them. ✔ Reach level target(Classic, Time, Endless) or make board tranparent (Arcade) to pass levels. GAME MODES ✔ Classic mode: you have to reach the jewel target score to go to next level and try to keep the jewels board always have one match at least. The game is over if no more matches. ✔ Arcade mode: you have to clear all jewel backplane to go to next level before the time is up. ✔ Time Attack mode: you have to match as many jewels as you can to fill full score progress. The score progress is decreased by time. ✔ Endless mode: you have to reach the jewel target score to go to next level and go as far as you can. The game is over if you quit. GAME FEATURES ✔ 6 different classic jewels legend and many special jewels with powerful-effect: Bomb jewel blast, Thunder jewel blaze, Color jewel star. ✔ 4 classic and saga modes: classic, arcade, time attack, endless. ✔ Share and compare highest score with your friends via game leader board. ✔ Many addictive and interested achievements. ✔ Nice HD graphics, cool animations, exciting music & sound effects ✔ Easy and fun to start but a challenge to get 3 stars in each level If you love match 3 jewels deluxe or diamond games, you must try Jewels Deluxe. Have fun and enjoy the game. We LOVE Jewels Deluxe. If you do too please rate this jewels game, share with your friend and invite them to play with you and tell us what you think. Your feedback helps us make Jewels Deluxe even better and keeps the updates coming! Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/2PXMob/582577748427378 Experiencing problems with Jewels Deluxe? Please send email to us: contact.2pxmob@gmail.com

This may not be Bad Piggies or Angry Birds but it’s a fun game based on the concept of a popular childhood game called Pick Up Sticks. Lines! features 3 distinctive gameplay types: Arcade - See how many lines you can remove before your life runs out. Several special items will help you along the way, while others may try and slow you down Time Attack - Time is important here! Remove as many lines as possible within 30 seconds! Minesweeper - One mistake and you’re dead! Remove the correct lines to score. But don’t take forever because the longer you sit there, the less points you will get in the end! And if you think a bit too long, the mines will go off on their own! Game is built on And Engine GLES2.0. The game features colorful graphics, addictive game modes and a cheerful and catchy tune ★★★★★ REVIEWS ★★★★★: PLAYANDROID.COM (30.10.2012) The graphics are clear and colorful and they match the scenery of the 70s pretty well. According to that, the background music and the sounds are apt as well, due to its funky tunes and cute plop-sounds. Besides that, the controls are super easy because the only thing you have to do is tapping on the lines to make them disappear. Furthermore the scope of this game is quite okay due to three special lines (locked, health and bomb) and three various game modes (Arcade, Time Attack and Minesweeper). ANDROIDTAPP.COM 4/5 (1.11.2012) Should you Download Damn Lines!? Definitely check the game out if you like simple puzzle titles. It’s simple to play, hard to master and comes with various modes to get stuck into. For short bursts it’s thoroughly engaging and enjoyable. SEO Damn Lines!, Lines!, Pick up Sticks, Arcade, Time trial, Puzzle, Logic, Casual Pro version has no in game advertising.
release_text: Version 2.0.2 -Fixed crash on gameover with large score values Version 2.0.1 New HD graphics and music Google Play Services integration for online leaderboards and achievements. Version 1.0.4 - Full Screen support - Graphic changes in game menus - Option to share via Twitter(official app only atm) and via other networks - Small performance increase

description: Simply Sudoku is a game for playing the classic Sudoku puzzles you know and love. The game has been designed to bring the puzzles to the forefront with minimal chrome and intuitive and easy controls. It features: - Beautiful and clean minimalist design - Hint button to help you when you get stuck - Four levels of difficulty to ensure that you have fun! - Ability to take notes - Highlights of active numbers on the game board - Smart keyboard that helps you along the way - Soothing music to help your brain relax and stay focused - Fun and interesting Sudoku facts - Over 100 puzzles and more coming with every update Simply Sudoku is a game for your Android device that is simply about solving Sudoku and having fun. If you love Sudoku, you will love this application. And best of all its FREE to play.
release_text: 2.0.11 Fixed issue with some achievements not triggering properly

description: Alabama Crimson Tide Fight Songs and Ringtones - Officially licensed Experience the explosive power of the Alabama Crimson Tide! Play the top Alabama fight songs whenever & as LOUD as you want. Includes MUSIC & LYRICS for “Yeah Alabama”, “Bammy Bound Cheer”, “Roll Tide Cheer”, “Alabama Alma Mater” & top Alabama logos. Four top Alabama fight songs for one price that can be also be downloaded as ringtones. It’s like bringing the band & cheerleaders with you! Great for GAMEDAY parties, NCAA Football, NCAA Basketball, Bowl Games, March Madness, college tail gating and taunting rivals. Application includes songs lyrics or traditions for: Yeah Alabama Bammy Bound Cheer Roll Tide Cheer Alabama Alma Mater ROLL TIDE!
release_text: Tones, Ringtones and Lyrics for top Alabama Fight Songs: Yeah Alabama Bammy Bound Cheer Roll Tide Cheer Alabama Alma Mater

description: Swipe, poke and tap to command an army of Vikings in their quest to create the ultimate BBQ sauce, lead the Aztecs in defense of the Holy Pepper and build an array of explosive Chinese toys! Build your own forces and defeat your foes using berserkers, dart blowers, giant boulders, ninja monkeys (yes, we really mean it – ninja monkeys!) and many more! Swords and Soldiers Highlights • Hilarious characters and storyline mean you'll be playing with one huge grin. • Command hordes of Vikings, Aztecs and Chinese warriors, each with their own unique skills. • Three epic campaigns with unique challenges to keep you entertained for hours. • Fully customizable Skirmish mode means endless replayability. • Hours of gameplay with achievements, challenges and leaderboards.

Assalamualaikum wr wb Aplikasi Al Quran yang menarik asli buatan Indonesia, dengan begitu banyak fitur yang akan membantu saudara semua dalam membaca serta menghafalkan Al Quran Fitur My Quran 1. Desain yang indah 2. Selalu menyimpan surah terakhir yang dibaca agar dengan mudah melanjutkannya 3. Fungsi Pencarian 4. Kumpulan Doa dalam Al Quran 5. Penanda Buku 6. Ayat Sajdah 7. Tampilan Per Halaman 8. Membaca Al Quran - Pinch to zoom - Suara Qori yang banyak - Terjemahan yang banyak - Tajwid berwarna - Huruf Latin - Swipe dengan 2 jari untuk pindah halaman - Audio Player yang bagus - Bagikan ke Media Sosial - Copy Quran Text - Tampilan FullScreen 9. Tugas untuk mengkhatamkan Al Quran 10. Tugas untuk menghafal Al Quran 11. Asmaul Husna 12. Schedule/Alarm untuk mengingatkan saatnya membaca Al Quran 13. Makhraj Dengan aplikasi yang indah ini, kami harap kita dapat menerima manfaat yang besar agar semakin cinta kepada Al Quran Dukung kami dengan menggunakan versi infaq agar dapat mengembangkan aplikasi ini seterusnya. Beda versi LITE dan versi INFAQ LITE : - Tajwid : Al-Fatihah dan Al-Baqarah - Download Suara Reciter : Al Fatihah, Al Falaq, Al Ikhlas dan An Naas - Bookmark : 5 - Hafalan : 5 dan tidak bisa dihapus - Khatam : 30 hari, tidak dapat diubah - Alarm : 1 INFAQ : - Tajwid : Semua Surah - Download Suara Reciter : Semua Surah - Bookmark : tidak dibatasi - Hafalan : tidak dibatasi dan bisa dihapus - Khatam : dapat disesuaikan harinya - Alarm : tidak dibatasi Wassalamualaikum wr wb =========================================== the WALi studio merupakan pengembang aplikasi Islami di Indonesia. Aplikasi islam yang dikembangkan cukup sukses di market android, iOS, WP8 dan BB10. Aplikasi islam terbaik dari the WALi studio diantaranya adalah MyQuran Indonesia dan Muslim Daily. Hubungi : support@thewalistudio.com Kunjungi website kami di http://www.thewalistudio.com ===========================================

description: Tycoon SMB (Small & Medium Business) is a comprehensive INVOICE / RETAIL BILLING / POS application incorporating "Best in Trade" practices specially for Individual run businesses, service producers, utility,corner moving shops,Line salesman, Route sales,Hawkers,Distributors Line/Field/Route Sales etc. App will handle Billing/Invoicing,Sales Order & management, customers ,out standing/credit/receivables & dynamic stock management. Multiple bill printing options allows you to print invoices on most network enabled printers, selected blue tooth printers or mail a PDF or just send an SMS invoice. Multiple report options Sales, Cash Receipts, Expenses, Stock, Profits, Tax reports, Expenses, Withdrawals , Day End Reports allows you to control & mange your business in a professional manner. App works completely in stand alone/offline mode. That means no fear of keeping your business/confidential data at strangers server. In Summary - The app running on Android allows you to manage your small shop/business/line sales on the palm of your hand. We are enhancing this app for more features as per your suggestions. Please involve with us. Unique Features: i. NO INTERNET: To generate & view PDF bills, recpts & sales orders, all reports in XLS. ii. Sales MARKUP & PROFIT Margins. iii. Sales PROMOTIONS - Discounts & Offers on Sales Criteria/Target Sales. iv. DISCOUNTS: Sales Volume,Value & Flat Discounts, Disc in %, amnt/cash back & Validity. v. OFFERS: Free Item,Same,Other Items Offers & Validity. vi. Integrated with PrinterShare (Third Party App @ Play Store supports printing on HP, Epson, Canon, Brother, Samsung, Kodak, Dell, Lexmark & other printers including legacy networkable) to print Bills & Recpts using your existing LAN/WiFi/Bluetooth/CLOUD Printer. vii.THERMAL Mobile PRINTER: Portable printers to print your vouchers instantly. 1. EPSON's 2'' (TM-60II) & 3" (TM-P80) mini thermal portables. 2. TYCOON's low cost thermal portable printers (In India). vii. Book Expenses & Payments. viii.Profit/Loss and Day/Month Summary/Closer Reports. Functionalities:- i. Billing. ii. Routes/Beat & Customers Mgmt(Export/Import by XLS). iii. Category & Items Mgmt(Export/Import by XLS). iv. Tax, Sales Orders,Invoices & Receipts Mgmt. v. Dynamic Stock Mgmt. vi. Outstanding Credit & Bills Mgmt. vii. Sales Promotions - Discounts & Mgmt. viii. Expenses & Withdrawals Mgmt. ix. Reports - Sales,Stock,Bills,Recpts,Tax,Sales Review,Profit & loss... x. PDF Bills & Recpts – Generate, Preview & Mail direct to customers. xi. Customize PDF bills & recpts with your business logo, signature, company seal & header/footers. Utilities: i. SMS - Bills&Receipts. ii. Setup - XLS import of Customers,Categories,Commodities&Stock. iii. Data Mgmt- Backup &Restore. iv. Thermal prints of Bills & Receipts - Using Tycoon & Epson's mobile thermal printers. v. Counter Sales - Billing & Receipts. vi. Tax registrations, Customer Tax Registration IDs. vii. Maintain your own voucher num sequence & formats. Viii. XLS Reports - Generate, View , Mail & Print. ix. Stock Alerts, No Stock, Low Stock reports. x. Performance Reports- Average Lines Cut (ALC),Average Bill Value (ABV) & Unique Customers Billed & Not Billed in the period. Customer purchase patterns. Time taken to Bill, Average Bill Time & More. Support: Tycoon SMB-Call Center on +91-9035000033 (Mon - Sat 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM IST) Email - support@tycoontech.com Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/TycoonPos NOTE: 1. We assure the best performance on the devices 2.3 & above. 2. We provide excellent support & fix things quickly. Contact support first before leaving bad reviews.
release_text: 1) 3 Inch thermal printer support. 2) More Reports. 3) Issue fixes.

description: "ZombieBooth2" is the sequel to the successful zombie transform app that was downloaded 20 million times. It turns your face into a 3D animated zombie. Scare your friends or even yourself! Features: - Stunning special effects for zombie looks just like Hollywood professionals. - Tons of zombie parts available with thousands of combinations. - Realistic zombie behavior, such as breathing or growling. - Interactive experience. Drag to follow your finger with eyes. Tap to bend the zombie's head backwards (Watch out! The zombie will gnaw your finger off if you get too close!) - Share zombie images via Twitter, Facebook, etc. - Share movies. (Requires Android 4.3 or over) WARNING: Parental guidance is advised. "ZombieBooth 2" contains horror content that many will not find suitable for young children.

description: ★ 전설의 블레이더들이 펼치는 치열한 배틀이 시작된다!★ ★ 투니버스,일본 TV도쿄 인기 방영작 '메탈 베이블레이드 4D'오픈 ★ 4D 전편수록 (1~39편) 3편 무료제공!! 세상을 정복하려는 어둠의 세력과 어둠의 세력을 막기 위해 나타난 별의 힘을 지닌 10명의 블레이더들의 치열한 배틀이 지금 시작된다!! ♥ 오픈기념 이벤트 ♥ 1편을 무료로 제공해 드립니다. (1화 FREE) 메탈 블레이드 마니아들 모여라! 명품리뷰를 남겨주세요! (2화 FREE) 카카오 이벤트에 참여해주세요!! (15화 FREE) ==================================== ★ 캐릭터 소개 ★ 강타 배틀을 좋아하고 대결을 두려워하지 않는다. 보다 강해지기 위하여 블레이더를 찾아 여행을 다닌다. 상대가 강해지면 강할수록 더욱 불타 오르는, 전통적인 열혈 베이 블레이더! 태사자 화나면 물,불 안가리는 성격의 블레이더로서 뛰어난 자질을 가지고 있다. 의리를 지킬 줄 아는 쿨한 성격의 소유자이다. 노아 베이 블레이드를 너무 좋아하고 블레이더로서의 경험은 많지 않지만 열점만은 남의 두배. 제시카 배틀은 하지 않지만, 베이 블레이드의 지식이 풍부하다. 베이 블레이드 전략가로써 강타, 노아와 행동을 같이 한다. 다크 문 암흑 성운(다크네퓨라)의 간부, 그 조직의 목적은 수수께끼. 백두산 페이스 헌터즈의 멤버. 황소처럼 우직한 성격의 소유자이지만 사람들을 좋아하고 남의 일을 잘 도와준다. 구 성 [story1] 1화 별의 조각 (FREE) 2화 전설의 블레이더! (EVENT) 3화 도둑고양이 링크스! 4화 엘드라고 디스트로이 5화 깨어난 아누비우스! 6화 전사의 자격! 7화 노아의 결심! 8화 진홍빛 섬광! 9화 최강 태그전, 등용문! 10화 새로운 울부짖음! 11화 빅뱅 토네이도! 12화 토성의 신, 크로노스! 13화 대결, 바벨의 탑! 14화 신생! 던전 팀 [story2] 15화 스피어 360 (EVENT) 16화 완성! 새로운 유니콘! 17화 내가 바로 챔피언! 18화 미스트 마운틴의 미궁! 19화 사자의 자존심! 20화 신전의 수호자 듀나미스! 21화 네메시스 부활의 전설! 22화 사계의 전사! 23화 베이스타 섬의 대결! 24화 운명을 건 대결! 25화 보이지 않는 블레이더! 26화 오리온의 행방 27화 황야를 달리는 사자 [story3] 28화 금성의 신! 케찰코아틀 29화 파괴의 신 부활!? 30화 네메시스의 숭배자 31화 네 개의 마음! 32화 집결! 전설의 블레이더 33화 디아블로 네메시스 34화 결전의 땅! 35화 잃어버린 왕국 36화 사라진 사계의 별자리 37화 플래시 사지타리오! 38화 하데스의 집념 39화 희망의 빛! 구매복원 : 앱을 재설치하거나 단말기를 교환해도 문제없어요! 구입한 내역 복원가능 구매잠금 : 실수로 잘못 구매하는것을 방지!! 푸시알림 : ON으로 설정하실 경우 유용한 정보를 받아 보실 수 있습니다. game ini menggambarkan seorang anak kecil terinspirasi oleh film Superman yang baru saja ditontonnya. Ia sangat ingin untuk dapat terbang seperti Superman. Untuk mewujudkan keinginannya dia menggunakan kentutnya sebagai daya dorong untuk terbang, karena kentut yang ia hasilkan dapat membuatnya terbang. Semakin lama atau besar kentut si anak tersebut, maka akan semakin jauh terbangnya. Tujuan Game ini adalah untuk membantu anak kecil menggapai cita-citanya yaitu menjadi Superman, namun karena tidak bisa terbang seperti layaknya Superman, maka ia menggunakan kentutnya untuk dapat terbang. Untuk dapat mengeluarkan kentutnya ia harus memakan makanan yang dapat merangsang kentutnya. Selama terbang si anak akan menjumpai halangan-halangan seperti mobil ketika terbang. Ia harus menghindari halangan-halangan tersebut, karena jika menabrak ia akan jatuh. Selain itu, selama terbang si bayi juga dapat menemui makanan-makanan yang dapat diambil seperti, singkong, pete, jengkol untuk menambah bar kentut. This game depicts a little boy who was inspired by the movie Superman had just watched. He really wanted to be able to fly like Superman. To realize her desire to use farts as the impetus to fly, because he made a fart can make it fly. The longer the big fart or the child, the more distant flight. The objective of this game is to help young children reach his goal is to be Superman, but because they can not fly like Superman, then he can use to fly farts. To be issued farts he should eat foods that can stimulate farts. During flight the child will encounter obstacles such as a car when flying. He must avoid the obstacles, because if it hit it will fall. In addition, during flight can also see baby foods that can be taken, such as cassava, banana, jengkol to add bar fart.

**This is a plug-in. It requires the user to have "Locale" installed from the Android Market.** Send automated SMS messages based on any condition in "Locale." For example, send a text message automatically when you reach a location. The plug-in also gives the user the option to add the sent message to the "Messages" app on the device.

Überall bestens über Unwetter informiert sein - die kostenlose Österreichische Unwetterzentrale (UWZ) App jetzt für Ihr Android Smartphone! Ab jetzt können Sie das Service der Österreichischen Unwetterzentrale ( www.uwz.at ) auch über Ihr Android Smartphone nutzen. Mit dieser Unwetter App werden Sie jetzt auch unterwegs mittels Alarm sofort über ein auftretendes Unwetter in Ihrer Nähe informiert. FEATURES √  Aktuelle Unwetterlage in Österreich: Die kostenlose UWZ App bietet Ihnen übersichtliche Karten von ganz Österreich und den einzelnen Bundesländern. Unwetter sind in den Warnstufen Gelb bis Violett eindeutig erkennbar eingezeichnet. √  Individuelle Ortssuche: Mit der neuen UWZ App können Sie bequem und einfach Unwetterinformationen für jeden beliebigen Ort in Österreich abfragen, wie zum Beispiel: Wien, Graz, Salzburg, Innsbruck, Linz, St. Pölten, Bregenz, ... √  Favoriten: Legen Sie zwei beliebige Orte als Ihre Favoriten fest, um besonders schnell und unkompliziert über die aktuellste Unwetterlage informiert zu werden.  √  Unwetterinformationen für Ihren aktuellen Standort: Lassen Sie Ihren Standort mittels GPS bestimmen und bekommen Sie eine punktgenaue Unwetterwarnung für Ihren aktuellen Aufenthaltsort. √  Usermeldungen: Wie auf der Website können Sie auch via Android App Ihre Unwetterbeobachtungen mit der Community teilen. Eigene Fotos von Unwetterereignissen können jetzt einfach und bequem mittels der App hochgeladen werden. √ Push-Funktion: Ab sofort bekommen Sie für einen von Ihnen gewählten Ort auch Push-Nachrichten auf Ihr Android Smartphone. √ Social: Folgen Sie uns auch auf Facebook, Instagram und Twitter um spannende Blogbeiträge rund um die Themen Wetter und Unwetter zu erhalten. Description: Five (5) games in 1. Easy to play but highly addictive. Click on the screen and hold it down to move the candy cane left and right to crash the falling candies from hitting the bottom of the screen. Game Play: ★ Wave level – move the candy cane left and right to smash the candies. Candies come down faster and faster as the game progresses. As soon as a Red candy goes off of the bottom the screen, your game ends. ★ Spread level – same as the Wave level except each subsequent candy is 1 to 3 candies apart from the prior candy. ★ Random level – same as the Wave level except each candy can appear anywhere. ★ Skip level – hit only the Red candy and miss the Blue candy. Game ends when you either hit a Blue candy or a Red candy goes off of the bottom of the screen. ★ Rainbow level – each row will have one (1) Red candy and 2 other colored candies. Move the small candy cane so it only hits the Red candies while making sure to miss all other colored candies. Game ends when either a Red candy goes off of the bottom of the screen or you hit a non-Red candy. Compete against your friends and family. See who has the highest score! Have fun!

Uni Tarot is unique app that unifies 8 wonderful decks and 15 spreads. This app is useful for beginners and professionals. Everyone will find something interesting. Tarot is not just a fortune teller. It is an opportunity for a fresh look at your problems, reveal previously unseen aspects of your life, it is work with yourself. Try it and you will not regret. Your life will certainly begin to change for the better! Features: - Multiple Decks Tarot: -- Rider-Waite-Smith Tarot -- Soprafino Tarot -- Tarot of Giovanni Vacchetta -- Tarot of Marseilles -- 1JJ Swiss Tarot -- Grand Etteilla Tarot -- Grand Jeu de l'Oracle des Dames (Etteilla III) -- Sola Busca Tarot - Decks can be downloaded separately on your choice - Import and edit your own decks, include nonstandard decks (22 card, 79 cards and more) - Easy way to compare cards from multiple decks simultaneously - Handy Reference / Encyclopedia of Tarot - For each card information is provided in many aspects: Astrology, Numerology, Elements, Colors, Esoteric Title, Intelligence, correspondence in the Hebrew alphabet, position in Kabbalistic tree of life and many more - Card meaning by Rider-Waite, A. E. Thierens, P. D. Ouspensky - Full screen mode (long press or pinch a card) - All Cards in HD quality - 15 spreads with detailed description for every position - Optional Significator - Draw 3 extra cards to any spread - User own comments for cards and spreads - Save spreads - Send spreads to friends via email and export to other devices - Share spreads on facebook and twitter - Optional notification for Card of Day - Card of the Day resizable Widget - Search card by name - Organize spreads in folders - Customize background (15 colors + 17 textures) - Visual shuffling deck and choosing cards - Screen rotation support - Tablet support Spreads: - Single Card - Three Cards (Past, Present, Future) - Relationship - Five Cards (Diamond) - Celtic Cross - Horseshoe - This Week - The Mirror - The Pentagram - The Hexagram - The Mandala - Tree of Life - The Key - The Ankh - The Chariot VIP Features: - Create and edit your own customized spreads - Enter your real spreads to save and share - Extra deck - Import decks is unlimited - Install your own backgrounds - No Ads Troubleshooting: - To enable Widget and reliable Card of Day notifications the app must be moved to internal storage - If app crashes on launch, make sure SD card is accessible and not mounted to PC via USB Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/Uni.Tarot.Android

description: *** Fully functional version *** This is a learning application for kids. This app helps the kids to learn alphabets, mathematics, opposite words, drawing etc. *** GO GREEN: Save paper & use this app *** In order to replicate the classroom, the app screen is divided into two sections; board section (teachers) and notepad section (students). Features: 1. Alphabets: Learn and write the alphabets and words. This app recognizes the character written and verifies (BETA). 2. Mathematics: Unique and randomly generated mathematics operations. Has 3 difficulties and 4 levels in each difficulty. 3. Opposites: This app comes with over 100 opposite words to learn. Kids can either write the answer with finger or drag and drop the correct answer. 4. Quiz: This app comes with more than 100 quiz questions on alphabets, animals, numbers, rhymes, days, months etc. Each time a set of 10 random questions are displayed. At the end of the quiz, you can see the score and verify the answer. 5. Drawing: Comes with different images for the kid to fill the color or connect the dots. Kid can also use for drawing purpose and later save the image. 6. Feedback: This app comes with a in-app-feedback, where you can get in touch with us from the app and get quick reply from us. Note: This is still in BETA stage, you can provide your comments, suggestions through "Contact Us" option from the application.

ЖД билеты – первое приложение для покупки железнодорожных билетов. Заказывайте билет на поезд в своем смартфоне, оплачивайте заказ банковской картой, проходите электронную регистрацию прямо в мобильном приложении! Воспользовавшись электронной регистрацией, вы можете пройти на посадку, предъявив проводнику паспорт и распечатанный электронный ЖД билет. Контрольный купон, который входит в состав электронного билета, является отчетным документом для бухгалтерии в случае командировки. Билеты в мобильном приложении «ЖД Билеты» реализуются от лица компании ООО «УФС», официального агента ОАО «РЖД» по продаже электронных железнодорожных билетов. Ценообразование в мобильном приложении полностью совпадает с ценами на сайте www.ufs-online.ru. ООО «УФС» работает на рынке более 10 лет, и использует торговую марку РЖД в мобильном приложении на основании официального лицензионного договора. Приложение прошло тестирование в ОАО «Научно-Исследовательский институт Железнодорожного Транспорта» (ВНИИЖТ), и одобрено в качестве полноценного канала продажи электронных билетов на поезда отечественных железнодорожных перевозчиков. Train tickets - the first application for the purchase of railway tickets. Book a train ticket to your phone, pay for your order by credit card, go through the electronic registration directly in a mobile application! By using the online registration, you can go through the gate conductor presenting a passport and a printed electronic railway ticket. Control coupon, which is part of the e-ticket is reporting documents for accounting in the case of a business trip. Tickets for the mobile application "Train Tickets" are implemented on behalf of the company "UFS", the official agent of JSC "Russian Railways" selling electronic railway tickets. Pricing in a mobile application is identical to the prices on the site www.ufs-online.ru. Ltd. "UFS" on the market for over 10 years and uses the trademark Railways in a mobile application on the basis of an official license agreement. The application has been tested in the "Scientific-Research Institute of Railway Transport" (VNIIZhT), and is approved as a full-fledged sales channel for e-tickets for train domestic rail carriers.

description: Experience the fun of power-saving by this ""Energy Saver"" app. One touch to turn the energy-saving mode ON/OFF. When the battery is low, press the ""Energy Saving"" button to start energy-saving mode. In this mode, WIFI, Bluetooth, GPS locator, background lights, mute/vibration mode and synchronization will be turned OFF so that to achieve the goal of energy-saving easily. To minimize the battery consumption in the simplest operation and enjoy your life with the smartphone in the longest time! ! * ""One-touch recovery"", touch the ""Energy Saving"" button, you can easily turn ON/OFF energy-saving mode. When exiting the energy-saving mode, the phone will be restored to the state before the energy-saving mode is turned on. ■ Function * Display the remaining battery. * Batch manage the settings of WIFI, Bluetooth, orientation measurement GPS, backlight, sound mode and synchronization, energy-saving can be easily achieved. * Customize the saving mode. * Through the rational use of battery, you can monitor the status of smartphone battery better. * Three kinds of unique templates. * The two different kinds of widget styles. No need to start the app, simply touch the button on the desktop, energy-saving mode will be started immediately. * The energy-saving mode will automatically turn ON when the energy remains 20%.

This application is a mental arithmetic game which lets you do some maths with fun. Rules of the game Six numbers are randomly chosen among 24 numbers distributed as follows: All numbers from 1 to 10 appear twice. Number 25 appears once. Number 50 appears once. Number 75 appears once. Number 100 appears once. Another number is chosen between 100 and 999. You must find this number by combining the others with arithmetic operations : addition, substraction, multiplication and division. Divisions are not allowed when the result in not an integer and substractions must have a positive result. Each number from the six must be used only once but it is not mandatory to use all of them. This application solves any submitted problem and lets you train with randomly chosen problems. Example Number to find: 699 Available numbers: 3, 5, 7, 8, 10, 100 Solution: 100 x 7 = 700 700 - 8 = 692 692 + 10 = 702 702 - 3 = 699

Invest internationally with ease and confidence. With the TD International app you will gain access to an international investment platform serving thousands of international and expatriate investors, and offering the services and safety of a solid Luxembourg-based bank. Stay in touch with your investments - Monitor your accounts and balances in each currency - See a detailed breakdown of your portfolio, current holdings, market value, change on the day and overall gain/loss. Trade stocks and invest - Get quotes on international stocks and ETFs and view charts. - Place your orders on stocks, ETFs, or investment funds. - Monitor your orders status or cancel limit orders that haven’t been executed. - Create and monitor watch list You don’t have to be an TD Direct Investing International client to use this app. Everyone can get stock quotes, chart stocks and manage watch list. Quotes are delayed by 15 minutes if you are not logged into your account. Clients, when logged in, have the ability to monitor their accounts, place stock trades, and have access to free real-time quotes. If you are not already a client, please visit www.tddirectinvesting.luto apply for an account. Safety and Security Your personal information is securely, 128-bit encrypted. Enter your account number, PIN, and 4 random characters from your password to access your account. Device Requirements This app will run on any device running a Google Android operating system of 2.3or above. About TD Direct Investing International: TD Direct Investing International is an offshore bank based in Luxembourg and specifically dedicated to international and expatriate investors. Access Stocks, CFDs, Futures and Forex trading on 17 exchanges worldwide. Manage your money conveniently with our Multi-Currency Accounts. And take advantage of our 0% entry-fee investment funds. TD Direct Investing International is owned by TD Bank Group, one of the world’s largest banks. Important Information: The value of investments and their income may fall or rise; you may not get back all you invested and you may lose more than your invested capital.

description: **ON SALE for $9.99 (regular price: $14.95)!** Xtralogic Remote Desktop Client for Android enables you to connect to your Windows computers across the Internet from a mobile device powered by Google Android platform. Once connected, it gives you mouse and keyboard control over your computer while showing you everything that's happening on the screen. You can leave your computer without losing access to your files, applications, and e-mail. Xtralogic Remote Desktop Client can connect using Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) or VNC protocol. For RDP protocol all the necessary server components are already part of most versions of the Windows operating system (except Home varieties). Features: •RemoteFX graphics support •VNC protocol support •Support for Windows 8 Multi-Touch remoting (a.k.a. Metro) •Simple Connect (eliminates the need for configuring port forwarding on a network router) •Custom screen resolutions, including an option to automatically fit to the device screen •Secure network communication protected by SSL/TLS •Network Level Authentication (NLA) with CredSSP •Microsoft Remote Desktop Gateway(RD Gateway) support •RemoteApp programs support •On-screen keyboard for keys missing on the device (functional keys, etc.) •Server address book •Master password to secure server password storage •Audio redirection to the client from a remote computer •Microphone redirection from the client to a remote computer •File transfer between SD card and remote computer •Copy/paste text between client and server •Display zoom in/zoom out •Pinch-to-zoom •Support for Microsoft Remote Assistance •RDP data compression and caching to save bandwidth •Android home screen shortcuts •Automatic activation of a software keyboard in text fields •Support for international keyboard layouts •Support for multitasking: switch to other apps without disconnecting •Support for a physical keyboard (a keyboard connected over Bluetooth or USB) •Physical mouse support: drag and drop with a single mouse click, mouse wheel, all three mouse buttons are supported (some features require Ice Cream Sandwich) •Export/import the server address book and app settings to/from SD card •Support for importing server settings from .rdp and XML files •Multi-touch gestures for scrolling, mouse buttons emulation •API for third party apps to establish RDP connection

Celtic Tribes - Real-time strategy for true chiefs Peaceful settlers as well as the battle hungry conquerors will have lots of fun in this epic MMO. You decide whether you expand your realm peacefully or using your military expertise in glorious battles! Features: - Free to play - Build your village into a large city - Recruit a mighty army and fight against thousands of other tribal leaders - Collect and combine several secret artefacts and utilize their power - Use the magic of mysterious druids and let your enemies freeze in fear - Produce crucial resources and become wealthy through trading - Prove your strategic skills in conquering and defending the villages  - Join forces with other chiefs in powerful tribes - Perform exciting missions with special rewards - Relive the age of the Celts and the beautifully designed graphics of Celtic Tribes “Better than Vikings, the Age of Empires and Ikariam put together!” “This is like Asterix with proper battles and as a strategy game!” “The opportunities in the game, the cohesion of the tribes are simply unique!” From a village to an empire You start off with a small Celtic village in the green lands of Gaul. But do not get fooled - the beautiful land is anything but peaceful and the war is coming. The other tribes already have their eyes on your village. Some are looking for a new conquest, some search for a new trading partner and others simply want to welcome you in their tribe. Strategy is crucial Your Celtic village can only survive if you raise an army and get ready for battle. War is known as an alternative means of diplomacy and you are not the only chief aiming to establish an empire. It is only by working together with your tribe, can you ensure the success of your conquests and win the war for the throne. Use the Magic Magic runes support your army in battle. Your druids do not only reside in your village. They can also use the power of ancient magic to help you. The power of the tribes Your tribe can rule the world! Unite your armies and let all of Gaul tremble. No battle is too great, no conquest is impossible. Work together and every empire will contribute to creating your realm. The throne of the world Create a throne and rule over the world in the ancient age of the Celts. You will need the support of your tribe, a powerful army and fierce determination of a true leader. The support of your druids and their magic will not hurt either. Download the app for free now and experience exciting adventures in the ancient age in Celtic Tribes - the captivating strategy MMOG. Follow us on Facebook: http://fb.com/CelticTribes Take a look at the rest of our free to play games: - Incoming! Goblins Attack — Tower Defense Game - Lords & Knights – Medieval MMO strategy - Crazy Tribes – Post apocalyptic MMO strategy - Lords of Blood – Vampire RPG Celtic Tribes requires an active internet connection.

Classic Highway Car Avoidance– A New Entrant in the Car Games and Racing Games Market Car games and racing games are known to be addictive games where players get a high adrenaline rush. The newest and trendiest among the various games is here and it is the Car Racing Game. There are numerous racing games in the market, but among the many different games, this one stands out because it is a native Android Car Racing Game. In this game, the player has to tilt the device and move from side to side to avoid vehicles coming their way. Players also get extra points if they can catch the included checkpoints along with various boosts. Racing Games and Car Games in the Age of Mobile Phones Car games and racing games have always been a hot favorite with game players. Though some people think that playing games is nothing but a total waste of time, games addicts beg to differ. For them playing games – whether it is on desktops, laptops, mobile phones or even on old fashioned games consoles, is a way to unwind after a hard day’s work. For some, it is like a quick break in the midst of heavy and important work, and for others, it is nothing but a great way to pass their idle time. Whatever the reason for playing racing games, they just cannot be ignored; especially in this age of Smartphones where ‘on the go’ game playing is just a touch away! Mobile phones come with inbuilt games options where you can play a lot of exciting games. On top of that, many Smartphones makers are preloading car games and racing games apps for free beforehand and installing them in their Smartphones. So, buyers do not have to look for any car games online as they may be present in their phone. If there are any car games and racing games which you want to play that are not present on your phone, do not despair. You can get virtually any game of your choice with the help of an internet connection on your mobile phone. Just go to any good application store and download the game you want to play. Most of the time, you may not even have to pay anything, though many games require that there should be active internet connectivity on your mobile phone. There are many exciting and interesting car games and racing games in the market right now. Different games have a different way in which they are played. Some are played by pressing different buttons if the mobile phone has a keypad. If you are using a touch screen mobile phone or Smartphone then you can play various car games and racing games by tilting the device to the left or right to negotiate the path you car moves on. Different games have different themes. In some of the racing games you are required to run your car through a zigzag path without crashing into the sides. In some games you compete against other cars through tough roads and obstacles to reach the finish line to become the winner. In some games there are explosions on the road and other obstacles that are designed to make these car games and racing games even more tough and interesting. You have to cross rickety bridges and cross gaps without falling into them to finish many of these car games and racing games. The images and graphics are so advanced that you feel that it is really you in the driving seat of the car going through all the adventures. And when you come out on top as a winner in these car games, it gives you a nice rush and makes you feel like you’ve accomplished something big.

Do you want to spend your time in an interesting and useful manner for the development of your logical thinking? Are you eager to test your wits in a battle with a strong contender and taste the victory? Do you want to spend your time in playing the game which was favorite of Napoleon Bonaparte, Leo Tolstoy and other great figures of the world? Then checkers are what you need! Checkers is a game of all times, a kind of sport in which the best minds in the world compete, and a wonderful entertainment, which is useful for the development of mental abilities. This is a funny game, available for all. Download this game to your mobile phone, and you will not have a question what to do with your spare moment. You can play either with the computer or with a partner making moves in turn. When playing with the computer, you can choose the level of difficulty. But do not expect that the computer will succumb to you - computer is a worthy opponent to play with, with fun and exciting. And winning in a game with such an opponent is a double pleasure. For the game a board of 8x8 cells is used, 12 checkers for the each player. Checkers must be situated on the dark cells of the first three rows. White checkers start. Simple checkers go one square diagonally forward and can beat only forward. A king goes one square diagonally both forward and back, it can beat to any side, but only over a cell. Beating is a must. In case when there are several ways, the player can choose any of them, not necessarily the one which is longer, but he must pass through it. Playing checkers is not only a fascinating pastime, but also a wonderful training for your mind, which is always useful.

description: The tree house was developed especially for children between the ages of 2 and 5. They can explore and discover four tree houses up in a large tree. Each tree house is designed with plenty of imagination and encompasses games for learning about shapes, colours, polarities (opposites) and a shadow game. High-resolution graphics, beautiful music and language support help to turn these four educational subject matters into a game. The difficulty of the games is also a perfect match for the child’s increasing level of learning. Games for learning about shapes, colours, polarities (opposites) and shadows offer children a fun way of preparing for school. After the tasks have been successfully completed, food is collected which can be fed to the different animals. This motivates the children to successfully overcome further, even more difficult tasks in the tree houses. In the free version, there is one tree house which can be played in free of charge. All other tree houses can be tried out once for one hour at no cost. Main features: • 4 educational learning objectives (theory of colour, geometry, polarities, scientific issues) • The difficulty of the game can be adapted automatically to the child’s level of learning • Language learning support in English, German, French, Spanish and Russian • Getting motivation to learn with a unique reward system • High-quality graphics in HD that are suitable for children Game features: • Shadow game – Find the correct shadow to match an animal • Painting – Go ahead and take a brush and paint on the canvas • Practicing with colours– Question and answer game • Playing with colours – Move the coloured objects into the correct paint buckets • Learning about shapes – Receive an explanation of the selected shape simply by touching it • Practicing shapes – Question and answer game • Sorting shapes – Match objects up to the correct shapes • Looking at opposites – Receive an explanation of a pair of opposites simply by touching it • Playing with opposites – Join the right pair of opposites together • Feed the 3 animals (bear, hare and squirrel) with food The development of „The Tree House“ was funded by nordmedia – Film- und Mediengesellschaft Niedersachen/Bremen mbH. We at Zaubersee.de specialise in developing children’s games. Our aim here is to introduce children to the mobile world in a way that is both fun and informative. Feel free to write to us with your ideas and suggestions!
release_text: * speech output and texts now available in spanish, french and russia * bugfixes * graphic adaption * speeding up loading time

description: New! Free app from the Ministry of Economy for teens with summer jobs. Employed for the first time? Want to know your rights? For the first time in Israel, all the rights of youth workers are accessible in user -friendly format for easy browsing. Hate calculating hours? No problem! The Time Clock tab allows you to enter your arrival and departure times from work and creates a work- hours and wages report, calculated automatically according to pre-entered settings. Just put your finger on the "digital fingerprint reader" to register and save your work- hours. Saving for something big? It's easy to set a savings goal. There are pre-entered options like vacation, clothing, driving license, and school, or you can set your own personal goal and add a picture. Get a real-time update on how much you've saved, and how many hours of work remain to reach your savings goal. The information gathered is presented as a monthly/weekly/daily report, and can be sent by e-mail. The app is free to use and recommended for every teen. Send a link to your friends on Facebook and Twitter from the "more" tab. Contact us Send us your comments and questions and the Ministry will help you get your rights at work. description: Все задачи и дела не удержать в голове? Установите приложение «Мой органайзер» и стройте грандиозные планы! Give your affairs in order: take notes, put the problem, set reminders and customize alerts. - Calendar for the entire month - Includes calendars: athletic, professional holiday Holidays - Free horoscope for today, tomorrow and the day after - Current weather forecast for a few days in advance - User friendly interface creating a task only a few tapov - Set reminders and task categories - you will always be clearly understood that remains to be done and what needs your attention - If you have a constant weekly task, you can automate the process of installing it on as many weeks in advance, how much you need - Notes - Remind you of birthdays of friends and contacts sots.setey Odnoklassniki and Vkontakte - Sync calendar Google (if Google Calendar is synchronized with Exchange, you will be notified to the Exchange directly into organizer) - You can change the background tape problems, as well as choose from hundreds of tunes reminders to fully customize the app for yourself - The application contains a widget of the agenda, as well as the widget to create tasks directly from the screen of the phone without opening the application. Especially for sports fans we have added a sports calendar: you can follow the schedule of the games of their favorite team in your smartphone. Calendar includes the schedule of matches in football, hockey, basketball, volleyball!

Angry Veggies: Rush Hour - introducing a fun and cute logic game! Angry Veggies is a classic sliding block traffic jam puzzle, in a cute setting, with veggies and bunnies. The little Bunny wants to eat really much... He's been hungry all day and finally found a place where he can eat one small carrot... Suddenly he's surrounded by Angry Veggies: they won't let him eat one small carrot because they believe it belongs to them... Save the Bunny! Help him escape the Angry Veggies! Unblock the Bunny's way and let him eat! Meet the Bunny and Angry Veggies in a cute and challenging Rush Hour game - a great logic brain teaser, sliding block puzzle game. HOW TO PLAY - Help the Bunny reach the exit: slide the Angry Veggies around him and free the way out - Try to make less moves, to get more stars - Progress through the levels, unlock new ones, solve all sliding block puzzles - Feed the hungry Bunny! Enjoy this great puzzle game! Have fun and check your logic in this free fun game! This free rush hour game is suitable for all ages, your kids will love it, one of the greatest puzzles for kids! It's a game for girls, for boys, their moms and dads. Rush Hour is considered to be one of the best puzzles for kids, very good for early development! Rush Hour is the classics of all sliding block puzzles and will bring you a lot of joy. It's much more fun to play this game with veggies than any similar car parking game or traffic jam game. If you like games like Unblock Car, Traffic Rush, Unblock Me Free, Move It Free, Puzzle Retreat, Angry Birds and others - you will like Angry Veggies: Rush Hour as well.

description: Insonning Yerdagi umri mobaynida amalga oshiradigan ishlari nimalardan iborat? O‘z Taqdiri yo‘lidan borib, ko‘ngliga tukkan orzu-umidlarini amalga oshirishi uchun insonga eng zarur narsa nima?.. “Alkimyogar” romani mana shunday ko‘lamli, mazmunan falsafiy, mohiyatan esa oddiy insoniy muammo haqida. Asar muallifi— hozirgi zamonning mashhur yozuvchisi braziliyalik Paulo Koelo. “Alkimyogar” Richard Baxning “Oqcharloq Jonatan” yoki “Sharpalar” asarlariga o‘xshamaydi. Ekzyuperining “Kichik Shahzoda”siga ham o‘xshash tomonlari juda kam. Biroq negadir “Alkimyogar”ni o‘qiganda beixtiyor o‘sha rivoyat-qissalar yodga tushadi. Zotan, bu asar aynan hozirgi zamon kitobxonlari uchun yozilgandek va “Alkimyogar”ning turli davlatlar arboblariyu, mashhur san’atkorlar hamda hozircha bir yuz o‘n yetti mamlakatdagi millionlab adabiyot muxlislari tomonidan sevib o‘qilishi shundan dalolatdir. “Bizning sayyoramizda bir buyuk haqiqat barqaror: agar siz chindan nimanidir orzu qilsangiz, unga albatta erishasiz. Zotan, bu orzu Olam Qalbida ham tug‘iladi va ayni shuning o‘zi sizning Yerda mavjudligingiz tasdiqi, sizning taqdiringizdir”, deb yozadi P. Koelo. Ushbu elektron kitobga Paulo Koeloning «Alkimyogar» romani kirill va lotin alifbolarida joylandi. Elektron kitob www.ziyouz.com tomonidan tayyorlandi. Ushbu kitobdan faqatgina shaxsiy mutolaa maqsadida foydalanish mumkin. Tijoriy maqsadlarda foydalanish (sotish, ko‘paytirish, tarqatish) qonunan taqiqlanadi.

Zoiper is a FREE IAX and SIP softphone application for voip calls over 3G or WiFi. There are NO ADVERTISEMENTS. Zoiper softphone offers a simple user interface and superb audio quality for smooth Voice over IP experience. Available for both SIP and IAX systems, Zoiper is a phone solution perfectly fit for end users, service providers, call centers or any business willing to benefit from VoIP communications. Want to distribute it to your users ? Use the free automatic provisioning system on http://oem.zoiper.com and avoid tedious manual configurations!. IMPORTANT: Zoiper softphone is a standalone client-side software VOIP phone application and is not bundled together with a voip service. To make and receive voip calls using Zoiper, you must subscribe to any SIP or IAX based service provider across the globe. Zoiper's key features include: - Bluetooth support (beta) - Excellent audio quality, even on older devices - Intelligent Latency Reduction - Supports calling over 3G and WIFI - Multiprotocol with SIP and IAX support, compatible with all RFC compliant PBXs - Background / multitasking support - Native dialer integration - Integration with the native android contact list - Speakerphone mute and hold - UDP and TCP transports (use TCP for better battery life!) - Supports g711 (ulaw, alaw), speex, iLBC and gsm codecs - Supports sending of DTMF - DNS SRV - Built-in echo cancellation - STUN support - Change ringtone per account Zoiper is also available as customized branding solutions, please contact us for more information. - devices that are not compatible yet: Samsung Galaxy Pocket S5300 Motorola Razr Warning: using Zoiper as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services. If zoiper does not work with your phone, please contact us at support@zoiper.com and we will try to support your phone in future versions.

description: The best free antivirus. Zoner Mobile Security Tablet version Zoner AntiVirus® is a modern security and anti-virus solution for your device. It provides protection against viruses, dialers, trojans, worms, spyware, adware and other malware as well as phone call and message protection. You can test the antivirus using applications containing the EICAR test file, like Zoner AntiVirus Test. Features provided: * Theft Protection (find and control your missing device) * Installed app protection * On-access and on-demand scan * Phone filtering (block calls and messages) * Parental lock for calls * Permission viewer * Task Manager * Automatic and manual database updates * Home screen widget * Secure messages Theft Protection enables you to remotely control and locate your device via SMS messages. If you have lost it somewhere you can get a location or sound an alarm for people to notice it. If it has been stolen you will be notified when SIM is changed. App protection checks all newly installed applications for malware. You can scan any old installed applications from the menu. On-access protection scans any downloaded files and optionally the whole SD Card when plugged in. Phone filtering provides blocking of unwanted SMS/MMS and also protects you from malicious apps that call paid numbers. As a bonus it provides a parental lock for outgoing calls. Secure messages are encrypted messages that you can send via SMS, email, facebook, twitter, etc. Zoner AntiVirus uses strong encryption to send selected messages in unreadable form. The recipient can read those messages only when he has the right key (password). Languages: العربية, Česky, 中文, Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Bahasa Indonesia, Italiano, 日本語, 한국어, Magyar, Polski, Português (Brasilia), Pусский, Română (by Cristian Drossu), Slovensky, Tiếng Việt (by Tran Thanh Binh), Türkçe (by Saner Apaydın), Yкраї́нська

The poor creeper got lost, help him to find his way home. Traveling through different worlds creeper lost his way back home, help him to build a way between worlds, and to find his home. Craft The Path is a combination of puzzle, logical and construction game placed in the 3D world made from blocks. Your task is to build a way to exit teleport and guide creeper to it. But you have a limited number of resources so decide wisely where you put blocks or where you hit with pickaxe. If you like pixelated graphics and world made from blocks then you definitely should try this game. Craft the path is: - elements of puzzle, logical and construction game, - 3D world in shape of sphere made of blocks - easy to build (touch the screen where you want to set or destroy block) - more than 30 levels of different difficulty

description: Survive four secret scenes to get the mysterious treasure! Complete all levels, and try to get three stars in each level! How to play: - Shoot bubbles to match three or more of the same color - Tap on the transmitter to exchange the position between current and next marble. - Combo and Chain increase score - Use props to help you pass the level. - Upgrade props will make you to be more powerful. Features: - Easy to start,but hard to master gameplay. - Fresh game graphics. - 4 new magic scenes. - Lots of game mode, Score Mode,Jewels Mode,Time Mode! - 100+ addictive and challenging map. - 9 magic props: Back, Pause, Magic, Lighting, Frog,Fire,Bomb,Arrows,Colorful. - Prop Upgrade system. - World Leaderboard. Props: ★ Back Prop -- Pull the marbles back. ★ Pause Prop -- Pause all the marbles ★ Magic Prop -- Destory all the Same-color marlbes. ★ Lighting Prop -- Destroy all the marbles in the line of the lighting. ★ Frog Prop -- Make the marbles to the same color. ★ Fire Prop -- Generate lots of meteors. ★ Bomb Prop -- Destory many marbles. ★ Arrows Prop -- Shoot lots for arrows,Each one could destory one marbles. ★ Colorful Prop -- Make two marbles to the same color. Tips: - For different game mode ,you need achieve different target! - Get more Jewels, you will get more reward coins! - Props are so powerful ,please remember to use them! - Upgrade props, you will be more powerful! Thanks for all dear users! Any suggestion is welcome!

A continental cataclysm triggers the greatest adventure of all for Manny, Diego and Sid. In the wake of these upheavals, Sid reunites with his cantankerous Granny, and the herd encounters a ragtag menagerie of seafaring pirates determined to stop them from returning home.

iStoryTime brings the fun and adventure of Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted to the convenience of your Android device. Featuring genuine character audio narration and vivid images from the motion picture, the app offers parents and their children an extraordinary reading experience packed full of fun with Alex the lion, Marty the zebra, Gloria the hippo, Melman the giraffe and more! Alex, Marty, Gloria and Melman are still fighting to get home to their beloved Big Apple and of course, King Julien, Maurice and the Penguins are all along for the comedic adventure. Their journey takes them through Europe where they find the perfect cover: a traveling circus, which they reinvent - Madagascar style. • Includes genuine character audio from the motion picture series • Includes real images from the movie for an authentic experience • Offers narration options for ease of use Other Favorite Stories: - The Penguins of Madagascar: The Lost Treasure of the Golden Squirrel - Shrek Forever After Movie Storybook - How To Train Your Dragon Movie Storybook - Kung Fu Panda 2 Movie Storybook ===================================== STAY IN TOUCH! Best application in Asia to explore the public transit timetables, plan your trip, and book tickets online – right from your smartphone! The widest-in-class coverage includes Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Brunei, Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam, and Indonesia. Most of the trains, intra-city buses, ferries, low-cost airlines and other means of transportation are available. - Searching 15000+ departures in SEA including the most popular ones to fit your holidays schedule; - Search all direct and connecting routes; - Routing between 5000+ stations - with interchanges; - Trip information: departures, duration, price; - Various secure payment options including PayPal and counter service (7-Eleven); - And much-much more! Usage: - Start typing your departure and arrival stations or provinces in "From" field and pick one from the drop-down list. - Adjust departure date and number of tickets required. - Push the "Find Tickets" button. - Select an appropriate route and click the green button with price to make your reservation. - Select your way of payment. - Here you 1-2-Go! “My Account” section lets you select your preferred language and display currency. “My Trips” stores all the data about your bookings made for your future reference to make your life even more convenient. The system supports Thai, English, German, French, Russian and Chinese languages. Please visit us at Facebook to leave your comments and likes: https://www.facebook.com/one2go.asia

description: ●Description: -Auto redial phone number again and again in a very easy way. -Make your phone automatically hang up with the timer you setting. -Many network carriers offer free calls for first 5, 10, 20, x minutes. This application will help you monitor the time elapsed and manually hang-up the call. ***A few of devices may not work well, please do a simple test before you use. Please check the test steps as following.*** ***So far we found some apps such as power saving or system optimization will cause auto redial work abnormal, so please don't use the kinds of apps with auto redial.*** ●The main features includes: -Auto hang up -Auto redial -Fast redial -Speaker on/off -Vibration alert -Sound alert ●Unique features: -When you run into unknown problem to cause auto hang up fail,this app will trigger a long vibrate for 3 seconds to tell you hang up phone call manually. -When the number your dialed entering voice mail, your have to wait for that longer time till call disconnect and then redial. For this case, you could enable "Enable keep talking button" from Others>Setting>Advanced. Set the proper end up time, then when call is active(that is person answer the call) then double click the yellow icon to prevent call from disconnect. ●How to use this application: -drag first bar to set hang up time -drag second bar to set redial interval -press green button to start auto redial -press red button to stop auto redial ●Simple test steps -set hang up time to 10 seconds. -dial out to your friend -check whether auto end call within 10 seconds. ●Note. -Unable to redial call promptly when meet the voice mail. -Settings/reviews buttons on the top bar can only be used in android version 3.0 or newer. Older version have to click the MENU key to launch these items. -The phone number selection from contact doesn't be supported with Dual SIM phone . ●Support version. Android 2.2 to 4.2 ●Support language. 繁體中文,簡體,日本語,English,русский,Deutsch,العربية

This is the Contemporary English Bible including a "speak aloud" function that will read for you each Holy Bible chapter with a nice, crisp synthetized voice. You can control this "read aloud" function by using the SPEAK ON / OFF button always present over the top right of the Android App. You will be able to follow the holy scriptures while driving, cooking or attending any kind of task that would not allow you to read. The Contemporary English Bible version includes annotations and extended definitions at the end of several chapters, called from each verse in need of clarification, which will help and guide you through your biblical study. Additional inmersion into a complete spiritual guidance is fulfilled by letting you both read and listen to the scriptures. As an added feature, the reading text will self-adjust it's size depending of your phone or tablet's screen size, aiming for an easy, uncluttered, reading experience. Note about the "Read Aloud" function: The speech synthetizer pack may not be installed or configured in your Android device. In this case, we will pop up a message box telling you about the need of installing or configuring the voice function inside your Android Device. You may do so by getting into your Android´s home screen, opening the SYSTEM SETTINGS menu and scrolling down into the Language & Input option. Inside you will find the Text to Speech configuration panel.
Convert Roman Numerals to Decimal and Decimal numbers to Roman Numerals easily.
release_text: * Creation beta version * Roman -> Decimal * Decimal -> Roman * Validation of Roman Numerals * Now the conversion to roman numerals of numbers between 4.000 and 1.000.000 is possible!

Explore London’s best craft beer pubs, breweries and shops in the capital’s leading guide dedicated to craft beer. Maps, listings, reviews and news help you discover London’s fast-growing craft beer scene. Carefully curated, Craft Beer London ensures that you will never drink a bad pint again. New pubs, breweries and shops are regularly added to the app as they open. Craft Beer London features: ★ London’s best craft beer pubs: Including ratings, photos, reviews, location and contact details, beer recommendations and more. ★ London’s leading craft breweries: Reviews, beer recommendations and more for the capital’s leading craft breweries including The Kernel, Meantime, Camden Town Brewery and many more. ★ Shops selling craft beer: Reviews and details of London’s best shops for purchasing craft beer. ★ Map: Perfect for finding the nearest craft beer pubs, shops and breweries, or heading out on a pub crawl. ★ News: All the latest news about London’s craft beer scene, including details about new breweries and pubs opening, background information on the craft beer revolution and more. Find us on Twitter @craftbeerlondon Contact us with feedback at info@bluecrowmedia.com Please note that upon purchase this app is licenced to the email account associated with your Google Play account. If a 'not licenced' message is received, please ensure that the email used to purchase the app is included as an account in the Market app on your device.

You have shipped a parcel and want to know if it has already been delivered? You have received a mail notice at your mail box and have no time to pick it up at the nearest CTT Sales Point? Want to know if you have toll debts and how to pay them? Upgrade your day and access different CTT services available anywhere, anytime. CTT. Ever more present. App functionalities : - Postcodes – Validate addresses and postcodes - Deliveries – Track your parcels and mail in real time and request SIGA service for an undeliverable item. - CTT sales points– Information on CTT post offices and agencies closer to you and the services available. - SIGA request – Re-forward your mail to another address or CTT sales point. - Tolls – Check the tolls amounts in debt and request the MB references to pay.

You can calculate GPA and CGPA on your android by using this application. It includes both subjects and elective subjects with credit for each subject. So you don’t have to remember credit to calculate GPA or CGPA for your semester result. Also you can mail your semester results from your mobile application. description: Pointless hurrying belongs into the past! Is it worthy hurrying for the Tube? Running and hoping there's a train going? Isn't it better to know than to guess? Of course it's always better to know. And just for this case there's a new app for Android! Your smart phone will be a lot smarter now! With just one look you can find out what time the nearest train is and you can easily change the pace and style of your walk. You can see on the first look "what time is the next train" Especially outside rush hours when the train goes sporadically there's always useful to have the information about departures. Furthermore, the Metro app works in the stations and of course you can use it to watch the time in transition points! Got 7 minut, I'm ok! Main features: -specialized application just for Prague metro -works offline, no expensive connection needed -works also without GPS -very smart and easy usable -with widget for faster usage Last data update released (accessible via app's menu): 04-7-2015

100 klasických českých receptů, se kterými už přežijete! Po úspěšném Velkém slovníku cizích slov přicházím s dalším portem z iPhone, tentokráte se strhující kuchařkou od Napoleon Games Jindřicha Rohlíka. Konec studentskému kuchtění, pusťme se do poctivé české kuchyně! Čtěte dále... Originál najdete zde: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ceska-kucharka/id688711480?mt=8 Aplikace obsahuje stovku báječných českých receptů, takových, jaké vařily naše mámy a babičky. Zahrnuje polévky, masová hlavní jídla, bezmasá hlavní jídla, moučníky, přílohy a několik vánočních receptů. Každý recept je navíc uveden ve dvou verzích: v jedné dlouhé (pro ty, kteří vaří recept poprvé nebo vaří poprvé vůbec) a v jedné krátké (pro ty, kteří si recept potřebují jenom připomenout). Dlouhý recept o vašich kuchařských zkušenostech nepředpokládá vůbec nic (snad jedině to, že víte, za který konec se drží pánev). Velmi podrobně je zde vysvětleno vše od množství/váhy potravin, přes délku vaření až po stupně předehřátí trouby. Tak směle do toho! Aplikace nepotřebuje připojení k internetu, všechny recepty máte vždy s sebou! Kromě toho aplikace obsahuje: - nákupní seznam (do něhož přidáváte rovnou z receptu) - statistiky (víte kolikrát jste co vařili a kolik vám vaření zabralo času) - vyhledávání v receptech - oblíbené recepty - kuchařské úspěchy a jejich sdílení s přáteli přes Google Play Games (tzv. achievementy) - možnost zvětšování a zmenšování písma - možnost připisování vlastních poznámek Fórum s podporou: http://androidforum.cz/eska-kucha-ka-t48340.html 100 traditional Czech recipes with which you will survive! After a successful large dictionary of foreign words come to another port of the iPhone, this time with stunning cookbook by Napoleon Games Henry rolls. End kuchtění student, takes on Czech cuisine honest!

description: ** If you have problems with Winamp support, open Winamp settings and check "Control Headset" option. It will work as charm. ** ** Music player setting is only available after you place the widget, not if you run it from launcher. ** Universal music control widget capable of hiding itself while there is no track playing. It is designed to be used with WidgetLocker Lockscreen, however it is possible to use it on your homescreen as well. Supported players: - Stock and modded Android Music (2.3+ with Pro) - Google Music (Pro only) - HTC Music - MusicMOD - PlayerPro - PowerAMP - UberMusic (Fede's Music App; Pro only) - BeyondPod (Pro only) - Experimentally Samsung TouchWiz (Pro only) - Almost any other player (such as doubleTwist, Winamp, Meridian, ³/Cubed, MortPlayer, MIUI, Zimly, Songbird, Pocket Casts, Sony Walkman, n7 Player etc.) in compatibility mode (Pro only) Features: - Auto-hide with various hide/reveal settings - WidgetLocker events integration - Possibility to show/remove some elements such as volume control and current track info - Nine graphical (H7C is just like Sense, Metro like WP7, Aero like Windows 7's Media Player, MIUI style, Xperia style and Carbon are self-explainatory) and two chromeless themes (minimalistic text inspired by Clockr and Calendr) - Battery saving mode with almost zero energy consumption - Localised to 19 languages (some fully, some partially) - DashClock Widget Extension - Support for 3rd party apps to utilize Phantom's wide range of controllable players (more info for developers at: http://goo.gl/ifyvL ) Warning: Do not forget, that not all players are supported, and that you need to hold your finger on your home screen in order to place a widget. Please do not try to find it in application drawer.
release_text: 1.67: - DashClock Widget Extension - New chromeless theme - Several bugfixes

Budu riskovat řidičák? Nadýchám ještě? Neměl bych si radši zavolat taxi? Nainstalujte si náš alkoholtester a budete vědět odpověď okamžitě. Nastavíte si osobní údaje, na časovou osu naklikáte, kolik se vám toho podařilo vypít a máte hned jasno. Vypité drinky buď vyberete z naší nabídky, nebo si nastavíte svůj oblíbený nápoj sami a pak už jenom klikáte. Kromě detailního přehledu konzumace v čase (který by měl teoreticky nabídnout přesnější výpočet) máte k dispozici i rychlokalkulačku, která Vám rámcově ukáže dobu, kterou lidský organismus potřebuje na odbourání zadaného množství alkoholu. Hlavním partnerem služby je Plzeňský Prazdroj a.s., partnerem aplikace je společnost Vodafone Czech Republic a.s. Upozornění: aplikace zobrazuje orientační údaje a pouze průměrné odhady, které nelze považovat za závazné. Aplikace odesílá anonymní data pro interní potřebu o.s. SANANIM. Tím se podílíte na jejím testování a vývoji. Součástí dat nejsou jakékoli údaje o vašem jménu, telefonním číslu či jakýchkoli jiných osobních detailů.

Source: cs.m.wikisource.org / wiki / Robinson_Krusoe List of chapters can be found in the Content menu. Select the appropriate chapter and press OK. Application stores after closing chapter the place where you last read.

description: ** DISCLAIMER: YOU CAN IMPORT MINECRAFT TEXTURES! ** Love Minecraft? Can't get enough of those blocks? Destroy some of them on your device, Arkanoid-style! This tablet-ready game is your typical Arkanoid/Breakout clone with some changes and (soon to come) game modes. But most importantly it has Minecraft blocks and Minecraft drops! If you know Minecraft, you already know that stone drops cobblestone blocks, that you can get snowballs, seeds, iron ingots, etc. You will see all of those here. The game uses Minecraft textures AND any Minecraft texture-packs! You need to import them yourself due to legal reasons though. There is a help button to show you how to import texture packs and what all blocks can drop, what those drops can do. Game Modes: * Arcade Mode - get as many points from dropped items as you can * Custom Mode - create your own levels, play and share them with your friends Please note that lagging when touching the game screen is an Android <= 2.2 (Froyo) bug!

Yet another "Drink Water/Hydrate/Eight Cups a day" app. What is different for this one? It lets YOU choose when you are done for the day! I found no other application on the market that does not change days on midnight. This application helps you keep track of how much water you drank during a day. I have a kidney problem, so it is crucial to watch my water intake. Hope it helps you too.
