Make sure, you have properly set Google Voice Search language. Voice Commands provides the most comfortable way to start navigation. You don't have to type destination on keyboard, just say the address. Favorite addresses can be saved as shortcut commands. Then just click microphone button and say for example "home". *** Premium features *** - Save current location as shortcut - Auto start listening - Auto start GPS (can speed-up GPS fix) - No ads

description: Alkohol kalkulačka je interaktivní aplikace pro zjištění množství zbytkového alkoholu v krvi a tím rámcové určení času, kdy budete „na nule“. Přednosti aplikace: • poutavá grafika, malované nápoje • drag & drop ovládání • editovatelné nápoje • přesun nápojů v seznamu (změna pořadí) • interaktivní graf s popisky Alkohol kalkulačka má předdefinovaných více než 30 nejoblíbenějších nápojů, jako např.: • pivo – 10°, 11°, 12°, stout, • víno – bílé, červené, portské, • destiláty – rum, fernet, becherovka, vodka, tequilla, whisky, koňak atd., • míchané drinky – Pina Colada, Sex on the Beach, Tequilla Sunrise, Bloody Mary, Cosmopolitan, Margareta atd. Českou verzi aplikace podpořil BESIP. Pijte zodpovědně. Výpočet je pouze orientační, množství zbytkového alkoholu v krvi se u různých osob liší. Nezapomínejte také na zhoršené vnímání, pozornost a orientaci při stavu tzv. kocoviny. Alcohol Calculator is an interactive application to determine the amount of residual alcohol in the blood and thus determine the framework of time when you will be "zero". Advantages of the application: • engaging graphics, painted drinks • drag & drop operation • Editable drinks • transfer of drinks list (change) • interactive chart with labels Alcohol has predefined calculator 30 over the most popular beverages such .: • beer - 10 °, 11 °, 12 °, stout, • wine - white, red, port, • spirits - rum, Fernet, Becherovka, vodka, tequila, whiskey, brandy etc., • cocktails - Pina Colada, Sex on the Beach, Tequila Sunrise, Bloody Mary, Cosmopolitan, Margareta etc. Czech version supported SCUBA. Drink responsibly. The calculation is only approximate, the amount of residual blood alcohol level differs between people. Do not forget to impaired perception, attention and orientation in the state called. Hangover.

app_name: Tony the Truck and his Friends
description: If your kid loves cars, trucks and vehicles in general, this is the app to download. Tony the Truck is very busy at the construction site. Everybody needs his help - digger Dan, bulldozer Karl, Hugo and Amos the cranes, roller Ben, mixer truck Ron and of course the forklift brothers Max and Rex. Where should Tony go first? The app has been designed for kids between 1 to 4 years, so your kids can use the app on their own and won’t get lost anywhere in the navigation. There are no ads in the app and all the links are under parental control. Two screens are available for free, others can be bought as an in-app purchase. For more information about the app visit http://www.tonythetruck.com . If you have any suggestions for improvement, have general feedback or just want to chat, drop us a line at app@yomioapps.com .

An application of the magazines Bon à Savoir and K-Tipp Food is increasingly « completed » with additives (colorants, conservatives, firming agents, flavor enhancers, etc.) often indicated on the labels, but sometimes in coded form: an E, followed by a number between 3 and 4 digits. Thus, the flavor enhancers, in certain soups, identified as E 621, E 627 and E 631 on the packaging have the following translation (which you will not find on the label): they are respectively, glutamate, guanylate and sodium inosinate. All three can trigger allergic reactions, asthma and are thus not recommended to people sensitive to them: you will not find the latter information on the label either! Our application will allow you to decode what the industry is trying to hide from you, by not only informing you of the risks and eventual contra-indications for people on a special diet (vegetarian, gluten, etc), but also by explaining the use of each additive and in which foods they are often used. This is the result of summary work conducted by our editors with the help of ten carefully documented and much diversified sources. From them, we have extracted and gathered information, which is clearly referenced in the application, and noted each additive according to the following criteria: - Safe: no source indicates a risk - Some doubts: at least one source refers to a risk. - Substantial risks: several sources indicate the same risks. - To be avoided: a majority of sources recommend that this additive be avoided. - No risk info: the sources give insufficient information or none at all on the risks. On the other hand, for each additive, we indicate if it is authorized or not in Switzerland and in the European Community. Please note that for the latter, the exhaustive list of authorized products will definitively complete the appropriate regulations (CE1333/2008) only towards the end of 2011. In the meantime, as related directives 94/36 and 95/2 are applicable in each member state, we have relied on these. Rights and responsibilities: "The Editions Plus Sàrl as well as Konsumenteninfo AG decline all responsibility for any type of damages that could be caused in relation to the access or the use of this application." info@bonasavoir.ch © Editions Plus Sàrl, CP150, 1001 Lausanne, Suisse.

description: GPS Alarm System. With GPSAlarm Lite you can program the most common sites you use every day and make the phone take a settings based on that location. If every time you get to put your personal phone work in silence now with GPSAlarm Lite can do it automatically and you forget about it. Once you leave the range with which you set the alarm, the phone returns to its previous state. Features: * 2 alarms. * GPS Location * Location 3G/Telefonia/GSM * Note by vibration alert * Detention / activation of the service responsible for managing alarms * ... The Full version has more features like enabled/disabled wifi, enabled/disabled sound in call phone, send sms, make missed call... as well as more possible alarms. For now just go to silent mode or normal. If need more features purchase de full version The application is really easy. Generates a new alert and ready, the program does the rest. Once a new alarm generated can edit or delete. You can also view your active alarms on the same map.

This is an RSS news reader, but unlike others this reader lets you view all the sections of the community SceneBeta from a single screen. However, this is not the only interesting option of the program. You read the news you ask your Android device to read it to you for your convenience but you may need to install any additional app for Android as eSpeak. Photo Tools is a tool for amateur and professional photographers. With this application you can do this things: - Calculate the exposure time in a long exposure night photography. - Calculate the hyperfocal distance in a photograph. - Shooting stars as points rather than traces Just enter the data and get results quickly and easily. One of the necessary data is the circle of confusion. This is a different number for each manufacturer and type of camera. Nikon DSLRs generally have a value of 0.020 and 0.019 for Canon but for sure the value of your camera visit this page: http://www.dofmaster.com/digital_coc.html You can also do a search on the web to get this value.

Time Tools is an application to automate certain tasks that you repeat day after day or just a way to program a smart alarm that will transform your device into a device capable of performing various actions on its own. Time Tools is based on the android watch, taking time for this and act accordingly to reach a time where an alarm is scheduled. Features: * 10 alarms. * Activation/Deactivation of the hardware device (GPS, WIFI, Flight mode ...) * Note by vibration alert * Send SMS, email, tweet to trigger an alarm. * Make a missing call or a normal call. * ... When running an alarm and have this repetitive work, the system becomes active for your next run without us having to touch anything else in the device. Being an application that uses the proper alarm system Android, instead of using your own, has a minimum energy expenditure, your battery will not suffer from both large drops in level. The amount of configuration options of an alarm is huge, and therefore can still be small bugs. Excuse me if you encounter one of these, and if so, let me know. I leave you to enjoy the application.

'Beyond the Iron Wall is every bit as good as the first game, and I can't recommend it enough' - Killa Penguin Explore a vast world of mythical djinn, sandworms, lamias, and arcane undead You are Kepri, a priestess sworn to defend the Iron Wall in the desert kingdom of Vasena. In a land where women are of low status, Kepri defies tradition to strive for the recognition she deserves. But when enemies threaten the wall separating Vasena from the rest of the world, Kepri must somehow rally the armies and decide the future of her people...or face extinction. Tales of Illyria is an RPG hybrid mixing Oregon Trail and Choose-Your-Own-Adventure game mechanics. Each party member has a distinct personality and reacts differently to being sick, running out of supplies, and decisions that go against their alignment. Will you give precious water to a man dying of thirst, or let him die in the desert? How will you cross a river full of vicious crocodiles? Will you strive for peace, or wage bloody war? Tales of Illyria: Beyond the Iron Wall is the second episode in the Tales of Illyria series. Each episode can be a standalone RPG. Features: • An epic storyline with four different endings • 25+ hours of gameplay • 800 unique encounters • Hunt exotic animals and harvest plants to feed your party • New jungle and savanna environments, in addition to forests, deserts and gorgeous mountains • 6 kingdoms with 42 villages, castles and cities to visit • Improved battle system featuring enemy-unique spells, elemental strengths and weaknesses • New Vasenian armor and weapons • 86 original musical tracks • Learn what happened in the years following the chaotic events of Tales of Illyria Episode One: Fallen Knight • Cameos from Episode One After the game installs, additional graphic files will be downloaded depending on the resolution you pick. This ranges from 300MB to 1GB. You will need double that in free space to install the game. **Take Note: If you have EP1 installed in "Shared Storage" you will NOT need to download the files** Check out our blog and forum: http://www.talesofillyria.com/ Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/TalesOfIllyria Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TalesOfIllyria Tales of Illyria Episode Two named one of the Best Android RPGs of 2014 (so far): http://www.hardcoredroid.com/the-best-android-rpgs-of-2014-so-far/ Killa Penguin Review: http://killapenguin.com/gamereviews/talesofillyriabeyondtheironwall/

description: IMPORTANT NOTICE: DO NOT USE ON RECENT 4.4 AND 5.0 FIRMWARES YET. WE ARE WORKING ON AN UPDATE Mobile ODIN is the on-device firmware flasher of choice. Just throw those firmware files on your (internal or external) SD card, start Mobile ODIN and flash away. ! Your device must be rooted to be able to use Mobile ODIN. Check the list below to see if your device is supported ! If you use the EverRoot option, Mobile ODIN will root the firmware while you flash it. Checking out that new leaked firmware? No reason to lose root! Currently supported devices: Galaxy S: - GT-I9000/B/M - GT-I9003/L - AT&T/Rogers Captivate SGH-I896/I897 Galaxy S2: - GT-I9100/T/G/M - SHW-M250S/K - SC-02C - AT&T SGH-I777 - Sprint/Virgin/Boost Epic 4G Touch SPH-D710/VMUB/BST - USCC SCH-R760 Galaxy S3: - GT-I9300/T - GT-I9308 - LTE SHV-E210S - LTE GT-I9305/T/N - AT&T/Canadia SGH-I747/M - TMOUS SGH-T999 - Sprint/C-Spire SPH/SCH-L710 - VZW SCH-I535 (unlock bootloader !) - USCC/Cricket/MetroPCS Galaxy S3 SCH-R530/U/M/C Galaxy S4: - LTE GT-I9505 - Sprint SPH-L720 - TMOUS SGH-M919 - USCC SCH-R970 - Canadia SGH-I337M Galaxy S5: - LTE SM-G900F - Oceania SM-G900I - Korea SM-G900L - Americas SM-G900M - Sprint SM-G900P - USCC SM-G900R4 - TMOUS SM-G900T - Metro SM-G900T1 - Canadia SM-G900W8 Google Galaxy Nexus: - GSM Maguro/Yakju/GT-I9250 - CDMA/LTE Toro/Mysid/SCH-I515 (no cdma radio flashing) Galaxy Note - GT-N7000/B - GT-I9220 Galaxy Note 2: - GT-N7100 - LTE GT-N7105 - AT&T/Canadia SGH-I317/M - TMOUS SGH-T889 - Sprint SPH-L900 - VZW SCH-I605 (unlock bootloader !) - USCC SCH-R950 Galaxy Note 3: - SM-N9005 - Sprint SM-N900P - TMOUS SM-N900T - USCC SM-N900R4 - Canadia SM-N900W8 Galaxy Note 8.0": - 3G GT-N5100 - Wi-Fi GT-N5110/13 - LTE GT-N5120 Galaxy Note 10.1": - 3G GT-N8000 - Wi-Fi GT-N8010/13 - LTE GT-N8020 Galaxy Tab: - Tab 7" GT-P1000 - Tab 7.0 Plus GT-P6200/L/10 - Tab 7.7" GT-P6800/10 - Tab 10.1" GT-P750/10 - Tab 2 7" GT-P3100/10/13 - Tab 2 10" GT-P5100/10/13 Galaxy 5: - GT-I5500/B/L/T/M - GT-I5503/T - GT-I5508 Flashing with Mobile ODIN does NOT increase your custom kernel flash counter or make the yellow warning triangle appear. Discussion and support: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1347899 MANUAL Flashing with Mobile ODIN is easy. You start by starting the app and the app will check your system has everything it needs to continue (like root). It may need to download an additional package, so it is advised you have Wi-Fi available. Now you should see the main Mobile ODIN screen. It will list a set of partitions. Clicking a partition will allow you to select a file from your SD card to flash to that partition. Do not worry about selecting the wrong file - Mobile ODIN will not let you. Separate files (named after the partition) as well as .tar and .tar.md5 files are supported. From the desktop ODIN you may be used to "PDA", "PHONE", and "CSC" buttons. All three of these buttons have been replaced by the "Open file ..." button. This button will open the file you select from the SD card, and find all the partitions it can flash inside that file. So if you select a .tar file containing kernel and modem, the Kernel and Modem partitions will be set up to use that .tar file for flashing. Now that we have selected what we want to flash, if you have the Pro version you can proceed to the EverRoot section. The EverRoot options allows you to root your firmware while it is being flashed. Never again will you be without root! Select here which apps you want to inject in the firmware that is being flashed. Now that we are all done selecting partitions and configuring EverRoot, we continue to "Flash firmware". Mobile ODIN will gather all the information it needs and perform the flash. Before starting, however, it will check that your battery level is over 50%, and if applicable offer to verify MD5 checksums on the files you have selected to flash. If all is well, it will reboot into recovery mode, and flash the firmware you have selected.

description: SuperSU is the Superuser access management tool of the future ;) !!! SuperSU requires a rooted device !!! SuperSU allows for advanced management of Superuser access rights for all the apps on your device that need root. SuperSU has been built from the ground up to counter a number of problems with other Superuser access management tools. Features include: - Superuser access prompt - Superuser access logging - Superuser access notifications - Per-app notification configuration - Temporary unroot - Deep process detection (no more unknowns) - Works in recovery (no more segfaulting) - Works when Android isn't properly booted - Works with non-standard shell locations - Always runs in ghost mode - Wake on prompt - Convert to /system app - Complete unroot - Backup script to survive CyanogenMod nightlies - Icon selectable from 5 options + invisible - Theme selectable from 4 options - Launch from dialer: *#*#1234#*#* or *#*#7873778#*#* (*#*#SUPERSU#*#*) NOTE: Not all phones take both codes. On some phones you need to use single *# instead of double *#*# The Pro version additionally offers: - OTA survival mode (no guarantees) - Full color-coded command content logging (input/output/error) - Per-app logging configuration - Per-app user override - Grant/deny root to an app for a set amount of time - PIN protection - Per-app PIN protection - Adjust auto-deny countdown The discussion and support thread can be found on XDA-Developers here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1538053 SUPERUSER This is meant to replace Superuser (if installed), you use either one or the other. You cannot combine them. Statements that this breaks Superuser are therefore completely nonsensical. NOTICE: A SPECIAL PROCEDURE IS NEEDED FOR UNINSTALLATION. IF YOU DO NOT LIKE THE APP, DO *NOT* JUST UNINSTALL IT, YOU *WILL* LOSE ROOT. Superuser access management runs through a so called "su binary". There can be only one of these at a time. So if you install SuperSU, your previous superuser access management solution will no longer operate. So if you want to switch back: (1) Open that application, and search for an option for it to install/update/replace the "su binary". (2) Confirm root-using apps are using the superuser solution you want. (3) Uninstall SuperSU. TRANSLATIONS Want to help translate SuperSU ? See http://www.getlocalization.com/supersu/ ! IN-APP PURCHASES These are completely optional and more like donations. They do not unlock any functionality.
release_text: - Installer adjustments - Fixed some su.d scripts not running because of logwrapper bug - Fix native NPE in username resolution - Fixed several binary update issues - LD_PRELOAD sanitization - Improved dumpstate work-around - Improved killing dead per-uid daemonsu - Backuptool support for Lollipop, /system/su.d - CM12 policy adjustments - supolicy timing adjustment (Motorola Lollipop) - rootfs remount issue fixed (HTC) - Remove more competing leftover binaries - Updated language files - (C) 2015

description: Many Samsung devices store a flash counter that keeps track of how many times you have flashed *custom* firmwares to your device. On some devices, a yellow triangle or other sort of visual warning is also displayed during boot if you are running a *custom* firmware. TriangleAway was built to disable the triangle (if a visual warning is present) and reset the custom ROM flash counter to 0. This app requires root ! You can find out the current status of your flash counter and firmware state (custom or official) by booting into "download mode" on most devices. The usual way of getting into "download mode" is by first turning off your device, then turning it on by pressing and holding VolDown+(Home)+Power. Alternatively, the "adb reboot download" command also often works. When you run TriangleAway, if your device and firmware are supported, it will show you the detected state of the binary (custom or official) and flash counter value, and the option to "Reset flash counter". Please confirm that the information shown is correct before resetting the values. On a number of devices, TriangleAway can work, but your firmware may not be supported directly. In that case, the app will tell you it needs to reboot into a special boot mode, which will be happen if you select "Reset flash counter". The device will reboot into a special mode which will allow you to review the current status and reset the binary and flash counter values (or abort and do nothing). On some devices this will actually trigger the counter to 1 if its 0 - so if you're "just checking", do that in download mode! !!! THIS IS A DANGEROUS OPERATION AND COULD POTENTIALLY BRICK YOUR DEVICE. PROCEED AT YOUR OWN RISK. A USB JIG IS PREFERRED IF YOU HAVE A WORKING ONE !!! ( and by brick I mean brick - only a board replacement or a JTAG unit will be able to save you, don't mess with boot(loader) stuff unless you *really* mean it! ) Note#1: using Triangle Away may unmount your SD card. Reboot or manually remount it from Android settings. Note#2: on new devices status can only be reset on stock firmwares! Supported devices: SG S2: - GT-I9100 ** - Sprint Epic 4G Touch - Korea SHW-M250K/L/S SG S3: - GT-I9300/I9300T ** - GT-I9305/I9305T/I9305N LTE ** - USA: AT&T, Sprint, T-Mo, VZW (unlock bootloader !), USCC, MetroPCS, Cricket, CSpire - Canada - Korea: SHV-E210K/L/S, SHW-M440S SG S4: - GT-I9505 - USA: AT&T, VZW, Sprint, T-Mo, USCC - Canada SG Note: - GT-N7000 - GT-I9220 SG Note 2: - GT-N7100/N7100T/N7102/N7105/N7105T ** - USA: AT&T, Sprint, T-Mo, VZW (unlock bootloader !), USCC - Canada: I317M, T889V - Korea: SHV-E250K/L/S ** SG Note 3 (4.4+): - GT-N9005 - USA: T-Mobile, Sprint - Canada: SM-N900W8 - Asia: SM-N900S/2/6/8/9 SG Note 8.0": - GT-N5100 3G ** - GT-N511x Wi-Fi ** - GT-N5120 LTE ** SG Note 10.1": - GT-N8000 3G ** - GT-N801x Wi-Fi ** - GT-N8020 LTE ** - SHW-M480S/K/W ** SG Camera EK-GC100 ** SG Tab 2: - GT-P310x 7" 3G - GT-P311x 7" Wi-Fi - GT-P510x 10.1" 3G - GT-P511x 10.1" Wi-Fi Various: - I8160, I8190 - I9070/P - I9082 - I9260 - S7500, S7560, S7562 ** Various models are supported depending on firmware, but only the exact models listed are supported regardless of firmware version. Whether or not Triangle Away works may depend on your kernel, try flashing a different one if it doesn't work. Please also note that some devices set the counter to 1 at every boot if you are running a custom kernel or recovery. On these devices, Triangle Away may always display 1 - make sure to check the counter in actual download mode. For discussion and technical details, see the XDA-Developers.com thread here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1494114 Note that this download is also available from that thread completely for free. You can go there and download it for free, or buy me a beer and download it from Play. It is the same program. I'm not sure about future updates - http://www.chainfire.eu/articles/118/Triangle_Away_vs_Samsung/

Game "Funny Charades" similar as the party game "Activity" - is dedicated to greater number of people (ideally more than 3). The rules can be edited various ways, we will describe one of the possible ways how to play this game. Players will divide in groups of 2 people (minimum of 2 groups). In each round the activity is chosen (word description, drawing, pantomime) and a word (with 3, 4 or 5 points value, depending on the difficulty level), which the player tries to describe, draw or show using pantomime to his team player. If the team player correctly guesses the word, their team will get points. Activity - Word description - it is required to describe the chosen word. It is not allowed to use the root of the chosen word. Activity - Drawing - it is required to draw a picture on the paper or in our application from which the team player will guess the word. It is not allowed to write any words into the picture. Activity - Pantomime - it is required to show the word using pantomime in a way the team player would guess it. No word commentaries are allowed. There is limited time for performing the activity (can be changed in settings). If the word is not guessed in this time, the team can not get the points. The team, which achieves the required number of points (can be changed in settings) first, wins. All players (teams) will guess some randomly chosen rounds (can be switched off in settings). Team, which will correctly guess the word will get points. If that team is not the one performing the activity, the performing team will also get 2 points (as a reward for correctly performed activity). Application contains word database in these languages: english, czech, german, hungarian, russian, slovak In case you are interested in other languages, write us an e-mail: charades@zemiak.eu Key words: funny charades, charades, activity, activity game
release_text: Version 1.8 - added romanian version of game and word database Version 1.7 - added russian and hungarian version of game and word databases - fixed problem while drawing images directly in app - better support for tablets - small other fixes Version 1.6 - added english version of the game, english word database - drawed image can be shared on facebook

description: Chiediamo a chiunque dia una votazione a quest'app di spiegarci il motivo della sua scelta o tramite recensione o per mail privata! Solo così potremo migliorare facendo tesoro dei vostri suggerimenti. Versione 3.1 - Non c'è più vinoh. - Ma c'è ytp sound 3.0! - Ah ma è ronco! - Allora va.. e riempilo! YTP Sound è tornata con una veste grafica nuova e nuove funzionalità tra cui un mini quiz, in cui dovrai dimostrare le tue conoscenze! Fissato bug della condivisione su Whatsapp e altri bug minori. Versione 2.1.1 fissati alcuni bug nella condivisione Versione 2.1 -Invio delle voci tramite WhatsApp! -Aggiunta delle voci richieste dagli utenti (69 voci e 3 nuovi tab). -Aggiunti nuovi collegamenti a nuovi canali di pooper emergenti con classifica per numero di iscritti. -Aggiunta del tasto WAT -Miglioramento della grafica e del layout. -Aggiunta la possibilità di contribuire e supportare l'applicazione. Versione 2.0 -DIMINUITE LE DIMENSIONI DELLE VOCI! -aumentato il volume delle voci più deboli! -possibilità di spostare su scheda SD CARD per preventivare lo spazio di archiviazione -la possibilità di inserire una voce come suoneria del cellulare -la possibilità di inserire una voce come suoneria delle notifiche -la possibilità di inserire una voce come suoneria della sveglia -la possibilità di condividere la voce sui socialnetwork -link ai canali youtube dei migliori poopers italiani -nuovi personaggi (ruoppolo, pino cammino, mario, capobastone, etc.) -nuove voci per i personaggi già presenti -tasto "Random" per una voce casuale -tasto "Svuota" per resettare i preferiti -tasto "WAT" simula funzionamento dell'App -migliorata la veste grafica. YTPSound è la raccolta delle frasi celebri dei personaggi più famosi di Youtube: in parole povere è il vademecum essenziale dello Youtube poopers alle prime armi.. e non solo! Vuoi iniziare un tuo amico alle Youtube poop? Fagli sentire il prof Testoh che risponde alle critiche di Nappa, oppure fagli sentire la voce del maestro Osvaldo Paniccia che dialoga con Giuseppe Simone.. Divertiti a far parlare tra di loro Andrea Diprè, Richard Benson, Matteo Montesi, ecc.. Crea i discorsi più strani e cerca di dare un senso alle più di 300 frasi celebri (in continuo aumento) contenute nel nostro DataBase! Voci di: -Danilo Valla -Nemesis -Matteo Montesi -Dragonball (Junior, Goku, Vegeta, ecc..) -Richard Benson -Marco Bartucci -Banks & Dawes -Alessandro Orlando -Germano Mosconi (R.I.P.) -Osvaldo Paniccia (R.I.P.) -Sergente Hartman -Bear Grylls -Andrea Dipré -e molti altri (Pedro, Leonida, Giuseppe Simone, Gimli, etc.) We ask anyone who gives a vote in this app to explain the reason for his choice or through review or private mail! Only then can we improve treasuring your suggestions. Version 3.1 - There is no longer Vinoh. - But there ytp 3.0 sound! - Ah, but is ronco! - Then go .. and fill it! YTP Sound is back with a new layout and new features including a mini quiz, in which you will demonstrate your knowledge! Fixed bug sharing of Whatsapp and other minor bugs. Version 2.1.1 fixed some bugs in the sharing Version 2.1 -Send The items via WhatsApp! -Added The items requested by users (69 voices and 3 new tab). -Added New links to new channels emerging pooper with ranking by number of subscribers. -Added Button WAT -Improved Graphics and layout. -Added The ability to contribute and support the application. Version 2.0 -DIMINUITE DIMENSIONS OF ITEMS! -Increased the volume of voices weaker! -possibility to move to SD CARD to estimate the storage space -the possibility to place a voice as mobile phone ringtone -the possibility to place a voice as a ringtone notifications -the possibility to place a voice as alarm signal -the possibility to share the voice on social networks youtube-link channels of the best Italian poopers -new characters (Ruoppolo, pine path, mario, capobastone, etc.) -new voices for the characters already -button "Random" for a random entry -button "Clear" to reset the favorite -button "WAT" simulates operation of the App -Improved graphics. YTPSound is collection of famous phrases of the most famous Youtube: in simple terms is the essential handbook of Youtube poopers novice .. and not only! Want to start your friend to Youtube poop? Let him hear Professor Testoh that responds to criticism of Nappa, or let them hear the voice of the master Osvaldo Paniccia that communicates with Joseph Simon .. Fun to talk to each other Andrea Diprè, Richard Benson, Matteo Montesi, etc .. Create the strangest discourses and tries to make sense of the most famous phrases of 300 (and growing) contained in our database! Items: -Danilo Valla -Nemesis -Matthew Montesi -Dragonball (Junior, Goku, Vegeta, etc ..) -Richard Benson -Mark Bartucci -Banks & Dawes -Alessandro Orlando -Germano Mosconi (R.I.P.) -Osvaldo Paniccia (R.I.P.) -Sergente Hartman -bear Grylls -Andrea Dipré -and many others (Pedro, Leonidas, Joseph Simon, Gimli, etc.)

description: This application is very useful for all music collectors who are looking for the "perfect" record. In fact, this application allows you to find, through the well-stocked music catalog "discogs.com", the prices of the respective vinyl, calculating in real time the minimum price, the average and the maximum of those who at this moment are selling just the vinyl you're looking for. In addition to the price you can obtain vinyl's code, year of publication, country of origin and music label. This application also works with cds, tapes and also digital files. Thanks discogs.com for database and information. For tips / suggestions do not hesitate to contact me via e-mail.
release_text: Changelog 8.3 - Resolution of problems related to the loading of the covers / images

description: Abbonati all'applicazione Vini d'Italia del Gambero Rosso. A sole €8,99/anno hai accesso completo a: - le schede complete dei 2.350 produttori selezionati sulla Guida Vini d'Italia del Gambero Rosso, con l'indirizzo, di dati di produzione e la valutazione degli esperti di Gambero Rosso - oltre 20.000 vini complete di scheda descrittiva e note di degustazione - le migliori enoteche d'Italia - le notizie in diretta dal sito Gambero Rosso Caratteristiche - elenco dei vini per valutazione, per regione, per produttore - ricerca del vino per nome e per produttore - ricerca dei produttori e delle enoteche per regione - ricerca avanzata con più di 10 caratteristiche selezionabili - inserimento dei produttori e enoteche nella propria rubrica - produttori e enoteche "vicino a me" con la possibilità di contattarle e l'itinerario per raggiungerle - Abbonamento auto-rinnovabile da 1 anno, € 8,99. Per modificare le opzioni di abbonamento o per disattivarlo visita il tuo account Apple. Ad avvenuta conferma dell'acquisto, il costo verrà addebitato sul tuo account iTunes. Ricorda che l'abbonamento verrà rinnovato automaticamente tramite iTunes Store. Il costo del rinnovo verrà addebitato automaticamente entro 24 ore dallo scadere dell'abbonamento corrente. Puoi disattivare il rinnovo automatico dal tuo account Apple, esprimendo la tua scelta almeno 24 ore prima dello scadere dell'abbonamento corrente. Non puoi cancellare il tuo abbonamento corrente prima dello scadere del termine. Nel caso in cui la pubblicazione preveda un periodo di prova gratuito, la parte di abbonamento rimanente non potrà essere restituita nel momento in cui l'utente acquista un abbonamento a tale pubblicazione. Subscribe application Wines of Italy's Gambero Rosso. At only € 8.99 / year you have full access to: - Complete profiles of the 2,350 selected producers on the Italian Wine Guide Gambero Rosso, the address, data production and evaluation experts of Gambero Rosso - Over 20,000 wines complete descriptive card and tasting notes - The best wine in Italy - Live news from the site Gambero Rosso Characteristics - List of wines for evaluation, by region, by manufacturer - Search by name of wine and producer - Search for producers and wine by region - Advanced search with more than 10 features selectable - Insertion of the producers and wine in your address book - Producers and wine "near me" with the possibility to contact them and the route to reach them - Subscription auto-renewable one year, € 8.99. To change your subscription or to disable it visits your Apple account. After the confirmation of purchase, the cost will be charged to your iTunes account. Remember that the subscription will be renewed automatically via the iTunes Store. The cost of renewal will be automatically debited within 24 hours from the expiry of your current subscription. You can turn off auto-renewal from your Apple account, expressing your choice at least 24 hours before the expiration of your current subscription. You can not cancel your subscription before the end of the current term. In the event that the publication provides a free trial period, the remaining part of the subscription will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
release_text: - Ricerca avanzata: ora potrai selezionare tra più di 10 caratteristiche per trovare il tuo vino preferito - Nuova sezione notizie: abbiamo inserito 3 rubriche con contenuti gratuiti per suggerirti un vino, un'enoteca e una verticale - Aggiornamenti in automatico: tutti i nuovi vini della guida 2016 disponibli per gli abbonati

description: √ Get ready for the Serie A 2013/2014! The app let you find the probable lineups of all the italian Serie A teams before the start of the matches and the scores. You'll be always updated about the best football league of the world! Through the round calendar you will be able to view every single match data, like the game modules, the first-string players and the bench. You can also set your favourite team to instantly view it when the app starts. Everything displayed with a great looking design refined in every detail. For suggestions and comments please write to formazioni@indeed.it or visit the official Facebook page: formazioni
release_text: √ Added the following teams: Livorno, Sassuolo and Verona √ Changes for the new season √ Bugfixes

description: Con la nuova funzionalità Token, che verrà resa progressivamente disponibile a tutti i clienti, potrai autorizzare le operazioni di Conto Arancio e Conto Corrente Arancio in tutta semplicità e con la massima sicurezza. Con la App puoi: - controllare saldo e movimenti dei tuoi conti con grafici interattivi - pagare i bollettini postali utilizzando la fotocamera, risparmiando tempo ed evitando errori - creare il tuo Smart Code e generare i Codici Token per autorizzare le operazioni di Conto Corrente Arancio senza dover portare con te la Carta dei Codici Operativi. La nuova funzionalità sarà resa gradualmente disponibile a tutti i clienti ING DIRECT. - disporre bonifici e giroconti - effettuare ricariche telefoniche selezionando dalla rubrica il numero da ricaricare - modificare il plafond della tua Carta di Credito Visa Oro ING DIRECT - consultare gli interessi del tuo Conto Arancio - attivare Deposito Arancio - richiedere un preventivo di Mutuo Arancio - visualizzare i movimenti e conoscere l’importo del prossimo addebito di Mutuo Arancio. Per maggiori informazioni visita la pagina http://www.ingdirect.it/dove-ci-trovi/app-e-mobile.html . Per segnalare malfunzionamenti o anomali scrivi a digital.italy@ingdirect.it . Ti consigliamo di installare la App solo su dispositivi Android originali: se il tuo smartphone ha subito il processo di rooting non possiamo garantire il corretto funzionamento e la completa sicurezza della App. With the new token, which will be progressively made available to all customers, you can authorize the operations of Orange Account and Current Account Orange with ease and with maximum safety. With the App you can:  - Check your balance and your accounts with interactive charts  - Pay the postal payment using the camera, saving time and avoiding errors  - Create your Smart Code and generate token codes to authorize transactions Current Account Orange without having to carry with you to the Charter of Operational Codes. The new feature will be gradually made available to all customers ING DIRECT.  - Order transfers and transfers  - Make phone cards by selecting from the phonebook the number to recharge  - Change the credit limit of your credit card Visa Gold ING DIRECT  - Consult the interests of your Orange Account  - Activate Luggage Orange  - Request a quotation of Orange Mortgage  - View the movements and know the amount of the next charge of Orange Mortgage. For more information please visit http://www.ingdirect.it/dove-ci-trovi/app-e-mobile.html . To report a malfunction or abnormal write to digital.italy@ingdirect.it . You'll want to install the App on Android devices only original: if your smartphone has undergone the process of rooting we can not guarantee the correct operation and the complete safety of the App.
release_text: Abbiamo risolto un problema che causava l'arresto della App all'apertura su alcuni dispositivi. Dalla 2.0: - Puoi gestire a tua Carta Prepagata dalla App: controlli i movimenti, ricarichi e ricevi i dati necessari per gli acquisti. - Con Token autorizzi le operazioni in modo semplice, veloce e sicuro.

description: Spy Listener permette di trasformare il tuo telefono in un microfono spia. L'applicazione, una volta avviata, resta in attesa di un SMS con un particolare messaggio. Appena ricevuto, richiama in modo automatico e silenzioso il numero di telefono che ha inviato l'SMS, trasformando così il tuo telefono in un microfono spia. Non ti resta che ascoltare!
release_text: Pubblicata la prima versione di Spy Listener.

Link. Television Culture is an editorial project focusing on TV and media. It departs from Mediaset-RTI strategic marketing to widen the horizon of the small screen within the entire communication system through a magazine and a series of books. Link wishes to describe the mechanisms that rule the television industry without indulging in banalities, to enrich the media debate with contributions from Italian as well as international leading experts and professionals, to introduce a credible meeting point among insiders, academicians and a larger audience of students and TV fans. Link. Idee per la televisione is a magazine approaching TV and media from an original point of view, providing analysis, reflections on the medium and uncovering productive practices and the secrets of the machine. Although inspired by an attitude that bypasses “apocalyptical” recurring temptations, the magazine is far from being “integrated”.  Link submits questions, ideas and models to follow (or avoid). We’re interested in change, in discontinuity. We like to understand how things work and eventually evolve; Link always valued television and the Internet the same way. Each issue delves into a specific topic explicated in the cover story and examines the television world through a broader approach. Sections are organized thematically and address genres, contents, markets, technologies and lateral thinking. Established in 1998 within research and marketing development activities at RTI, Link has been sold in bookshops since 2002 and launched on tablet in 2012.  With Link, broadcasting takes a good look at itself.  http://www.linkmagazine.blogspot.com  http://www.link.mediaset.it  http://twitter.com/LinkIdeeperlatv  Starting from the next issue the magazine will cost € 4,49.You can subscribe now for one year and download the next two issues for € 7,99.The subscription will be charged on your Google Play account and will automatically renew after a year. You can unsubscribe from your Google Play account, at least 24 hours before the expiration. Already processed payment won't be refund.You can read our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Use on http://mobile.mediaset.it/informativa_privacy.html

Resta aggiornato con le news del TG5! description: The container of your memos, protected with a PIN code. With this application you can easily save reminders, thoughts, quotes, phrases, messages, addresses, phone numbers or other notes in a single container and you can keep them secret by setting a PIN code to protect against unauthorized access. Features: * You can set a priority to get your urgent memo highlighted and always at the list top. * Selecting a memo, you can share it through the applications on your device (SMS, email, bluetooth, etc..) * Search engine for all the memos stored * Customize color * Filter on the priorities of the memos: normal or urgent * Set PIN code to access the application All very simple and safe. No more post-it lost. Available in 4 languages: English, Italian, Spanish and French. Write me to translate the application into other languages.

Le migliori frasi d'auguri per ogni occasione. Solo frasi belle e selezionate da condividere con i tuoi amici. E da oggi puoi aggiungere la tua firma ai messaggi! Quante volte in corrispondenza di una ricorrenza non sapevate che frase usare per i vostri auguri? Ora questo non è più un problema! Con questa app potete scegliere tra le diverse categorie la frase d'auguri migliore e poi spedirla con l'apposito tasto di condivisione (via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, email, Google+, Twitter e altri social network). Oppure potete semplicemente trascriverla sopra un biglietto d'auguri. Mai più senza parole! Inoltre potrete salvare le frasi migliori premendo semplicemente la stellina in modo da averle sempre a portata di mano in ogni occasione. E' sufficiente accedere alla sezione Preferiti attraverso il menù per trovare tutte le frasi salvate. *** Categorie di auguri presenti *** - Compleanno - Matrimonio - Battesimo - Prima Comunione - Cresima - San Valentino - Laurea - Anniversario - Natale - Anno Nuovo - Epifania/Befana - Pasqua - Festa della Donna - Festa della Mamma - Festa del Papà - Onomastico - 18 anni - Nascita - Halloween - Pronta Guarigione Nuove categorie e nuove bellissime frasi saranno disponibili a breve. E per le principali categorie è presente un comodo servizio di notifica che ti ricorderà di fare gli auguri! Best sentences cards for every occasion. Only beautiful sentences and select to share with your friends. And now you can add your own signature to messages! How many times at a celebration not know that phrase to use for your wishes? Now this is no longer a problem! With this app you can choose between the different categories of the phrase best wishes and then send it with the appropriate key sharing (via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, email, Google+, Twitter and other social networks). Or you can just write it down on a birthday card. Never run out of words! Also you can save the best phrases by simply pressing the star to have them always at hand at every opportunity. It 'just go to the Favorites section through the menu to find all phrases saved. *** categories greetings present *** - Birthday - Marriage - Baptism - First Communion - Confirmation - Valentine Day - University Degree - Anniversary - Christmas - New Year - Epiphany / Befana - Easter Day - Women's Day - Mother's Day - Father's Day - Name day - 18 years - Birth - Halloween - Speedy Recovery New categories and new beautiful sentences will be available soon. And for the main categories is a convenient notification service that will remind you to do the best wishes!

Optical illusions: when your brain can't believe your eyes! The best collection of optical illusions with explanations for each of them. Amazing images subdivided by scientific categories and with the explanation of the mechanisms behind them. Discover how your brain is fooled by the sight of these amazing images! Play with your friends, try to beat your brain! And now you can share the images with your friends. The categories currently present are: * Motion and psychedelic illusions * Geometric illusions * Hidden images * Troxler's fading * Color illusions * Ambiguous illusions * Paradox illusions * Autostereograms * Illusory contours * Afterimages Optical Illusions (also called Visual Illusions) can use color, light and patterns to create images that can be deceptive or misleading to our brains. The information gathered by the eye is processed by the brain, creating a perception that in reality, does not match the true image. Perception refers to the interpretation of what we take in through our eyes. Optical illusions occur because our brain is trying to interpret what we see and make sense of the world around us. Optical illusions simply trick our brains into seeing things which may or may not be real. Illusions are constantly updated. Interesting news in the coming release.

Un modo nuovo e divertente per conoscere i proverbi e i modi di dire dialettali delle nostre regioni! Per ogni regione i proverbi sono accompagnati da una canzone e un'immagine tipica. Attraverso gli appositi bottoni è possibile conoscere la traduzione dal dialetto all'italiano o condividere i proverbi. Questa app raccoglie l'enorme esperienza popolare maturata nel tempo in ogni angolo d'Italia e la porta sul tuo dispositivo Android. Un modo carino e simpatico per mantenere vivo il patrimonio culturale delle nostre regioni. La raccolta dei proverbi e dei detti regionali è in continuo aggiornamento. Regioni: Valle d'Aosta, Piemonte, Liguria, Lombardia, Trentino Alto Adige, Veneto, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Emilia Romagna, Toscana, Marche, Umbria, Lazio, Abruzzo, Molise, Campania, Basilicata, Puglia, Calabria, Sicilia, Sardegna. A new and fun way to learn about proverbs and sayings dialect of our regions! For each region proverbs are accompanied by a song and a typical picture. Through the appropriate buttons, you can know the translation from Italian dialect or share proverbs. This app collects the enormous popular experience gained over the years in every corner of Italy and the door on your Android device. A cute and fun way to keep alive the cultural heritage of our region. The collection of proverbs and sayings regional is constantly updated. Region: Valle d'Aosta, Piedmont, Liguria, Lombardy, Trentino Alto Adige, Veneto, Friuli Venezia Giulia, Emilia Romagna, Tuscany, Marche, Umbria, Lazio, Abruzzo, Molise, Campania, Basilicata, Apulia, Calabria, Sicily and Sardinia.

Pranks present: - Monsters: terrible monsters and ghosts accompanied by screams of terror - Splatter: splashes of blood and terrible cries - Guns and glass: the feeling of being fired with the screen breaks - Guns and blood: the feeling of being fired and the blood spatter on the screen WARNING: The pranks can be impressive to some people, please use them responsibly.

The funniest pranks you've ever tried. Have fun with your friends. This app is invisible. The screen of your device will look normal but just tap the screen and appear suddenly a funny joke. Jokes: - Funny laughters - Broken screen - Sirens and alarms - Burps - Farts

According to the Acupuncture Meridian System, discovered by the first philosophers and practitioners of Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), the vital fluid named Qi builds and permeates all things in Nature, shaping mineral, plants and animals. Qi flows within the acupuncture meridian system and related organs with a 24-hour cycle and a 2-hour passage for each meridian/organ, with maximum and minimum peaks. Initially the author drew this diagram for his exclusive use and research, but seen that everyone who saw it asked him to get a copy, he began the procedure of the publication on the smartphone app market. Now it is considered one of the best conceived picture/diagram representing the 24-hour Qi-Flow in the 12 main meridians. Once started, the app rotates till stopping over the slice of the acupuncture meridian, in which the Qi is at its climax, according to the time zone of the smartphone country location.

Bus, tram, trolley bus or underground: finally an easy and intuitive APP to travel around Milan and its surroundings, without any data connection. Stop wasting time and money: calculate a timed path, know the correct ticket type and the best cost. Find every line, route, timetable, waiting times and closest stops. Discover with a sight on the offline map the position of parking areas, tickets resellers, "Bikemi" bike sharing, top-ups’ totems and more or localize an address offline. Star your most used stops as favorite. Wondering ATM Milano’s exclusive added features? Working offline (the user simply needs the internet to download the APP and the offline map, and, after that, to discover waiting times and route calculations – few Kb) with user-friendly systems of getting really useful information to optimize user time and especially to save money while moving on the territory. Features - The whole map of Milan offline - Find offline an addresses on the map - Information about stop waiting times of the means of transport, time schedules, routes and their possible variations. - Have a glance on waiting times of closest stops, to easily and rapidly choose the closest and nearest (both for location and time) mean of transport. - Find parking slots, ticket resellers, "Bikemi" bike sharing, top-ups’ totems and much more on the map - Access quickly your stops of interest by adding them to your favorites - Get the from/to route, with info about the lines to be used, stops to take or leave, traveling periods, ticket type required, costs and information about temporary work on your route. - Visualize an ordered stop list and the map of any bus/tram/trolley bus/underground line. Never miss a traffic/road work alert! I'll gift two downloads of the app to everyone who provides a new translation. Write to nosapp.storeATgmailDOTcom. Help translate ATM Milano into your language! http://transcommu.yasesprox.com/transcommu/Applications/View/3424

*** Radio Lab - La radio libera per tutti *** Fondare una radio non è una cosa semplice, soprattutto per chi nel farlo, pensa di poter diventare nodo di sviluppo e innovazione all’insegna della sperimentazione: una radio come luogo in cui si possano esercitare competenze acquisite e sperimentarne di altre.  Fare network in una città come Catania sembra una scelta scontata, ma chi lavora da tempo su questo territorio sa che non si tratta di un percorso semplice. In tal senso, la radio è un potente mezzo di comunicazione che, se unito al dispositivo che per eccellenza usiamo tutti i giorni, il cellulare, può amplificare di molto la sua potenza.   L’applicazione che vi mettiamo a disposizione, permette di ascoltare Radio Lab dal proprio cellulare e offre vari modi di interazione con la radio stessa sfruttando tutti i canali messi a disposizione dalle nuove tecnologie. Dalla chat, alla connessione con i social media. La chat nasce come una room pubblica dove è possibile accedere inserendo anche solo il proprio nick per poter entrare in contatto con gli altri utenti e con gli speaker. Il sistema prevede un servizio server che permetterà agli speaker di leggere e interagire in tempo reale con i messaggi degli ascoltatori. Tramite l'app potrai tra le altre cose: - Ascoltare la radio - Chattare con gli speaker e con gli altri utenti connessi - Visualizzare su una mappa, gli ascoltatori attorno a te - Visualizzare le pagine della radio sui social network e interagire con esse

Smash as many sweets as you can with Candy Bullet! Help Mr. Cannon to smash all the candies that will appear on your screen. Improve your game with fantastic power-ups. Collect all the coins that will appear! Smash more candies than your friends! Remember, you have no more than 10 bullets! Features: ———————————— - Tap the cannon to shoot a bullet - Smashed candies will release bullets to smash other candies - Tap the coins released by explosions to collect them - Buy power-ups in the shop with the coins you collect - Beat your friends’ scores! Are you ready for the challenge?! Have any comments or suggestions? Know how to make our game even better?! Write us at contact@redbitgames.it , and at our Facebook and VK pages "redBit games”! https://www.facebook.com/redBitgames

Haunted Manor 2 - The Horror behind the Mystery From the developers of Haunted Manor - The Secret of the Lost Soul, the new incredible adventure firmed by redBit games is out. "There are many stories but one common theme... stay away from the Haunted Manor". How brave are you young adventurer? We shall see! You are about to enter a land where anything and everything could happen. The house will test your heart, body and soul. If you can keep your composure, your mind open and your wits together, you may succeed in taming the house. "Haunted Manor 2" is an adventure game that will test your mental abilities and observation skills. You will have to explore the house and solve numerous, at times dark, often humorous but always challenging riddles in order to progress through the game. If you succeed, you will finally discover and maybe solve the mysterious secret behind the house... Using all of your logic and nerves will be the only way to get to the end of this fantastic horror themed adventure. This game is a one of a kind! Haunted Manor 2 has the best horror and frightening cinematic-like game experience ever created on the iPhone. Its graphics were created using the best 3D modeling techniques, film camera composition and high dynamic range photography techniques. The incredible graphics are complemented by carefully crafted 3D sounds effects and a gloomy horror theme that will accompany you through the game. These features, it's incredible story and its cleverly crafted challenges make "Haunted Manor 2" the best horror and frightening puzzle game ever presented on the iPhone. Features: * A Great Horror Story * Classic and intuitive point and tap gameplay. * Amazingly funny and clever puzzles. * Many different environments to discover & explore. * 3D Sounds e HDR photography techniques * Hidden Object game * Film camera composition * An interactive original & unique storyline. * Superb game design. * High-resolution graphics optimized for retina display. * Multiple languages, AutoSave and much more... Happy Halloween! Haunted Manor 2 is firmed by redBit games

Do you prefer Pizza to Cookies? After the big success of Cookie Clickers here's another dish in our menu! Pizza Clickers: The most exciting Pizza game is now on Android for smartphone and tablet. Be prepared for endless hours of fun and entertainment! The game is very simple: - Bake as many Pizza as you can by clicking or tapping on a giant Pizza as fast as you can. - As soon as you have enough pizza take a trip to the shop and use your pizza to buy upgrades to bake pizza even quicker! Pizza Clickers seemingly endless gameplay will allow you to play for an indefinite amount of time, or at least until you bake such as an extraordinary amount of pizza, your device will not be able to count them anymore. Become the Pizza Clickers Master.... be the first to bake 1 BILLION Pizza! Don't waste time... start now, your friends have already started and you need to catch up... quick! Challenge your friends on any Android device, iPhone, iPad and iPod (iOS). *** Google Play Games enabled for Pizza Leaderboard! ***

description: Escape the space blue squares and make the Red Bit survive as long as possible! [How to play] - Drag the RED square with your finger - Avoid the BLUE enemies, they kill you! - Don't touch the BLUE laser force field ATTENTION: The blue squares will be out of sight, covered by your finger. The true escape master will have a great spatial memory, pattern recognition and trajectory predicting ability. Survive as long as possible and compare and share your time score with other players or your friends with Google Play Games Leaderboard. Enjoy the new impossible Tron style game and... become the Red Bit Escape master!

Con Luceverde Roma hai a disposizione: • news in tempo reale • mappa interattiva • notiziario audio dalla Centrale Operativa Luceverde Luceverde Rome for traffic and road conditions in real time presents the most comprehensive info thanks to the collaboration between local police and Roma Capitale Automobile Club of Italy. Fino a 10GB di spazio GRATIS per salvare in automatico i contatti della tua rubrica e tutti i contenuti del tuo smartphone e TABLET. Per ogni amico che inviti a registrarti su TIM CLOUD ottieni 500 MB di spazio GRATIS. Potrai vedere i tuoi contenuti sempre e ovunque da PC ( http://cloud.tim.it ), Smartphone, TABLET e Smart TV e li potrai far conoscere a tutti i tuoi amici TIM Cloud. Scarica l'applicazione sul tuo telefonino ed Accedi a TIM Cloud. Se utilizzi la rete dati la registrazione è automatica. Se accedi in WiFi potrai accedere utilizzando la user id e password del sito TIM.it. Puoi impostare la password direttamente dall’APP o inviando un SMS con TIM “password” al 41901. La password deve essere numerica di 8 cifre; i numeri devono essere diversi tra di loro e non in ordine crescente o decrescente. Per informazioni e suggerimenti scrivici su timcloud@telecomitalia.it Potrai caricare i tuoi contenuti in modo veloce anche da PC su www.cloud.tim.it TIM Cloud è disponibile per tutti i clienti TIM maggiori di 18 anni. Up to 10GB of storage for FREE to automatically save the contacts in your address book and all the contents of your smartphone and tablet. For every friend you invite to register on TIM CLOUD get 500MB FREE. You will see your content anytime, anywhere from PC ( http://cloud.tim.it ), smartphones, tablets and smart TV and there you can let everyone know about your friends TIM Cloud. Download the app on your mobile phone and Login to TIM Cloud. If you use the network data recording is automatic. If you sign in WiFi access using the user id and password of the site TIM.it. You can set the password directly by the APA or by sending an SMS with TIM "password" to 41901. The password must be 8 numeric digits, the numbers must be different from each other and not in ascending or descending order. For information and suggestions write us on timcloud@telecomitalia.it You can upload your content quickly even from a PC to www.cloud.tim.it TIM Cloud is available for all TIM customers over 18 years.

description: Wifi file transfer between your smartphone or smartphone and computer by WiFi, is a File Manager that let you do Download/Upload files and folders using the same WiFi network or WiFi HotSpot function of smartphones, so you can exchange files with the speed of WiFi anywhere, also on the road. * Sending entire folders including subfolders it's possible only using the send button after selecting the data to be sent, instead, holding down a folder and then clicking on share you will use the sharing features integrated int the system that simply to send only the files in the folders. • The version for pc, mac and linux is available on producer's website ( http://www.bertolamidev.com ), to be able to exchange also data between your phone and computer and it’s totally free and without any restrictions. • It also works using a smartphone as "WiFi Router" and connecting the others to it (also works on the one used as a router). • Using functions for sending and receiving internal at the program, folders sent will be received completed of sub-folders, you can also send empty folders and subfolders, this is to ensure that you receive all that you've send as it is. • You do not need the introduction of any IP address but simply choose from a list of available users, you just need to type a possible password access. • It is a file manager in every aspect with which it is possible to select multiple files and folders. • It is integrated with other multimedia applications from which you can share contents such as images, videos and music. • Multiple and simultaneous download and upload in the background with progress in notification bar. IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM, INSTEAD OF PUTTING NEGATIVE FEEDBACK IMMEDIATELY, PLEASE CONTACT US ON bertolamidev@gmail.com , YOU WILL BE HELPED IN A DAY. WiTransfer was projected to send and receive files and entire folders not only on common WiFi networks (Create by physical routers) but also on those created by devices using the "Wireless Router" function that in different devices take different names such as "wifi hotspot "," portable hotspot network "," WiFi Tether " but it is the same function with wich a device creates a wifi network and the others can be connected to, generally used to share the internet connection of the device.

For those who use the desktop version is indispensable that also download the new version from bertolamidev.com

description: Are you smart enough to solve this game ? "Light Up The Bulbs" is highly addictive logic/brain/puzzle game which guarantees you will spend few days in playing! The point of the game is to connect (light up) all bulbs. You can connect only horizontal, vertical and diagonal. There are 50 levels for now, but more will be added soon. Each level has different combination of bulbs, so it's hard to light up all of them. "Light Up The Bulbs" is absolutely free. FEATURES: ★ FREE TO PLAY! ★ HD Graphics! ★ Awesome random piano sounds! ★ 50 EASY AND HARD LEVELS! ★ Earn stars for solving levels quickly! ★ Hint button. ★ Undo button. ★ DOUBLE BULBS! If you enjoy logic / brain / puzzle games, "Light Up The Bulbs" is the right game for you! Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Light-Up-The-Bulbs/650304968338424

Learning program to practice Roman numerals. Two possibilities for play. From Roman Numeral to decimal and decimal to Roman number. From the main menu select the option you want, you click on the play button and the program randomly generates a number that must be converted. Click the Like button and tell you if your answer is correct. If the answer is incorrect the program will show you the solution.

If you got Android 4.3 or 4.4 search for BLUETOOTH AND WIFI UNLOCKER F2. On discount until the end of Febryary 2014. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=joel.sternet.se.full2 Unlock the Phone Screen Password or Pin with WiFi , Bluetooth or Timer. This is the full version of BtWiFiUnlocker. Please drop me an email with your comments and questions before you comment and rate this application. Uninstall the free version before installing the full one. After upgrade use "force stop" within the app. The use of the Android Lock Screen mechanism protects against unauthorized use of your phone. A disadvantage of the lock mechanism is that you need to provide your password as soon as the screen dims. By using the BtWifiUnlocker (Bluetooth and Wifi Unlocker) your phone automatically unlocks the screen password when connecting to your selected Wifi network(s) and/or Bluetooth device(s). By default Auto Login is disabled. If the device is locked then the screen password is required to unlock the screen. The phone will stay unlocked as long as it is connected to the selected WiFi network or Bluetooth. From V3.x.x Auto Login is supported (via menu -> Security) When the device is being disconnected from a Wifi network, it takes around 50 seconds before the screen gets lock. Important notes to Android 4.x – BtWiFiUnlocker will not work if you have other application which forces you to set a pin or a password. For instance, Mail program configured with Exchange ActiveSync. - To change the password or pin you MUST use the password tab within BtWiFiUnlocker. If you change the password or pin via Settings -> Security -> Screen lock then BtWiFiUnlocker might change it back! Uninstalling BtWiUnlocker on Android 4.x Select Settings -> Security -> Device administrators Uncheck BtWiFiUnlocker Now select -> Deactivate Now you can uninstalling it the normal way. You are welcome with any question or problem regarding this application – please send me mail. Keywords: lock unlock timer WiFi Wi-Fi Bluetooth unlocker autologin auto login password screen

Распоред на часови за сите основци и средношколци. *Свесен сум за постоењето на мал проблем кој привремено и тотално случајно ја исклучува апликацијата. Се надевам дека ќе успеам да го лоцирам и поправам во брзо време. Благодарам на разбирањето. :) Апликацијата нуди: - Распоред на часови за секој ден од понеделник до сабота. - Време на почеток и крај на секој час. - Додавање на белешки (потсетници) за одреден предмет на одредена дата. - Внесување на оценки за секој предмет. - Пресметување просек од предметите за кои ќе внесете оценка. - Обележување на часот кој трае во моментот. - Избор на 2 смени: прва и втора. - Додавање, бришење и изменување на листата со предмети. - Додавање, бришење и изменување на одморите. - Подесување на времетраењето на часовите и одморите. - Подесување на почетокот на првата или втората смена. -------------------------- Raspored na chasovi za Android. Raspored na casovi za Android. Raspored na casovi.
release_text: - Додавање белешки за часовите со можност да изберете дата. - Нов, подобрен, начин на внесува на предмети. - Додадено „свајпање“ помеѓу табовите. - Подобрувања во дизајнот. - Поправка на неколку познати багови.

그저 평범한 직장인이던 당신! 따분한 현실에서 벗어나, 출장간 곳 왕자님들과 때로는 후끈하고 & 때로는 순수한 러브 스토리를 즐겨보세요! 일본 최대 연애게임 대표주자중 하나인 아리스메틱이 최고 인기 여성향 연애 시뮬레이션 [왕자님과 불편한 계약결혼]을 발표했습니다! 각기 다른 4가지 왕국에서 펼쳐질 당신의 짜릿 달콤 요염한 러브스토리! 멋진 두 명의 왕자님과 삼각관계!? 당신이 마지막에 선택하는 건 누구―? 왕자님과 알콩달콩 연애도 하고, 공주님으로서 엘레강스를 쌓아 멋진 아바타 드레스를 입고 사교계에 데뷔하세요! 【스토리】 어학력이 뛰어난 당신은, 거래처의 파트너로서 해외 저명인사가 모이는 파티에 동행한다. 거기에서 만난것은 멋지고 지적인 왕자님!? 화려한 그들에게 둘러쌓여 당황한 당신. 조금은 강압적인 그들의 에스코트에 따라, 꿈같은 하룻밤을 보낸다. 그리고, 다음날―. 귀국하려 했지만, 이유모를 일로 심사에 걸려 엄청난 위기가 찾아오고! 그런 당신을 구해준 것은, 어제의 그 왕자님......!? 하지만 도움을 준 사례로 그가 내민 것은 계약결혼 제의―. 그의 명령에는 절대 복종!? 화려한 거짓 로열웨딩 앞에 기다리고 있는 것은, 진실한 사랑? 아니면.... ■라시스카야 【능동적인 음흉한 왕자:유리】 부드러운 얼굴 속에 능동적인 부분이 아른거리는 음흉한 왕자님. 첫눈에 반해 계약결혼!? 날 좋아한다니, 기분이 나쁘진 않지만....... 서로 안지 얼마 안됐는데 너무 앞서가네−−!? 【순진무구 힐링 왕자:에리세】 성격은 정반대인 유리의 동생. 순진하고 언제나 싱글벙글. 귀여운 남동생이 생긴 기분이지만, 어린애같고 스킨쉽도 너무 많아!? 저 큰 몸으로 내게 강요하면…… ■프라네리아 【강제적인 자기중심 왕자:크로드】 금발에 푸른 눈, 강제적이고 자기중심인 것 빼고는 완벽하고 잘생긴 왕자님. 갑자기 게약결혼을 하게되고, 당신은 성녀가 되라고 강요당하고……. 그런 당신에게 그가 새기는 것은 사랑의 키스마크―?! 그가 당신의 모든 것을 억지로 빼앗아 버린다――!? 【미스테리한 성직자:루갈】 말투는 예의가 바르지만, 무슨 생각을 하고 있는건지 알 수 없는 추기경. 크로드가 적시하고 있는 교황파의 중심인물로, 가까이 하지 말라고 들었지만……。 진짜 성녀라는 것을 의심받아, 그런 곳마저 조사당하면――! ■잉그레이즈 【성미강한 새침데기 왕자:시릴】 왕자같지 않은 말투와 강한 태도는, 부끄러움을 감추기 위함?! 말투는 틱틱대는 주제에, 태도는 어딘가 어색하다……. "그러면 네가 나를 좋아하면 되잖아" 라니, 대체 무슨 뜻이지――!? 【호쾌한 연상남 왕자：메이나드】 반항기의 아들, 시릴을 상냥하게 때로는 엄하게 돌보는 아빠. 아들과의 사이는 꽤 나쁜 것 같지만 당신에게도 부드럽게 대해주는데....... 어른스런 여유를 가진 섹시한 중년미의 그에게 무심코 마음을 의지하게 된다......? ■튤키에 【성실하고 굳센 흑발의 미남 :아세나】 다정하고 친절하지만, 어딘가 벽이 느껴지는 그. 그런 그가 품은 슬픈 과거와, 함께할수록 점점 좁혀져가는 우리의 거리―. 성실하고 굳센 그이지만, 그런 그가 당신의 매력에 무너진다―!? 【든든한 보디가드이자 호쾌한 친구：이스카】 때로는 호쾌한 왕자님으로, 때로는 듬직한 경호원으로 당신을 지켜주는 그. 절친한 친구의 부인이라는 걸 알면서도, 당신의 매력에 빠져가는데―. "바람피운다는 거, 말 안하면 모를텐데?" 은빛 머리칼을 적시고 당신을 유혹하는 그에게, 당신은―!? ※기본 플레이는 무료입니다. 일부 유료 아이템을 구매하시면 게임을 유리하게 진행하실 수 있게됩니다.

description: このアプリは、世界で最もセキュリティーレベルの高いと言われるメッセンジャーアプリ(Telegram)の初の日本語版クライアントアプリ、セキュリティーメッセンジャー(Secure MSG)です。 Telegramは元々、 ロシアのセキュリティ当局 や ＮＳＡ(アメリカ国家安全保障局) 等の政府の情報機関等からでもメッセージ内容を盗まれないように作成されたアプリです。 【セキュリティ】 サーバーに保存されたメッセージや個人情報は、世界最高峰の暗号化が行われ安全に保存されております。 しかもEnd to End機能を利用したシークレットチャットでは、端末同士を直接接続するためにサーバーにログインすらせずにチャットができるようになります。当然サーバーにはなんのログも残りません。 また自動的にアプリ内からもメッセージが削除できるようになっており全ての痕跡を消去することが可能です。 【その他特徴】 ・メッセージデータを最小化することでより高速に送受信可能です。 世界中にサーバーを設置しており最速の地域からデータを送受信することで最高速を担保しております。 ・最大200名迄グループチャットが可能です。 ・一度に１ギガまでのデータを送受信できます。 ・クラウドベースのため色々な端末からログインすることが可能です。 【補足事項】 ＊弊社はTelegram LLCのＡＰＩを利用して作成されたアプリです。 アプリ自体は本家のアプリプログラムを日本に翻訳したのみでまったく本家と同じサービスを提供しております。 １日で作成したアプリのために翻訳に不備がある可能性があります。 もし問題ございましたらご連絡いただければ幸いです。 ＊ドイツへの盗聴問題等の影響もあり、本家のtelegramは現在毎日450万以上のＤＬがあるようです。 ＊こちらのサービスの脆弱性を発見することができた場合には、Telegram LLCから約2000万円(20万ドル)が進呈されます。 現状誰も獲得できておりませんが、深刻な問題を発見したロシアの方に約1000万円(10万ドル)進呈した模様です。 ＊telegram LLCは非営利団体が運営しております。 ＊永久に無料です。 【参照記事】 http://roshianow.jp/science/2013/08/15/44575.html http://www.bloomberg.co.jp/news/123-N1I7CX6K50YF01.html http://www.socialnetworking.jp/?p=113166 http://jp.techcrunch.com/2014/02/25/20140224telegram-saw-8m-downloads-after-whatsapp-got-acquired/ ◎仕事関連のメッセージを送受信する場合は是非こちらをご利用することを推奨いたします。 Japanese version of the client application first messenger app is said to be a high security level of the world's most (Telegram), security Messenger this app is (Secure MSG). Telegram is created so as not to steal the message content information from any agency of the government NSA and security authorities originally, of Russia (U.S. National Security Agency) of , etc. It is an application was. [security] Personal information or messages that are stored on the server, has been securely stored encryption of the world's highest mountain is performed. And the secret chat using the End to End feature, chat will be able to without even log in to the server in order to connect a terminal directly to each other. What of the log does not remain on the server of course. In addition, it is possible to erase all traces of the message is adapted to be removed from within the app automatically. [Other Features] • You can send and receive faster by minimizing the message data. We have to ensure the fastest by sending and receiving data from the area of ​​the fastest has set up a server in the world. · 200 people is possible for up to a group chat. • You can send and receive data up to 1 giga at a time. · It is possible to log in from a terminal for a variety of cloud-based. [Additional Notes] * We are apps that have been created using the API of the Telegram LLC. Application itself provides the same services as the head family at all only translated into Japanese apps program of the head family. There may be a defect in the translation for the application that you created in the 1st. I am happy if you contact us if you have any problem then. * There is also the impact of such eavesdropping problem to Germany, there seems to be a DL of 4.5 million or more each day currently telegram of the head family. * If you were able to discover the vulnerability of the service of this place, will be awarded the ($ 200,000) about 20 million yen from Telegram LLC. Current situation no one has been able to win, but it is likely that for those of Russia have found a serious problem about 10 million yen was ($ 100,000) award. * Telegram LLC, I run a non-profit organization. * It is free forever. description: A simple application which records a memorandum for meeting, such as the when, where, who, and what. - Send data to all participants via e-mail application - Export data to external applications (such as saving to Evernote) - Save to SD Card - Search data (full-text searching) The intended purpose of this application is to be used by someone who often have meetings outside, writing memo on a train back home then send it out to all participants. Other features - Title and location can be selected from previous record (from the past 50 data) - Date and time can be entered using the dialogue box that appears when you tap the button, as well as using the counter screen that appears when you long press the button. * Please make backup copies of all your important data. The application developer is not responsible for any data loss or any damage caused by use of this application.

app_name: アクアリウムの海水魚図鑑 ATLAS 1200種+α
description: 世界中の海水魚を手のひらで検索!観賞魚として流通する海水魚1454匹を収録した、便利な図鑑アプリケーションです。 ●このアプリは、海水魚の飼育情報誌「マリンアクアリスト」No.50カタログ特別号「アクアリウムの海水魚図鑑」を元に制作されました。アプリ版には充実の検索機能を搭載。重い本を持ち歩くことなく、どこでも簡単に魚が調べられます。 ●収録している魚は約1200種。さらに幼魚や雌雄、カラーバリエーションも含め、合計1454個体を紹介しています。 ●「索引(50音別/学名)」「仲間別に探す」「名前を入力して検索」など様々な方法で魚を調べることができます。 ●気になる魚のチェックに便利な「お気に入り登録」や写真の自動再生が行える「フォトギャラリー」など図鑑を楽しむ機能も充実。 ●「飼育環境例の紹介」「初心者にオススメの50種」「器具・用語説明」「病気についての基礎知識」など、アプリ版だけの独自コンテンツもご用意しました。 初心者から上級者まで、アクアリストの皆さまのお役に立つアプリケーションです! Search by palm saltwater fish around the world! Was recorded saltwater fish 1454 animals for distribution as ornamental fish, it is a useful picture book application. ● this app, saltwater fish of breeding information magazine "Marine Aqua list" No.50 catalogs special issue "aquarium of sea fish picture book" was produced to the original. Equipped with a search function of enhancement is the app version. Without having to carry around a heavy book, it will be examined fish anywhere easily. ● about 1200 species of fish that are recorded. Furthermore juvenile and male and female, including color variations, we have introduced a total of 1454 individuals. ● "index (50 sound another / scientific name)", "Search by fellow", "search by entering the name", etc. It is possible to examine the fish in a variety of ways. ● perform automatic playback convenient to check the fish "bookmark" or photos anxious function to enjoy the picture book, such as "Photo Gallery" is also substantial. ● "breeding introduction example environment," "50 species recommended for beginners," "equipment and Glossary of Terms" on "basic knowledge about the disease," such as, we also offer its own content of only app version. From beginner to advanced, are you useful application of our Aqua list!
release_text: ・新たに魚を約200種追加 ・アプリが強制終了する問題を修正 ・一部の魚の関連情報が誤っていた問題を修正 ・インターフェイスの改善

description: The smart phone in use is to a motion detection camera! It is the application which detects a motion of the object reflected in a camera and reproduces picture preservation and a beep sound. Please install in few places, a fixed stand, etc. of vibration in the case of use, and use it. The camera is equivalent to both the front camera and the back camera. Please use a camera, changing according to a use. During surveillance, a slide indication of the picture when an object is detected is given for every second. After a stop, if a detection picture is clicked, an expansion display is possible and a picture is saved at external memories (SD card etc.). The picture serves as a JPEG file format. We recommend you to use it during surveillance, inserting a charge adapter, in order to consume many batteries. Since I have the function to terminate application if generation of heat is detected so that a smart phone may not be damaged owing to generation of heat of a battery, please understand. Please do not abuse this application by any means. Since we do not take any responsibility, please understand. [Use scene] ■ When you would like to take a picture of the object which moves continuously ■ The simple security camera in a home etc. ■ Invasion detection of invasion prohibition area etc., warning [Function] ■ Beep sound I sound a beep sound simultaneously with detection. ■ Log preservation I save the detected time by text format. ■ Power-saving mode I lower the luminosity of a display during surveillance and hold down consumption of a battery. ■ Picture quality I can adjust to low image quality, a standard, and three high-definition steps. ■ Battery level I terminate an application, when battery residual quantity becomes below a preset value. However, I do not end during charge. ■ Preservation number of sheets I set up the preservation number of sheets of the detected picture. ■ Detection sensitivity Adjustment of three steps of response levels is possible. [Correspondence OS] 2.3 or more Android(s) [Confirmed terminal of operation] Sony Ericsson Xperia SO-03D SHARP SH-01D Samsung GARAXY NEXUS SC-04D Samsung GARAXY S III SC-06D acer ICONIA TAB A500 ASUS Slider SL101
