description: #Summary Simple cache Cleaner is an application that can easily erase cache. Erase cache and make the operation of an Android device comfortable ! An easy way to handle it ! Activate the application, then just push a button of "Clean". #Functions - Bulk deletion of cache. - Sorting - Uninstalls the application - Displays a cache size of each application - Transition to the list of services activated - Simultaneous termination with "Cleen button". #Features 1. Non-resident software-Andriod2.3 or more Most of popular cache-cleaners are resident type, therefore they continue to be being activated and be consuming memory. But "Simple Cache Cleaner" is a non-resident type. This is designed to quit itself quickly after having terminated an application by "HOME button" as well as "RETURN button". You would see the big difference, if compared to other applications. "Simple Cache Cleaner" does not implement such contradictory function that "cache cleaning" itself continues to be a resident, and consume memory. Mainly, the following function would never be implemented now and in the future. - One-tap-cleaning by widget - Automatic-deleting or informing, by supervising memory consumption in background. 2. Inter working with "Task Killer" Inter working function with the simple and high-peformance task killer, "Simple Task Killer", is equipped. By this function, only one button operation can delete cache and terminate a task, it is very recommended to try this inter working function. *: In order to enable the inter working function, you would be required to install this application, as well as "Simple Task Killer". #Q&A Q: Can this application save power ? A: This application is designed for the purpose of intentional releasing of memory, which has been occupied by other application. It is not for enhancing the effeciency of saving power. Q: What is cache ? Is it better to delete ? A: Cache is the area for an application to temporarily stores its frequent use data. A lot of Android devices do not have abundant amount of memory. Therefore, the operation of an Android device could become comfortable by regularly deleting cache. Q: Doesn't this implement an widget ? A: The widget is always a resident, so "Simple Cache Cleaner" would not implement it now and in the future. Q: Doesn't this delete memory automatically ? A: Like the widget, that function is always a resident, so "Simple Cache Cleaner" does not implement it now, and also wouldn't have any plan to implement a resident function in the future. Q: A short-cut has disappeared, why ? A: When being moved into SD card, a short-cut may disappear. This seems to occur in some kind of devices by malfunction of itself. In such a case, it is recommended not to move this application to SD card. Q: It has disappeared from the notification-bar , why ? A: This has occured by the specification of Android OS. When this has once been moved into SD memory, that application will not become active again even after the device would have been re-booted. Q: The cache does not seem to have been deleted, why ? A: This problem may be caused by distinct malfunction of some kind of Andriod devices. If this problem could not been resolved even after re-installing this application, please avoid to use it.

#Summary Simple-Task-Killer enforces the applications to terminate their tasks simply and in safety. Then it increases available memory, improves activity of the device, eventually minimizes battery consumption. Free Simple Task Killing tool, is this ! It has been designed for even beginners of an intelligent-phone to handle intuitively ! #Functions - Momentarily termination of tasks - Transition to a detail page of application - Transition to an uninstall pane of application - Displays a ratio of CPU occupation - Displays available memory - Displays a quantity of remainder of the battery - The ignore-list which is used for registering applications to be excluded or masked - Registers recommended applications into the ignore-list - Terminates both applications and STK itself #Features 1. Non-resident software-Andriod2.3 or more Popular task-killing softwares are continuing to be activated, and consuming memories. However, STK goes on the other way ! STK quits itself very fast just after terminating its action by a RETURN or HOME button. Task-killing function itself continues to be a permanent resident ? A nuisance, isn't it ? Such a contradictory feature shouldn't be implemented. Just for this reason STK has been designed like that. Especially, the following function would never be implemented now and in the future. One-tap-killing by using widget Automatic-killing by supervising the activity of an application in background Though the paid STK has similar one-tap-killing function to an widget, but big difference is non-resident behavior that has been fulfilled by using a quite unique short-cut. The users of ICS or later (Android 4.0 or more), can use this function, just try it ! 2. Fastest operation The operation getting a task list is very much faster than that of pre-installed other task-killing applications or task managers ! 3. Particular looks A ratio of CPU occupation, available memory, a quantity of remainder of the battery, are shown on a display. That isn't cool enough !? 4. Manages active applications By selecting a task from the task list pane, the management pane will appear, then you can uninstall an application or delete cache memory. Therefore you would never be bothered to open the application management pane. #Q&A Q. Want to kill application by one-toutch. Doesn't STK implement an widget ? A. An widget is always a resident, so STK does not implement it. Paid STK is equipped with a one-toutch killing function. (Android4.0 or more) Q. Even after terminating a application, however it immediately appears again. Why ? A. This is caused by the specification of Android OS. The pre-installed application which belongs to the configuration type, that needs to be continuing activated such as Facebook, is structured to reboot automatically . Any function can terminate operation of an application temporarily, but no function would be able to re-terminate such application that reboots itself even after terminated once. Q. Want STK that will not re-boot an application. A. STK's basic concept is not to implement a resident function, therefore STK has no plan to implement a supervisory function that requires an application to suppress self-reboot. Q. How to use the ignore-list ? A. Those applications registered in the ignore-list will disappear from the application list, which appears after STK is activated. This means that STK ignores whether they are operating or not. In other words they have already been put outside of STK's management. Such applications that need to be always activated as "An alarm clock" and "E-mail", should not to be registered in the ignore-list to avoid a risk of terminating their operation. When add an application in the ignore-list, first tap its name in the application pane, then next pane will pop up, finally tap "Add to ignore list".

description: Picapicameraは、特別なピカピカにカメラを向ける事で、撮影に使える可愛いフレームやアイテムを受信出来るアプリです。 さらに受信したアイテムや自分の作ったメッセージと一緒の写真を、ピカピカの画面点滅で、その場で相手に届けることができます。 ☆いろいろなイベントやスポットで設置される、ピカピカにカメラを向けてみよう。　そのイベント独自のアイテムがコレクションできるよ！ ☆公式サイトで、追加アイテムをピカピカで配布中！　PCなどで、下記サイトを表示させて、アイテムを追加しよう！ ☆可愛いアイテムやコレクションした素材を使った写真を撮ってツィートすることもできるよ! ☆こっそりと秘密のメッセージを送ったり、アイテムでおしゃれに変身したり使い方はみんなのアイディア次第でどんどん広がるよ! ☆初めて会った仲間どうし、メアドなんて知らなくても撮影した写真が、その場で自分に届けてもらえるし、同時に何人ものメッセージやアイテムを撮影出来るのでみんなでワイワイ楽しんじゃおう! ☆.:*:.:*:・☆ 主な機能 ☆.:*:.:*:・☆ 1.カメラによる可視光通信のメッセージ受信・撮影・保存機能 ・同時に複数の光源、ディスプレイから受信して、画像やメッセージの表示 ・受信メッセージつきの写真を撮影・保存 ・撮影相手に写真の自動配布(相手のメールアドレスやソーシャルID設定不要) ・受信メッセージのタップで、サイトに簡単アクセス(リンクつきメッセージのみ) ・受信アイテムの位置はドラッグで調整できます。 ・将来の、サイネージ、LED、TVなどを使ったメッセージ送信にも対応済み。 ・「コレクション機能」対応のピカピカは、保存して、再利用することができます。 ※下記の公式Webサイトには、 　　　・すぐに受信体験が出来る可視光通信体験ページ 　　　・ピカピカによる追加アイテム配布ページ 　　　　があります。 　　　　 http://www.casio-isc.com/ja/demo/ 2.スマートフォンの表示を使った可視光通信のメッセージ送信機能 ・30種類のアイテムからデザインを選び、メッセージを自由に作成可能 ・21個の定型文から選択も可能 ・コレクション機能で追加されたアイテムも送信可能 3.その他機能 ・撮影写真の簡単メール送信、twitter投稿、facebook投稿 ・相手がいない場合でも、保存されているコレクションアイテムを使ってフキダシ写真が作成できます。 ☆.:*:.:*:・☆ どんなしくみ? ☆.:*:.:*:・☆ カメラとディスプレイで実現した可視光通信技術に、位置情報とクラウドサービスを組み合わせて実現しています。 最新情報は、Webサポートページ( http://www.casio-isc.com/ )、もしくは、ピカピカメラFacebook公式ページ（ https://www.facebook.com/CasioPicapicameraJapan ）をご覧ください。 ※本アプリは Android 4.0 以降に対応しますが、機種によりご利用いただけない場合があります。 ※可視光通信機能は、周囲の明るさの条件によって受信できないことがあります。 ※位置情報を利用しますので、設定は必ず「オン」にしてください。 ※通信機能を利用します。 ※ピカピカメラのサービスではお客様の個人情報にかかわる情報は蓄積、譲渡、転売など致しておりません。詳しくは利用規約をご覧ください。

app_name: 小学生手書き漢字ドリル1006 - はんぷく学習シリーズ
description: 教育指導書籍や教育委員会のホームページ、また多くのレビューサイトでも取り上げられている人気の漢字学習アプリです。 このアプリ1つで小学校の6年間に習う全ての漢字を学習することができます。 メニューは学年ごとに分かれていて、1回につき漢字の書き取り問題を5題出題。 満点をとると「よくできました」や「免許皆伝」マークが付きます。 大変シンプルで使いやすい設計になっていますので、 長い期間、楽しく継続して利用することができます。 また、それぞれの漢字が持つ意味を覚えやすいような問題文、語彙が増えるような問題文を多く採用しました。 答えボタンを押した際には、漢字の書き順も表示。なぞり書きで漢字の書き取り練習ができます。 このアプリを開発した学校ネット株式会社は、全国4000学校が利用する学習ウェブサイト「あしたね」を運営しています。また学習アプリ「はんぷく」学習シリーズは、この漢字忍者アプリをはじめ、累計400万ダウンロードを超える人気シリーズになっています。 不具合を発見された方は、アプリ内のお問い合わせからご連絡を頂けますと幸いです。 本ソフトウエアはパナソニックの手書き文字認識エンジン”楽ひら(R)”を利用しています。 楽ひらはパナソニック株式会社の登録商標です。
release_text: Ver 2.13.1 ・いくつかのバグを修正しました Ver 2.5 ・お問い合わせボタンが表示されないバグを修正しました ・小3の巻 その39で、「祭」を問う問題文が、「お祭りり」となっている誤りを修正しました。ご指摘ありがとうございました Ver 2.2.1 ・一部の機種における、カテゴリ選択ボタンが表示されない不具合を修正しました（ご指摘を頂きありがとうございました） ・アプリに収録されている全問題正解後、表彰状が表示されるようになりました ・その他、いくつかのバグを修正しました

Clipbox now offers you an image search app! “Clipbox Image Search” is a specialized image search app. Enter any keywords of your choice to find the perfect image! Tons of results! You'll surely be able to find your favorite images. “Clipbox Image Search” gives you all the features for free. ◇Image Search◇ Find your favorite celebrities or images that interest you at the first attempt. The app is perfect not only for those who like to collect images but also those who want to kill some time. “Search History” provides you with quick access to your previous search results. ◇File Management◇ There is no limit to the number of folders you can create. Set a password on a folder to keep it hidden or change the folder color to make it an original album. ◇Other Convenient Features◇ “Clipbox Image Search” offers your many more features! - Bulk extract images - Copy image URL - Send images via Email - Lock (Hide) * Please note that you may use each image for personal use only. ◆Supported OS◆ ・Android 4.0 or later If you have any suggestions or questions, please feel free to contact our support team. image-search@clipbox-official.com

app_name: 漢字能力検定 あなたは何級？
description: 日本漢字能力検定協会協力による、過去実際に漢検で出題された10級から1級までの漢字問題に答えてあなたの漢字能力を診断します。 手書き文字認識入力機能を使用し、手書きでラクラク漢字を入力。 日本漢字能力検定協会公認の教科書体フォントで読みやすく親しみやすい書体で 学習できます(準1級・1級は除く)。 あなたの漢検力は何級レベル?家族や友達と一緒にみんなで挑戦しよう! ■有料版について 漢字をもっと勉強したくなったら、各級の問題(有料版)に挑戦! 実力を伸ばしたい級をこの無料アプリから簡単購入! 小学一年生レベルの10級から、大学・一般程度の超難関レベルの準1級・1級まで 好きな級を別々に購入できます。 1つの級に平均2,500問、全級で27,000問収録しています。 ※10級から2級までは漢検で使用される教科書体フォントを使用していますが、準1・1級は実際に漢検に出題されるフォントとは異なりますのであらかじめご了- 承ください。 ※診断結果はあくまでも参考結果です。実際の漢検の合格を保証するものではありません。 ※手書き認識入力システムはパナソニック社製「楽ひら」を使用しています。 ※複数の漢検の検定問題を収録しているため、同じ漢字を使用した問題が出題されることがあります。 ※本アプリに収録されている内容は、タブレット用「漢検 あなたは何級？Tab」と同内容のものです。有料版を購入される場合は、それぞれ別に課金が発生します。 【有料問題購入後の基本機能】 問題を購入すると漢字学習に便利なさまざまな機能をご利用できます。 1)検定機能 各級のすべての項目から出題するオリジナル検定です。40分コースと10分コースを選べ 一定の基準で合格・不合格を判定します。 2)漢字訓練 各級の多種多様な漢字問題を選んで学習します。間違えた問題や気になる問題を 保存できるので後で復習できます。 3)MY漢検機能 チェックしておいた漢字問題を呼び出して集中的に補習する機能です。 4)成績閲覧機能 どれだけ漢字を覚えたか、達成率と総合力を確認する機能です。 5)実力テスト あなたの漢字能力がどの程度なのか確認する20問の小テストです。 =収録問題について= 本アプリに収録されている問題は平成23年度迄の検定に対応した過去問が 収録されております。平成24年度以降の検定情報は日本漢字能力検定協会 ホームページをご確認下さい。 ●ご使用に際して 【文字認識について】 手書きした文字の形や書き順などによっては認識精度が 悪くなることがあります。 ■オススメモバイルサイト『漢検モバイル』 http://ksp.kentei.bz ■Twitterでも漢検！『今日の漢検』 難読漢字や当て字、故事ことわざや四字熟語の問題を毎日無料で配信します。 いますぐ @kanken_today をフォロー。 「漢検」「日本漢字能力検定」は登録商標です。 Digital world clock application. This is a paid version without ads. Please try the free version first. There are three types of widgets, you can display any time zone. [4x1(Dual)] widgets are displayed simultaneously in any time zone and local time. Features: * Support for daylight saving time. * Time Zone Converter. * Multiple clocks support. * Displays the second. * Show time difference between local time. * 4x1, 2x1 size widget

description: ゲーム感覚でアナログ時計の読み方を学べるアプリ。 いつの間にか時計が読めるようになります。 時計の読み方だけではなく、何分後(前)は？という「時計の計算」もあります。 時計の針が動いて正解を示すので 時計の動きの感覚も身につきます。 子供だけではなく、大人も脳トレになります。 ※正誤表示の際、音が鳴るようになっています。 音量は、本体の音量ボタンで調節できます。 Application to learn how to read an analog clock in the game sense. I will be able to read the clock too soon. Is not only how to read the clock, how many minutes after (before) it? There is also a "Calculating Clock" and. Because it shows the correct clock at moving Sense of the movement of the watch also sticks to the body. Is not only children, adults will also be brain training. ※ In the case of errata display, sound is turned to sound. The volume, I can adjust the volume button on the body.

description: 【ビタッ！とジャグラー】は、ホールで大人気の スロット「ニューアイムジャグラーＥＸ」をモチーフにした 目押しゲームアプリです。 スロット初心者の目押し練習にも役立つこと間違いなし！？ ■3種類のゲームモードを搭載！！ ・『GOGO!チャレンジ』 　次々と指示される図柄を素早く揃えてハイスコアを目指そう！ 　制限時間は５５秒！！ ・『練習モード』 　目押しの練習用モードです。 　サブリールを確認しながら、目押しのコツを覚えちゃおう！ ・『ビタ押しチャレンジ』 　リール制御なしの上級者向けのオリジナルモード。 　「７」図柄をビタッ！と止めて高得点を狙おう！ また『GOGO!チャレンジ』や『ビタ押しチャレンジ』では、 ハイスコア獲得時に「Twitter」へ投稿することが出来ます。 スコアをみんなに自慢しよう！

DigiSpeed GPS speedometer application is a free software for Android devices with built-in GPS antenna. It acts as a normal digital speedo, which you may find in any car, showing the velocity of the vehicle you are in in kph and mph. In miles per hour (MPH) You can set the app to kmh or mph. Some features of the speed app include: GPS Coordinates -Shows you your current GPS position - Longitude, Latitude and Altitude, as well as your top speed. GPS Speed -Your current speed and your maximum velocity, according to the satellites. Units -Both the analog and digital speedometer views can be either in miles or kilometers per hour. HUD - heads up display -Car HUD styled speed, which will show you your velocity digitally with large numbers. 0-100 kmh (0-60 mph) time -Measure you car acceleration from zero to sixty mph (or zero to hundred kmh). You just have to turn on the GPS, enter the acceleration measurement menu and wait for a satellite fix. Once ready to go the status will be changed to "GPS READY". The app automatically detects if you are stationary or moving, so you just have to go. Once the mark(100 for kmh, 60 for mph) is reached the timer will stop. If you stop again the timer will restart and you can perform the test again. *Permanently set to KM/H or MPH. *Move to SD card *Automatic screen size on all devices *This is an ad-supported application. The ads are located on the bottom of the screen.

Hindustani is the native language of most people living in Delhi, Uttar Pradesh, Uttarakhand, Chhattisgarh, Himachal Pradesh, Chandigarh, Bihar, Jharkhand, Madhya Pradesh, Haryana, and Rajasthan.[6] Modern Standard Hindi is one of the official languages of India

If you have font issue, read this: http://honsoapps.appspot.com/1/ma.html Wikipedia: Japanese (日本語 Nihongo?, [nihõŋɡo], [nihõŋŋo]) is an East Asian language spoken by about 125 million speakers, primarily in Japan, where it is the national language. It is a member of the Japonic (or Japanese-Ryukyuan) language family, whose relation to other language groups, particularly to Korean and the suggested Altaic language family, is debated.

Khmer dictionary and font plugin for Multiling O Keyboard. This is not an independent app, please install OKeyboard along with this plugin. Instruction: ​ ⑴ Install this plugin and Multiling O Keyboard . ⑵ Run O Keyboard and follow its setup guide. ⑶ Slide space bar to switch languages. Please email if you have any questions. Wikipedia: Khmer (/kəˈmɛər/;[4] ភាសាខ្មែរ, IPA: [pʰiːəsaː kʰmaːe]; or more formally, ខេមរភាសា, IPA: [kʰeɛmaʔraʔ pʰiːəsaː]), or Cambodian, is the language of the Khmer people and the official language of Cambodia. With approximately 16 million speakers, it is the second most widely spoken Austroasiatic language (after Vietnamese). Khmer has been considerably influenced by Sanskrit and Pali, especially in the royal and religious registers, through the vehicles of Hinduism and Buddhism. It is also the earliest recorded and earliest written language of the Mon–Khmer family, predating Mon and by a significant margin Vietnamese.[5] The Khmer language has influenced, and also been influenced by, Thai, Lao, Vietnamese, Chinese and Cham, all of which, due to geographical proximity and long-term cultural contact, form a sprachbund in peninsular Southeast Asia. Photo: Gray Lake by Romain Guy

Wikipedia: The Burmese script (Burmese: မြန်မာအက္ခရာ; MLCTS: mranma akkha.ra; pronounced: [mjəmà ʔɛʔkʰəjà]) is an abugida in the Brahmic family, used for writing Burmese. It is an adaptation of the Old Mon script[2] or the Pyu script. In recent decades, other alphabets using the Mon script, including Shan and Mon itself, have been restructured according to the standard of the now-dominant Burmese alphabet. Besides the Burmese language, the Burmese alphabet is also used for the liturgical languages of Pali and Sanskrit. The characters are rounded in appearance because the traditional palm leaves used for writing on with a stylus would have been ripped by straight lines.[3] It is written from left to right and requires no spaces between words, although modern writing usually contains spaces after each clause to enhance readability. The earliest evidence of the Burmese alphabet is dated to 1035, while a casting made in the 18th century of an old stone inscription points to 984.[1] Burmese calligraphy originally followed a square format but the cursive format took hold from the 17th century when popular writing led to the wider use of palm leaves and folded paper known as parabaiks.[3] The alphabet has undergone considerable modification to suit the evolving phonology of the Burmese language. There are several systems of transliteration into the Latin alphabet; for this article, the MLC Transcription System is used. The Burmese language (Burmese: မြန်မာဘာသာ pronounced: [mjəmà bàðà][3] MLCTS: myanma bhasa) is the official language of Burma. Burmese is the native language of the Bamar and related sub-ethnic groups of the Bamar, as well as that of some ethnic minorities in Burma like the Mon. Burmese is spoken by 32 million as a first language and as a second language by 10 million, particularly ethnic minorities in Burma and those in neighboring countries. (Although the Constitution of Burma officially recognizes the English name of the language as the Myanmar language,[4] most English speakers continue to refer to the language as Burmese.) Burmese is a tonal, pitch-register, and syllable-timed language,[5] largely monosyllabic and analytic language, with a subject–object–verb word order. It is a member of the Tibeto-Burman grouping of the Sino-Tibetan language family. The language uses a Brahmic script called the Burmese script. Photo: Gray Lake by Romain Guy
release_text: Font fixed Editor with font support added

"in Romanian") is a Romance language spoken by around 24 million people as a native language, primarily in Romania and Moldova, and by another 4 million people as a second language.[5][6] It has official status in Romania, the Republic of Moldova, the unrecognized state of Transnistria, and the Autonomous Province of Vojvodina in Serbia. It is one of the official languages of the European Union, the Latin Union, and of the autonomous Mount Athos in Greece.[citation needed] Romanian speakers are scattered across many other countries, notably Australia, Italy, Spain, Ukraine, Bulgaria, the United States, Canada, Argentina, Israel, Russia, Portugal, the United Kingdom, France, and Germany

This is a network/subnet/IP address calculator for setting up routers and addresses on IP networks. Real-time updating and copy/paste support is included! A single slider acts as a selector for the CIDR, the netmask, and to scale the # of hosts needed in your subnet network. The application is useful for subnetting a router in tandem with an Android web browser or just for educational purposes. Education is emphasized by real time updating of network, broadcast, netmask, first and last address of the subnet, and the number of usable IPs in several different formats (dotted-decimal, hexadecimal, octal, decimal, binary and decimal). Also there are basic notes. There is real time updating of output as you change values and move the slider to change the netmask/mask bit. Touching the output will cycle through several different formats. Long presses will enable menus for copying to the clipboard. IPv4 functionality is finished. No ads nor special permissions required! Also, this subnet calculator does not suffer from the common "there's no dot on my number keyboard" problem. Please email me at: android@orbitingpluto.net

A simple marine compass : move your phone in all positions, and the compass will always stay parallel to the floor ! This app has support for 3D themes meaning that you can select another kind o style of compass, including other interesting objects such as the aiming cube or the XYZ arrows. Marine Compass can also display your location using GPS. In that case latitude and longitude will be displayed under the heading display. It is also possible to extend Marine Compass with the optional augmented reality plugin, which will display the camera preview under the compass.. This compass app has no ad and does not require permission except LOCATION for the GPS feature. Enjoy ! Long tap on the compass will display the settings screen. Have fun. *** READ THIS PLEASE *** accuracy depends on the hardware, please use a calibration tool designed for your device whenever the displayed direction seems wrong or not accurate.

This application REQUIRES a Galaxy Nexus (GSM, Verizon, or Sprint), Nexus 4, Nexus 5, Nexus 7 (2013), Nexus 10, or OnePlus One with root. Nexus 6 and newer devices contain security measures in their bootloaders, connected with factory-reset protection. These measures make it very difficult to use root to lock/unlock the bootloader, and as a result it is unlikely that Nexus 6, Nexus 9, Nexus 5X and Nexus 6P will ever be supported. ------------- You've rooted your device, and you are trying to decide between the security of relocking your bootloader (with stock recovery and USB Debugging off), and the flexibility of leaving it unlocked. You know that in order to prevent an unauthorized user from accessing your data by flashing a custom recovery, "fastboot oem unlock" wipes your data. This also means that if you relock your bootloader, you will need to do a full backup-and-restore whenever you decide to unlock it again. BootUnlocker for Nexus Devices lets you have the best of both worlds by using root privileges to unlock your bootloader from within Android, without wiping your data. This allows you to keep your bootloader locked for security, with this application safely protected behind your lockscreen password. Whenever you want to unlock or relock your bootloader, just unlock your screen and run BootUnlocker. License: -------- BootUnlocker for Nexus Devices_ is Open Source Software, licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html Source code is available on Google Code: https://code.google.com/p/boot-unlocker-gnex/ Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. Support: -------- For support, you can: * Open an issue on Google Code * Join this app's discussion on XDA: http://bit.ly/BootUnlocker * Email the developer

Application multiservice, CA Pocket est un point d’entrée unique et un véritable concentré de votre banque ; où que vous soyez CA POCKET est là pour vous aider dans vos démarches quotidiennes. « Mon territoire » : découvrez les valeurs de proximité relationnelle et territoriale du Crédit Agricole Nord Midi-Pyrénées. « Mon agence » : restez en contact avec votre agence. « Mes comptes » : consultez vos comptes, effectuez des virements ou passez vos ordres de bourse. « Mes services » : accédez à tous nos services de banque en ligne : simulateurs, ventes privées, guide immobilier… « Mes applis » : retrouvez l’accès direct à toutes les applications du Crédit Agricole téléchargées ou non. Vous disposez également d’un accès direct à vos préférences (Agence, ville…) et à la boite à outils (Scanner de documents, lecteur QR Code…) ainsi qu’à la partie aide et informations. Vous pouvez quand même télécharger l’application pour découvrir tous nos produits et entrer en contact avec un de nos conseillers. CA POCKET : VOTRE BANQUE PRES DE VOUS, AVEC VOUS… PARTOUT ! description: Transform your phone into an advanced remote controlled wireless IP camera with features including scheduled silent camera picture snapshot/video recording and upload JPEG/MP4 content to the Cloud (email,picasa,Dropbox,FTP for remote viewing) or save to SD card, stream real time camera video from the device camera over WiFi/3G networks to a remote PC,Mac or Linux server anywhere in the world, G-Sensor/Picture Motion Detection and automatic activation of camera snapshot or Video/Audio recording. Power supply monitor automatically emails on power loss/gain and the ability to control the CloudCam application features remotely from anywhere in the world, and lots more! Please note the demo application will ONLY run for a maximum time of 59 minutes. For a full description of features and help guide please see www.androidcloudcam.net. The main application features are covered below. 1. Operates as a smart IP camera. The application supports capturing silent camera pictures/recordings without anyone knowing! 2. Utilize your phone as a Skype portable webcam. MJPEG stream supported by most video chat services. 3. Real time video streaming over WiFi and 3G networks. Either connect to the device over WiFi and use VLC to view content or use the free streaming server (included as a download from CloudCam) to stream real time camera video from the device over 3G. No third party included! 4. Capture scheduled camera images/recordings and upload to the Cloud or save to SD card. Configure application to capture and send camera images to email, Picasa, Dropbox, or FTP. 5. G-Sensor/Picture motion detection. Automatically activate camera snapshot mode,video streaming mode or video/audio recording. 6. Scheduler supports multiple timers to control CloudCam features. 7. Notify using email when the battery status on the device changes. If the device is plugged into the mains, the device can detect a power failure from the mains and automatically email to notify. 8. Secure remote control from anywhere in the world. The application can be controlled remotely using email to switch ON/OFF CloudCam features and change camera settings (i.e. zoom, turn camera flash light ON/OFF, adjust picture quality,switch ON Snapshot/Video mode and many more). 9. Advanced performance settings to cater for long surveillance operations and limited power. 10. Switch CloudCam into sleep mode to save battery power and reactivate remotely or through configured timers. 11. Free streaming server supports automatic presentation of real time streaming video content from the handset to waiting streaming players like VLC. Multiple streaming servers can run in parallel on a PC,Mac or Linux server servicing multiple CloudCam devices allowing multiple CloudCam devices can be viewed from a single source. 12. View MJPEG content from the camera over WiFi/3G networks using the free Android MJPEG viewer CamBuddy. Provides a range of features to service a variety of tasks in everyday life like security IP camera, home/car/bike/workshop/lockup/office/baby/elderly person/pet/hydroponic/fish tank/wildlife monitor, or surveillance. Any questions then please drop an email to droidcloudcam@gmail.com . Thank you
release_text: Fixed issue with Dropbox authentication in demo version. Extended error handling and reporting of camera issues when the OS auto closes the camera due to CloudCam not being in the foreground. The 4.4.2 version of the Android OS on HTC devices now auto closes the camera when the application using the camera is not in the foreground. New feature. Add timestamp to email subject when CloudCam sends an email. New feature. Remote control CloudCam using HTTP GET requests.

description: Never get caught by a Multanova or a Red Light speed Camera again ! This handy app includes a Widget and GPS Tracking to tell you when you are on a road that may contain a Speed Camera. Once you have added the Widget, you have the option enable GPS Tracking by touching the GPS button. The application has come to keep you updated on the latest recommendations of the perioperative use of anticoaglantes! This program contains all the major anticoagulant drugs in use. Check out: → Medications included: Apixiban, Argatroban, Aspirin, Bivalirudin, cilostazol, clopidogrel, dabigatran, dalteparin, Desirudin, Dipyridamole, drotrecogin, Enoxaparin, eptifibatide, Fondaparinux, Heparin, Herbals, lepirudin, NSAIDs, Prasugrel, Reteplase, Rivaroxaban, Streptokinase, tenecteplase, Ticagrelor , Ticlopidine, Tinzaparin, Tirofiban, Urokinase and Warfarin; → Each product has the following information: Active Principle, trade names, duration of the suspension and resumption of use, half life, class, mechanism of action, monitoring, rollback and recommendations of ASRA (American Society of Regional Anesthesia and Pain Medicine) and ESRA (European Society of Regional Anaesthesia & Pain). → Easy access to content, optimizing for high resolution screens; → Application built with extensive scientific review, consistent with the latest recommendations of Societies of Anesthesiology and Perioperative Medicine in the world; → Constant updates, with updated material!

Chords Player is a simple, yet useful, music tool. It lets you easily create chords sequences and arrange theme to create rhythm tracks for you to train on. You know the chords, you know the tabs, partitions, you know the rhythm,... what you need now is a tool for you to train on. Whether you're a guitarist, pianist or other, this sequencer will become your friend to train yourself when you're on the road or at home. Create your intro, verse, chorus, outro... sequences and order them to make your song. Este programa estima la fecha probable de parto basado en 40 semanas, comenzando desde el primer día del último período menstrual. También extrapola la edad gestacional de las ultrasonografías. Promedia el peso fetal y la longitud céfalo-caudal entre la semana 11 y 40. - Implementación del servicio de licencias - Soporte para Múltiples Pantallas

description: Fool you friends with fake messages!!! With this application you can create a fake text message (SMS) into your Messaging Application. Just select the type of message (From or To), type the phone number, set the date and time, type your message and press Send. Then open your native Messaging Application and find you unread fake message. Why those permissions? - android.permission.WRITE_SMS - android.permission.READ_SMS FakeSMS create a SMS in to your native Messaging Application , those permissions allow FakeSMS complete this task.
release_text: - Compiled against Android 4.1 Platform - Support added for devices without menu button

description: EKG Elektrokardiografi merupakan aplikasi yang berisi materi elektrokardiografi yang disajikan dalam balutan design yang menawan dan mudah digunakan. Aplikasi ini ditujukan untuk Petugas medis baik mahasiswa Kedkteran, Ko-Asisten, Internship, Dokter Umum, residen, Dokter Spesialis serta perawat dan petugas medis lainnya. Secara umum materi EKG disajikan dalam dua kategori yakni Normal dan Abnormal yang masing masing dijelaskan secara sistematis. Semua Fitur dalam Aplikasi EKG ini dapat diunduh secara GRATIS. Berikan bintang dan review jika anda menyukai aplikasi ini dan Informasikan kepada sejawat tentang aplikasi ini. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut hubungi kami di : cocoa.ind@gmail.com

A Contract Bridge Game that can be played by self offline against robot or connect via Internet to play with your friends. The robot uses SAYC/ACOL/PRECISION/2-over-1 GF (partially implemented). It is a beta-release and is subjected to continue development efforts. Your comments on how to improve the game are welcome. For bug report, please email directly to webmaster@weweweb.net . For any complaints related to robot's bidding in solo game, you are recommended to use the in-app robot problem report mechanism. For online game, simply give us the board number and your username. Warning: The robot for the current release is weak. If you are a serious bridge player, please don't install it until production version released.
release_text: v0.9.14 - Add Confirm Play Option, default is on. - Minimum Android version set to 2.2 (Device with 2.2 or lower will not be expired). - Improve: Claim dialog width adjusted according to orientation. - Improve: Bid Button Configurations Type 3-5 address 'Black Heart' problem. - Improve: 1D-1S-(2H)-4D? robot prefers to bid 2NT instead of 4D if bas stoppers. - Improve: QTXX is now treated as a semi-stopper. And a number of improvements and fixes. (See release notes)

description: ******************************************************************************************** Hours of entertainment, endless levels and fun! ******************************************************************************************** You have to build the ancient tower as high as possible, placing a block on top of another in a precise way. Try not to unbalance and collapse the tower. Use the power of the sun to help you in this adventure and you will be the next Lord of the Mayan Towers. The rhythm of the music will make you play more and more. How to play: Tap anywhere on the screen to release the blocks. Stack one at a time in alignment to the previous block. Tap on the sun image to help with the next block alignment. Features: -Endless levels -Great music -Time challenge -Addictive gameplay

If you are using flip cover or flip case with your phone, Cover Lock is just the thing you need. Simple Cover Lock give you the easiest and simplest way to configure and use. FEATURES: 1 Lock and turn the screen off when your screen is covered. (Covered by flip cover, flip case. Or if you don't have a flip cover, just put the phone in your pocket. ) 2 Turn on the screen when you open the cover. (Configurable) NOTICES: Device administration is needed to lock your screen. UNINSTALLING: To uninstall Simple Cover Lock, you have to disable it as a device administrator first. If you're using Samsung devices, you can do that in Settings-Security-Device administrators. Uncheck "Simple Cover Lock" and deactivate. After that, you can uninstall it like normal applications. Tested on Galaxy Note 2.
release_text: 1. Added an option to disable auto screen off when in landscape

description: A convenient way to switch between user defined audio profiles on your android phones. #NOTICE# Vibrate settings don't work since Jelly Bean(4.1). Official/Stock Android 4.0(ICS) links volumes of phone rings and notifications. Profiles like 'Phone only' will NOT work. (Will work fine on CM9, or some other customized ics) FEATURES: * No ads! * NEW profile resume timer! * Create and manage your audio profiles. (Support adding, editing, deleting profiles) * A simple but good-looking home-screen WIDGET for displaying current profile and quick profile switching * A STATUS-BAR ICON which indicates the current profile and provides profile switching function. (If your find this icon annoying, you can always turn it off in the options menu!) * Home-Screen SHORTCUT, switch to a profile just by one touch!
release_text: 1.6.1p: Fixed the issue when adding shortcut. Swipe a profile to the left for editing instead of long press. Timer can be set up to 12 hours now. Fixed an issue causing notification icon to show up after timer fired. 1.6.0p: Fixed an issue which caused preferences not working. Added profile resume timer. Swipe a profile to edit or apply with timer.

description: Slideshow 5000 is a next-generation photo frame. It's a 3D image slideshow application and live wallpaper. Select your favourite images and photos through the intuitive, fast user interface, sit back and watch the invisible hand gently throw them, one by one, onto the table while the camera slowly pans around. Pictures can come from your phone or from a network share like a shared windows folder or a samba (smb) type share! Now with a brand new Polaroid mode, which turns your pictures into vintage polaroid-like pictures automatically! Marvel at the real physics that are applied to the pictures as they drop, hit and slide across the table! This app turns your tablet or phone into a next-generation photo frame! Setup a playlist of music tracks from your own collection on your tablet/phone, and this app will play them in the background while the images are being displayed! You can run it as a stand-alone app, put it on a stand and have visitors go Ooh and Aah at the novel way your pictures are being displayed, or you can set it as a live wallpaper, and be amazed yourself everytime you access your home screen. If you have Android 4.3 or better, you can even record your slideshow to a video, and share it on any social media you want, like youtube or facebook! It's like Photo FX Live Wallpaper, but with real 3D graphics and physics to make the falling pictures look so much more impressive! To support the continued development of this app, the free version has ads (not on the live wallpaper) and an occasional reminder to buy the pro version, and recorded movies have a "made with Slideshow 5000 Free for Android" watermark. The pro version has no ads or reminders or watermarks, and it has multiple backgrounds. Slideshow 5000 will gather anonymous user statistics through Google Analytics. Last but not least: we REALLY value your feedback! Please send any bug reports or suggestions to: volleyball5000@gmail.com
release_text: - Decreased memory usage of Live Wallpaper for improved stability

description: Visualisator 5000 is an awesome Music Visualisation App for your Android phone or tablet! Just start your favourite mp3 player, put it in the background, start the Visualisator 5000 and enjoy the trippy 2D and 3D graphics created by YOUR music! This app works with ANY music player, as long as it can play in the background AND uses the built-in Android codecs to play its songs. Alternatively, you can use your phone/tablet's microphone as input device, and generate visuals to whatever's playing in the club, concert or your living room! The Pro version has the following improvements over the Free version: - No ads - More visualisations (currently 26, which is 13 more than the free version, and more visualisations are added all the time) - Also runs as Live Wallpaper The app sends anonymous usage statistics to Google Analytics to improve the user experience in the future. Your feedback is EXTREMELY important to us! Please take time to RATE the app, or send direct feedback to volleyball5000@gmail.com Check back often, and enjoy!
release_text: 2.21: - New visualisation: Nexus Spectrum Clone - On devices with a soft button bar at the bottom of the screen, the bar is minimized during visualisation now - Fixed a visual bug in the Simple Spectrum Visualisation (max lines didn't stay up long enough) - If silence is detected, fake input data is generated to still display the effects in a more interesting way - Advertisement for our new app 'PhotoFlight Slideshow' in what's new section

description: Get now the new version of Rummy, Now in the new special design. Rummy is a group of matching card games notable for similar gameplay based on the matching cards of the same rank or sequence and same suit. The basic goal in any form of rummy is to build melds which consists of sets, three or four of a kind of the same rank, or runs, three or more cards in sequence, of the same suit. The original form of rummy is called Sai rummy or Basic rummy. The Mexican game of Conquian is considered by David Parlett to be ancestral to all rummy games, which itself is derived from a Chinese game called Khanhoo and, going even further back, Mahjong.

NKJV Bible+ by Olive Tree is a must-have app for reading and studying God’s Holy Word. Take notes, highlights, and bookmarks in the app and sync to all your devices. This free Bible Study App features a powerful Resource Guide that links your Bible text with outstanding study Bibles, maps, commentaries, and more for an in-depth Bible study experience. Start a Bible reading plan and Bible+ will track your progress as you read through Scripture. Our unique split window allows you to create your own customized parallel Bible to easily compare Bible translations. Install now and explore over 100 more free titles. NKJV Bible+ by Olive Tree includes the New King James Version (NKJV) Bible translation. OFF-LINE BIBLE STUDY Your library, notes, highlights and all of the app features are stored on your device so that you have full functionality when you are offline or in airplane mode. CLOUD SYNC Sync your Bible study resources, highlights, notes, bookmarks, and book ribbons between any devices with Bible+. POWERFUL RESOURCE GUIDE With our one-of-a-kind Resource Guide, perform powerful searches through your entire Library of Bibles, Bible commentaries, Bible dictionaries, and more. FAST VERSE NAVIGATION With our unique 3-touch Verse Chooser, you can navigate quickly and easily to the exact Bible verse you want. SIDE-BY-SIDE STUDY The split window feature allows you to create your own customized parallel Bible for translation comparison, view your study notes while you read, or follow along with a commentary while you study Scripture. IMMERSIVE BIBLE STUDY Remove distractions by opening your books and Bibles in full screen and immerse yourself in Scripture. PERSONAL BIBLE STUDY * Highlight words and passages * Take your own personalized notes * Bookmark verses * Tag anything to find it quickly later * Leave a book ribbon on a page in order to pick up where you left off * Select and copy text from any Bible or book in your Library DAILY READING PLANS *Free downloadable reading plans on various topics, books of the Bible, or specific biblical characters *Sync your reading plan across your devices with Bible+ *Plans vary in length with options as short as 5 days to as long as three years! SOCIAL BIBLE STUDY Instantly share the Bible with your friends from inside the app. Tap on a verse to share it through Twitter, Facebook or via email. AMAZING BIBLE STUDY LIBRARY The Olive Tree catalog of Bible study resources is constantly growing and offers over a hundred FREE resources and over three thousand titles available for purchase. BIBLES INCLUDED New King James Version (NKJV) Bible translation. OTHER BIBLES AND BIBLE STUDY RESOURCES AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE IN-APP: * New International Version (NIV), The Message, Amplified Bible, New King James Version (NKJV), New American Standard Bible (NASB), New Living Translation (NLT), New Revised Standard Version (NRSV), and over 100 more! * Best-selling study Bibles: ESV Study Bible, NLT Study Bible, NIV Study Notes, NKJV Study Notes, Life Application Study Bible, Reformation Study Bible Notes *Word Study Bibles with Strong’s Numbers in NIV, KJV, ESV, NKJV, HCSB and NASB Bible translations * Commentaries and Study Tools: Vine’s Expository Dictionary, Expositor’s Bible Commentary; Olive Tree Bible Maps, Bible Knowledge Commentary, Zondervan Atlas of the Bible *Interlinear Bibles: Easily compare the Original Languages of the Bible with ESV, KJV, and NKJV Bible translations. *Harmony of the Gospels: Read through the life of Jesus chronologically with our unique Gospel harmonies. *Original language Bibles: Greek New Testament: NA28 & UBS-4; Hebrew Old Testament: BHS; Greek Old Testament: Septuaginta, LXX * Non-English Bibles including Spanish, Portuguese, German and more: Reina-Valera, Almeida Revista e Atualizada, Dios Habla Hoy, Luther Bibel 1984, Louis Segond, Indonesian Bible AND MANY MORE!
release_text: 6.1.2 • Added Quick Verse Buttons back to grid verse chooser • Numerous Bug & Crash Fixes If you’re enjoying Bible+, please rate the app and leave us a review. It really helps!

description: Verlang je ernaar God beter te leren kennen en te begrijpen, in zijn veelkleurigheid? Dit dagboek geeft je een steun in de rug. Bij het schrijven van dit dagboek hebben de auteurs jonge christen in gedachten gehad, die ernaar verlangen God te dienen en te volgen op alle terreinen van het leven: relaties, werk of studie, de wereld om ons heen. Thema’s die aan de orde komen zijn: Wie is de heilige Geest? Wat betekenen de sacramenten voor mij? En hoe kan het lijden in deze wereld bestaan als God liefde is? Iedere maand wordt een thema uitgediept aan de hand van de Bijbel. Bij elke dag vind je een kort Bijbelgedeelte om te lezen, wanneer je daarop klikt wordt je naar een internetpagina geleid met het Bijbelgedeelte. De terugknop op je toestel brengt je weer terug naar de app. Verder is er iedere dag een uitwerking van het Bijbelgedeelte, een gebedspunt en een samenvatting of bijpassende oneliner van maximaal 140 tekens, die je kunt je twitteren of op Facebook zetten met de knoppen onderin. Je kunt op Twitter ook laten weten wat je van de teksten vind; gebruik dan de hashtag #likeGod. Wish you seek to know God better and to understand, in its many colors? This diary gives you a boost. In writing this diary, the young Christian authors had in mind, who desire to serve God and to follow in all areas of life: relationships, work or study, the world around us. Themes to be discussed are: Who is the Holy Spirit? What do the sacraments for me? And how can the suffering in this world exist if God is love? Every month a theme explored on the basis of the Bible. Each day you will find a short passage to read, when you click on will take you to a web page containing the passage. The back button on your phone will take you back to the app. There is also a daily elaboration of the passage, a prayer point and a summary or matching liner up to 140 characters, you can change your twitter or Facebook set with the buttons below. You can also let Twitter know what you think of the lyrics, please use the hashtag # likeGod.

****Root needed**** This app allows you to easily flash recoveries on the: GT-I9300 GT-I9500 GT-I9505 The app supports the following filetypes: *.img *.tar *.tar.md5 If your device isn't in the list above then the app wont be able to flash the recovery and it wont attempt to do so. If you own a galaxy S3 or S4 and it isn't listed above then please install this app and press the Dump button so I can add support for that device. ****Root needed****
release_text: Changelog v1.1.1: * Partition dump bug fixed Changelog v1.1: *Support added for: -GT-I9300 -GT-I9500 *Partition dump feature added *Code optimalisations *Support for .tar and tar.md5 added

description: TIME gives you all benefits you need to get full focus on your primary business! With TIME you register your time spent on activities in the blink of an eye. With integration of your Google Agenda and a brilliant interface for managing your time sheet, TIME will give you all the information you need to manage your activities and time registration. Use it as a punch clock by starting and stopping time registrations as you go, or add them all manually to your time sheet using the touch optimized planning view. After a couple of days of hard work, you easily create a powerful report with all the time registrations from the selected period. Limit your time at the office by sending your time sheet export by e-mail or uploading it to a Dropbox™ account. The export gives you all information you need to justify your (billable) time! Managing and editing your time sheets has never been this easy and straightforward, TIME is time registration done right. Featureset • Time registration / Time sheet • Google agenda integration • Export 10 registrations by e-mail • Reporting • 5 Activities • Widget • Ads-free TIME Business add-on adds the following features • Export unlimited registrations by e-mail • Unlimited activities
release_text: → Version 1.3.2 New features • The punch-in screen now shows your last used activities. Bugfixes • Fixed crash caused by cleaning up items from last report. And other small bugfixes. → Version 1.3.3 Bugfixes • Fixed bug where registration screen showed wrong timestamps when the timezone is not offset by whole hours. (e.g. Teheran, GMT+3:30)

description: This game is a sliding puzzle. It starts with a random image from one of the 16 standard images. Using the menu button you can choose another one of these 16 images, take a photo with your camera or choose an image from your own gallery! Fun to play during holidays. The puzzle can be played in 3x3 or 4x4 mode. If you find it hard to solve a puzzle you can have a peek at the complete image or add tile numbers. This game needs some permissions: - Internet access because it is basically a web app and some Android devices require this (also needed for ads) - Access network state because it shows ads - Access to Storage to store the photo you can use for the puzzle We have used HTML, CSS3, jQuery libraries (including jQuery UI and jQuery Mobile) and PhoneGap to create this app.
release_text: bugfixes orientation change works better newer phonegap uses google analytics 4 more pictures Added an ad previous changes: Shows alert if you break your personal score Added possibility to use a photo made with camera Changed interface Added possibility to see tile numbers Added dutch translation pause button Added screen to choose image using menu button Added possibility to choose image from your Gallery Made sliding the image parts more easy Small bug fixes and code cleanup New theme

description: Pacific Navy Fighter - Commander Edition Fight three of the major sea battles of WW2 pacific. Fly the Avenger, Corsair and Hellcat (or Zero, Kate and Judy for I.J.N.) while commanding recon, patrol and strike flights to their destination from multiple carriers. Action packed you'll be jumping from cockpit to cockpit to save the day. Fly in formation as a bomber or protective fighter escort, fly recon to spot enemy fleets so you can order strike flights at them specifying aircraft and weapon types for bombers and escorts. The fight is on in generated single missions and in three historic major battles: - Battle of Santa Cruz - Battle of Eastern Solomons - Battle of Midway Make strategic decisions about flights depending on weapons and planes left on the carriers, consider flight times and weigh your options over defensive and offensive action. 3 seconds later you are looking around from the cockpit again: enough with the radio, lets jump another set of enemies! Consider the weather and visibility, and don't expect daytime to last forever as night, dusk and dawn will challenge your orientation, navigation and situation awareness skills. Just when you think your done you'll be faced with landing on a carrier mid-storm in bad visibility. Having survived the whole ordeal, did you do well enough to earn a medal?
release_text: 1.2.1 Fix gear button not working Fix audio issues when resuming 1.2 New: Cookie consent dialog New: Sky brightness display setting New: In external view, show hide extra meters by touching alt/oil meters (press same spot again to show) Fix: missed scoring events, causing medal achievement issues Fix: Improved default sound option determined by OS version (if having sound issues, please try the other option)

description: Find out what the frequency of a specific LPD / LPD 8 / PMR / CB (Citizen Band, 'normal' or UK) / UHF / PRS / FRS/GMRS / KDR / Marine VHF channel is and the CTCSS tone code of a subchannel. Do you have a 2 meter / 70 cm band radio and want to communicate with someone with a Marine VHF / PMR / LPD / CB / UHF / PRS / KDR / FRS/GMRS radio? Is that one also using 'subchannels'? This app is what you need! Select which type you need and select the channel and subchannel. The app calculates / converts the channel. The frequency (in MHz) and CTCSS frequency (in Hz) / tone code are then shown. Or select the frequency (of a channel or subchannel) and the nearest channel will be shown, if it is nearby the given frequency. Select the tab 'frequency' at the bottom of the app to make use of this functionality. Possible types: - PMR - KDR - LPD - LPD8 - CB (Citizen Band) - CB UK (Citizen Band UK) - UHF (often used in Australia) - PRS (often used in New Zeeland) - FRS / GMRS - FRS - Marine VHF There is also a free version of this app with ads. Ads and paid version are just to support the app development and subscription to the stores. Please tell me if you would like to have more features or supported radio types. App icon by icons8.com / iconsdb.com Idea by http://portoshop.nl
release_text: Added radio type: - KDR Added functionality for reverse lookup: type a frequency or subchannel-frequency and find out if there is a channel nearby with the given frequency. You can find the new functionality when clicking on the 'frequency' tab on the bottom of the screen. Please tell me what functions and / or radio types you need to add to a new version.

description: Listen to the sound and guess the answer! Too difficult? Use hints: extra audio, a part of the picture or a letter from the answer. Play alone, together with friends, or make your own SoundRiddle! Playing the game is easy; you hear a short audio fragment, see the amount of letters from the correct answer and get the game category to start with. Each game is worth 100 points by immediately guessing the correct answer without using hints. If you don’t succeed you can always use your 100 points to get hints and solve the SoundRiddle. The hints you can unlock with your points are; - An extra audio fragment - A tile of the image - Letters from the answer If you really can’t solve the SoundRiddle yourself you can always share the game on Facebook and ask your friends for help. In team games you and your team can use the chat function to consult about the SoundRiddle and to discuss unlocking hints. All decisions in a team game must be made as a team, therefore you should get approval on your hint suggestions. Use the custom games as a fun and interactive way to tell your friends about every day events and special happenings. Invite your friends to solve your SoundRiddle, or submit them to the SoundRiddle database so every SoundRiddle player in the world can try and solve your SoundRiddle. The purpose of a Challenges is to solve a sponsored SoundRiddle. Play alone or together with friends and be the first to guess the answer and win the sponsored prize! While playing the game you can change your answer at any time. But be warned: any temporary changes in your answer will drop your previous answer. A SoundRiddle can be played in various game types: - Quick Game Play a random game by yourself. The SoundRiddle you will be playing is selected from the continuously growing database. The points you win with this game are used to put you higher on the ranking. - Select a Game Play a game alone or with friends in a self-selected category. At the start of the game every member of the team gets to hear a different audio fragment. The purpose is to work together as a team, solve the SoundRiddle and earn points for your ranking. - Create Custom Game Create your own SoundRiddle! Capture the image and audio fragment and use the app to turn it into a SoundRiddle. Invite your friends to solve your SoundRiddle. You can always submit your own SoundRiddle to us. The rest of the world will then be able to play your SoundRiddle through our database. - Challenges: Solve a Challenge! Challenges are being made by sponsors and feature a unique way to be solved. Are you the first to solve the Challenge? Then you might win a nice prize!
release_text: Limited time offer!! Create your own SoundRiddles and play them with your friends

description: Onderweg naar de tramhalte of op bezoek in Amsterdam? Met de GVB app kunt u razendsnel bekijken wanneer de tram, bus, metro, veerpont of nachtbus van GVB vertrek. Via welke route u reist, hoe laat u er bent en waar er omleidingen en acute verstoringen zijn. Ook kunt u ervoor kiezen om een bericht te ontvangen* als er iets met uw favoriete lijn of halte aan de hand is. De GVB app toont u realtime waar de bus, tram of metro is en laat de actuele vertrektijden zien van de dichtstbijzijnde haltes of van uw voorkeurshalte. Op basis van uw GPS locatie bepaalt de app welke haltes in de buurt liggen. Op uw scherm ziet u in één oogopslag of uw rit op tijd bij de halte vertrekt of dat het voertuig eerder of later wegrijdt. *Belangrijk: de GVB app is compleet vernieuwd waardoor u opnieuw uw favoriete lijn(en) en haltes dient in te stellen. Om deze in de cloud op te slaan en om een push notificatie te ontvangen bij een omleiding of verstoring dient u een (gratis) account aan te maken. Wat biedt de GVB app: - De app biedt een handige reisplanner waarmee u een reisadvies kunt opvragen vanaf uw huidige locatie of vanaf een zelf gekozen adres naar een reisbestemming in Nederland. De reisplanner geeft een advies voor bus, tram, metro, trein, en veerpont. U kunt ook de reis opslaan zodat u de volgende snel kunt plannen. - In het scherm Vertrektijden van de app kunt u met het vergrootglas vertrektijden zoeken op een haltenaam of lijnnummer van GVB. Of u klikt op het gevouwen kaartje rechtsboven om zo aan de hand van een kaart van de omgeving te zien welke haltes er in de buurt zijn. Geografisch zoeken kan in de hele kaart van Nederland en voor iedere halte wordt getoond welke lijnen er stoppen. Als u vervolgens een lijn kiest, ziet u real time de vertrektijden. - Met de ster naast de haltenaam kunt u een halte tot favoriet maken. U krijgt dan deze halte standaard in het scherm van Vertrektijden te zien. - In de app kunt u ook uw lijnen instellen via de zoekfunctie in Vertrektijden. Kies een lijn en daarna een halte en geef met het belletje rechtsboven aan dat u een notificatie wilt ontvangen bij een omleiding of verstoring. Dit kan per lijn, per dag en ook voor een tijdvak ingesteld worden. U dient hiervoor ingelogd te zijn met uw account. - Nadat u een halte of lijn heeft geselecteerd worden de voertuigen die op deze lijn rijden of op de gekozen halte stoppen, getoond in de kaart. De actuele positie van de voertuigen in de kaart wordt iedere 15 seconden geüpdate. U ziet direct waar de bussen, trams of metro’s zich bevinden. - Het tabblad Omleidingen toont per bus-, tram of metrolijn de geplande en ongeplande omleidingen en verstoringen. TIP: Meld u aan voor de push notificatie voor uw lijn zodat u deze informatie direct ontvangt als er iets gebeurd op uw route. - Per geplande reis ziet u naast het blaadje het verschil in kilo’s CO2-uitstoot van reizen met het openbaar vervoer ten opzichte van een gemiddelde auto.

Met de Veolia App bent u continu op de hoogte van de meest actuele reisinformatie, verstoringen en omleidingen. Zo komt u nooit voor verrassingen te staan. Bovendien kunt u in de Veolia App gebruik maken van MijnVeolia, waardoor u over de snelste toegang tot de Klantenservice beschikt. Handig als u bijvoorbeeld een klacht of compliment wilt indienen of een verloren voorwerp wilt aangeven. Of maak gebruik van de Productwijzer voor een persoonlijk advies voor uw vervoerbewijs. De Veolia App is continu in ontwikkeling om reizigers de best mogelijke service te kunnen bieden. Uw opmerkingen of suggesties ter verbetering kunnen daarbij helpen. U kunt daarom gebruik maken van de feedback mogelijkheid onder de tab Instellingen. Functies van de Veolia App zijn: 1. Landelijke Reisplanner 2. Reisbegeleiding 3. Landelijke Dienstregeling 4. Melding van verstoring en omleiding 5. Klantenservice contact via MijnVeolia 6. Productwijzer voor advies vervoerbewijs N.B. Deze app heeft toegang tot contactgegevens nodig zodat contactpersonen kunnen worden opgegeven in het zoekscherm bij het plannen van een reis. Alleen contacten die een adres bevatten worden getoond. Een adres van een contact kan toegevoegd worden door de contacten te koppelen aan Gmail en vervolgens via een desktop browser in Gmail de contacten aan te passen. The Veolia App you constantly informed of the latest travel information, disruptions and diversions. So you will never be surprises. Moreover, you can use My Veolia, the Veolia App use giving you the fastest access to the Customer has. Useful when you want to make a complaint or compliment, or want to report. Lost property Or use the Product Finder for personal advice for your ticket. The Veolia App is continuously evolving to offer. Travelers the best possible service Your comments or suggestions for improvement can help. You can therefore use the feedback option under the Settings tab. Functions of the Veolia App are: 1 Holiday Planner 2 Travel Support 3 National Timetable 4 Notification of disruption and diversion 5. Customer contact via My Veolia 6 Product Guide for advice ticket N.B. This application has access contact information necessary so that contacts can be specified in the search screen when planning a trip. Only contacts that contain an address are displayed. An address of a contact can be added by linking contacts to Gmail and then adjust. Using a desktop browser in Gmail contacts
release_text: - Problemen bij push notificaties zijn opgelost

description: Tired of confusing, poorly built flashcard applications with features that you never use? Pocket Cards is a clean and modern take on flashcards. With an emphasis on simplicity, Pocket Cards allows you to quickly create cards and study them efficiently. Use the interactive UI to quickly go through a set of cards while waiting on the bus or during a break. Create sets on Quizlet on your computer or create a list of favorite Quizlet sets and use them directly in Pocket Cards. • Access your sets and favorites from Quizlet • Sort your cards using sets • Differentiate sets using accent colors • Sleek and modern dark/light themes • Interact with cards using gestures • Test your knowledge of a set by choosing the Test mode • Cards that are marked wrong will repeat more frequently • Flip front and back of card for more thorough studying
release_text: Changes for 1.1.5 • Fixed a crash when closing the application Changes for 1.1.4 • Access your sets and favorites on Quizlet Changes for 1.1.3 • Fixed bug when deleting cards • Targeting Android 4.3 Changes for 1.1.2 • Added the light theme and made it default (change to dark in settings) • Layout fixes for higher density devices Changes for 1.1.1: • Default sorting of cards changed to 'Front' text • Enable swiping of card from screen edges

description: This is a demo app made for my "Embracing Fragmentation" talk, showing how to use resources to create an app that runs on a multitude of devices. The app shows the actual screen size of your device in both pixels and device independent pixels (dips). It also shows the size of the view, the type of screen (small, normal, large, xlarge) and the screen dpi class (ldpi, mdpi, hdpi, xhdpi). The code for this app is open source and available from the website link.
release_text: Showing the device model and the device class based on swXXdp classifiers for Android 3.x and up. Removed the touchscreen requirement so that the app should also work on Google TV. Now correctly showing xxhdpi devices.

description: Use pictures from your social network albums as wallpaper on your Android Device! You select the albums that you want to use and pictures rotate automatically when you gently shake your phone. Your wallpaper will never be boring again! Note: this is a Live Wallpaper App. To be able to see the wallpaper go to the 'live wallpaper' settings on your phone and select Social Wallpaper Pro as your wallpaper. As Facebook is currently the only supported social network you need a Facebook account in order for this app to work. Features currently supported: - Download photos from Facebook - Select albums - Shake phone for next picture

Firefly is a linear visual novel by Circle Pegasi. This is the Android port of the full story (approx. 80k words). A free demo version is also available: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=nl.weeaboo.android.firefly.demo More information about Firefly, and the Windows/Mac/Linux version in particular, can be found at: http://pegasi.weeaboo.nl/project-firefly.php - Story - One fateful night, the mischievous thief Esta sets out to rob yet another unsuspecting nobleman of his riches. However, the mansion she targets turns out to be completely abandoned except for the, in her words, whiny and incompetent Yoru. Nevertheless, to her annoyance, she ends up having to take this young man along on her adventures. But despite his appearance, he might be more involved in the town's upsets than she realizes...
release_text: = Large Update = - Added higher res (800px wide) images - Improved audio quality - New text speed preference - Added auto read functionality - Better textlog and save/load screens

description: This visual novel engine brings VNDS support to Android. Allows you to read any visual novel written in (or converted to) the VNDS script format. Instructions: VNDS novels consist of a folder containing several zip files with images, audio files, etc. Copy the entire folder to /vnds/novels/ on your device and the app will automatically detect it (you should have a folder structure like this: vnds -> novels -> mygame -> info.txt). It will search both internal memory as well as any SD cards present, so store your VNs wherever you prefer. If you don't want to store everything in /vnds/novels/, you can add your own novel search path from the opening screen. Features: - High-res mode allows for VNDS novels with an image resolution greater than 256x192. When a visual novel is available in multiple image resolutions, pick the one closest to your device's display resolution. - Longpress the touchscreen to quickly skip through text. - Hit the back button to view recently displayed text. This textlog mode can also be accessed from the context menu. - Configurable text speed, size and textbox position (including an optional fullscreen textbox). - Auto read mode: Automatically advances the text. - Continuous text mode: Appends text instead of clearing the textbox for each line. - Privacy mode: Black out all non-text graphics for when you're reading something embarrassing in a public setting.
release_text: bugfixes: - Text stream mode broke after loading

description: Truyện Audio là ứng dụng nghe đọc truyện trực tuyến qua wifi, 3G. Ứng dụng giúp người sử dụng có thể nghe truyện văn học, tiểu thuyết yêu thích ở bất kỳ đâu, bất kỳ thời điểm nào mà không cần phải mang truyện theo và giở từng trang để đọc. Hiện tại, bạn có thể nghe đọc các truyện sau: + Truyện đêm khuya + Truyện cổ tích Việt Nam + Truyện cổ tích thế giới + Truyện cổ Nhật Bản + Truyện Ma + Truyện Trạng Quỳnh + Truyện cổ Hàn Quốc + Truyện cổ Trung Quốc + Thần thoại Hy Lạp Trong thời gian tới, hệ thống sẽ nâng cấp để có thể cung cấp nhiều tác phẩm phong phú hơn đến người dùng. Chúc bạn có những giây phút thú vị với ứng dụng này. p/s: Ứng dụng đặc biệt dành cho các bạn khó ngủ và các bé thích nghe truyện cổ tích ;) Audio story is heard reading apps online via wifi, 3G. The application can help users hear stories literary fiction love anywhere, any time without having to carry the story along and turn the pages to read. Currently, you can hear the reading of the story follows: + Story of the night Fairy tales Vietnam + + Fairytale world + Japanese tales + Vampire Story Quynh + Story update + Korean tales + Chinese tales + Greek mythology In the future, the system can be upgraded to provide more than ample work for the user. Wish you have moments of fun with this app. p / s: Special Applications for you and your baby sleep problems like listening to fairy tales;)

The "Urine Microscopy App" intends to be a guide for the microscopic particle identification of urinary sediments. It is based on European Urinalysis Guidelines, dealing with a basic and an advanced level. 188 images are demonstrating representative microscopic elements during most important clinical situations.
release_text: Fixed the quiz so that new images are shown after a response

description: Honeycomb PRO theme for GO Launcher EX, includes lots of custom icons, dock bar, 10 backgrounds and folder++. Supports App2SD. 1. You must have GO Launcher installed. 2. To apply the theme within GO Launcher EX : MENU >preferences >theme preferences 3. To change icons: Long press an icon > Replace > Theme's icons > Honeycomb Pro Check out our other themes! Keywords : GO Launcher EX theme GO Launcher Dev Team Honeycomb Theme pro Urtegata

Velkommen til Mobilbank fra Santander for Android. Få full kontroll, raskt og enkelt med Mobilbank, når du trenger det. Du kan sjekke saldo, se din PIN-kode, overføre penger og betale regninger når det passer deg. Med tjenesten Mitt Kort har du et virtuelt kort med alle kortdetaljene du trenger til netthandel med deg hele tiden. Kom i gang med Mobilbank på 1-2-3: 1) Last ned appen. 2) Aktiver appen med BankID eller BankID Mobil 3) Gratulerer - du kan nå logge inn og bruke appen! Tjenester du har tilgang til før innlogging: · Sperre kort · Kontakte kundeservice · Tilbud og rabatter knyttet til ditt kredittkort · Billånskalkulator og søke om billån Tjenester du har tilgang til etter innlogging: · Hente PIN-kode · Mitt Kort · Overføre penger til bankkonto · Betale regninger · Se tilgjengelig kreditt · Siste transaksjoner · Fakturaarkiv · Administrere VbV Mobilbank-appen er kun tilgjengelig for Santander privatkunder i Norge og finnes kun på norsk. - Gebyrfri Visa, Flexi Visa, Santander Red, Manchester United Visa. Har du spørsmål, ta kontakt med Kundeservice på tlf. 815 68 550. Welcome to Mobile Banking from Santander for Android. Get full control, fast and easy with Mobilbank, when you need it. You can check balances, view your PIN, transfer money and pay bills when it suits you. With service My Card has a virtual card with any card details you need to shop online with you all the time. Getting started with Mobile Banking on 1-2-3: 1) Download the app. 2) Enable the app with BankID BankID or Mobile 3) Congratulations - you can now log in and use the app! Services you have access to before logging in: · Card blocking · Contacting Customer Service · Discounts associated with your credit card · Car loan calculator and apply for car loans Services you can access after login: · Retrieve PIN · My Card · Transfer money to bank account · Pay bills · See available credit · Recent transactions · Invoice Archive · Managing VbV Mobile banking app is only available for Santander private customers in Norway and are only in Norwegian. - Gebyrfri Visa, Flexi Visa, Santander Red, Manchester United Visa. If you have questions, please contact Customer Service on tel. 815 68 550.
release_text: Velkommen til nye Mobilbank! Vi jobber stadig med å forbedre våre tjenester og gjøre det enklere for deg å bruke Mobilbanken. I ny versjon er det enklere å aktivere appen - alt kan gjøres på telefonen din med BankID eller BankID Mobil. I tillegg er innlogging enda enklere. Du slipper nå å taste fødsels- og personnummer. Vi har også pusset opp designet i hele appen.
